1a1(khri brgyad): @##/ /khri brgyad kha pa bzhugs so/ /
1b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad
1b2(khri brgyad): stong pa/ bam po nyi shu gsum pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe
1b3(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
1b4(khri brgyad): ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa
2a1(khri brgyad): ltar/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa ma
2a2(khri brgyad): mdzad lags so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
2a3(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa yongs
2a4(khri brgyad): su brjod pa ma mdzad lags so/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar
2a5(khri brgyad): gyi ming yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
2b1(khri brgyad): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ pha
2b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa lnga po rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi sngon du 'gro ba yin
2b3(khri brgyad): no| |kun dga' bo/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos par pha rol tu phyin pa'i
2b4(khri brgyad): ming 'thob par 'gyur snyam mam/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang /
2b5(khri brgyad): bsam gtan dang / shes rab rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos par pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob par
2b6(khri brgyad): 'gyur snyam mam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sbyin pa rnam pa
3a1(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson
3a2(khri brgyad): 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pas/ ji ltar pha rol tu
3a3(khri brgyad): phyin pa'i ming thob par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims
3a4(khri brgyad): dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad
3a5(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob par 'gyur ro/ /len pa med pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs
3a6(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob par 'gyur ro/ /kun
3b1(khri brgyad): dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sbyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pas ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i
3b2(khri brgyad): ming thob par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul
3b3(khri brgyad): gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pas/ ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
3b4(khri brgyad): bo| gzugs gnyis su med pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / byang chub kyi bar du gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis yongs
3b5(khri brgyad): su bsngos pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul ji lta bu lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
3b6(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul ji lta bu lags/ byang chub kyi bar du gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
3b7(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar/ gzugs ni/ gzugs kyis stong ngo / /tshor ba ni/ tshor bas stong ngo / /'du shes ni/ 'du shes kyis stong ngo / /'du byed rnams ni/ 'du byed rnams
4a1(khri brgyad): kyis stong ngo / /rnam par shes pa ni/ rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
4a2(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa de ni/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi bar de ni/ gnyis su med cing
4a3(khri brgyad): gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de bas na/ 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po rnams dang / byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
4a4(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar gyi sngon du 'gro ba yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa chen po la brten nas tshogs pa'i dbang gis sa bon rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de
4a5(khri brgyad): bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten na/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
4a6(khri brgyad): du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten na'ang pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
4a7(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
4b1(khri brgyad): nyid pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi yongs su 'dren pa yin no/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/
4b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
4b3(khri brgyad): bgyid pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan gang dag yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
4b4(khri brgyad): kyis yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung zhing tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams
4b5(khri brgyad): 'jig rten du 'byung lags so/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag
4b6(khri brgyad): 'jig rten du 'byung lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba nas tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar du bgyis pas ni/ rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta
4b7(khri brgyad): bu rnams 'jig rten na mchis pa lags so/ /bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams 'jig rten na mchis pa lags
5a1(khri brgyad): so| |rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha
5a2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa bzung ba nas tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar du bgyis pas ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten na mchis pa lags so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams
5a3(khri brgyad): dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams mchis pa lags so/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams mchis pa lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchis pa lags so//
5a4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba nas tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar du bgyis pas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
5a5(khri brgyad): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na bzhugs pa lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka/
5a6(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba nas tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byas pas/ de dag gi yon tan ni/ de tsam du zad
5a7(khri brgyad): ces nga mi smra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
5b1(khri brgyad): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ tshul khrims kyi phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur
5b2(khri brgyad): ro| |gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dag ni/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /
5b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang
5b4(khri brgyad): yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar rig par bya ste/ rnam pa
5b5(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /
5b6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po gang yin pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam
5b7(khri brgyad): par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de ni/ kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa rnams kyi tshul khrims
6a1(khri brgyad): k yi phung po nas rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'i bar gang yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po nas rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung
6a2(khri brgyad): po'i bar de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro zhing / stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
6a3(khri brgyad): ltar/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi sems ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las rnam par grol zhing / chos gang dang yang bral ba med la skyes pa'ang
6a4(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris nas 'chang zhing me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog
6a5(khri brgyad): phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bkur sti byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed pa gang yin pa'i rigs
6a6(khri brgyad): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis kyang tshe 'di dang / tshe phyi ma'i yon tan rnams 'thob par re bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang
6a7(khri brgyad): po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog
6b1(khri brgyad): pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang /
6b2(khri brgyad): phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bkur sti bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ ri mor bgyid/ mchod par bgyid pa gang lags pa de la bdag gis kyang
6b3(khri brgyad): rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar bgyi'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
6b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du byed pa de'i gan du lha'i bu
6b5(khri brgyad): 'bum phrag mang po nyan pa'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur te/ lha'i bu rnams rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i spobs pa nye bar sgrub par sems
6b6(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi tshe chos smra ba de dag smra bar mi 'dod pa na'ang lha'i bu de dag nyid chos la gus pas spobs pa nye bar sgrub par sems par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/
6b7(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub bar byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / de glegs bam du 'ang
7a1(khri brgyad): bris nas me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti
7a2(khri brgyad): stang byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed pa de ni/ tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu
7a3(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di ston pa de dag ni/ 'khor bzhi po dag gis mdun du bdag la la la zhig bkar gcog cing klan ka tshol du 'ong ngo / /snyam du sems zhum par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir
7a4(khri brgyad): zhe na/ 'di ltar/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di srung zhing skyob la sbed par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /'di ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
7a5(khri brgyad): ni| 'jig rten pa rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / zag pa med pa rnams dang / thun mong pa rnams dang / thun mong ma yin pa
7a6(khri brgyad): rnams dang / dge ba rnams dang / mi dge ba rnams dang / 'dus byas rnams dang / 'dus ma byas rnams dang / nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /
7a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / chos thams cad tha dad pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nang
7b1(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas pa des ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la klan ka tshol ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / klan
7b2(khri brgyad): ka tshol bar byed pa de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de ltar na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa de la ni/ klan ka tshol ba med
7b3(khri brgyad): do| |kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa ni/ sems zhum par mi 'gyur/
7b4(khri brgyad): kun tu zhum par mi 'gyur/ skrag par mi 'gyur/ dngang bar mi 'gyur/ kun tu dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i zhe na/ 'di ltar/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni /gang zhum
7b5(khri brgyad): pa'am/ kun tu zhum pa'am/ skrag pa'am/ dngang ba'am/ kun tu dngang bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
7b6(khri brgyad): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me
7b7(khri brgyad): tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod pa byed pa de ni/ tshe 'di'i yon
8a1(khri brgyad): tan de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /
8a2(khri brgyad): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / de glegs bam du'ang bris te me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa
8a3(khri brgyad): dang | phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed pa de ni/ pha ma dang / mdza' bo dang / phyi
8a4(khri brgyad): 'khor dang / gnyen dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
8a5(khri brgyad): gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams
8a6(khri brgyad): dang | slob pa thams cad dang / mi slob pa de dag thams cad la sdug par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang
8a7(khri brgyad): bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /spobs pa mi chod pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin
8b1(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi chod pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi chod pa dang
8b2(khri brgyad): yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi chod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu
8b3(khri brgyad): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
8b4(khri brgyad): pa bzhi mi chod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi chod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi chod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi chod pa
8b5(khri brgyad): dang | mngon par shes pa rnams dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba mi chod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi chod pa
8b6(khri brgyad): dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /mu stegs can gyi rgol ba byung ngo cog la chos dang ldan pas tshar gcod nus par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha
8b7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / de yi ger yang bris te me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me
9a1(khri brgyad): tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/
9a2(khri brgyad): mchod par byed pa ni/ tshe 'di dang / tshe phyi ma'i yon tan de dag kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
9a3(khri brgyad): kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris te 'chang bar byed pa der/ kau shi ka/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
9a4(khri brgyad): ' jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu bla na med pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa gang yin pa de dag der lhags nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
9a5(khri brgyad): pa 'di 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed cing / phyag byas te btud nas phyir 'dong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab
9a6(khri brgyad): bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang /
9a7(khri brgyad): tshangs chen rnams dang / tshangs 'khor rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge
9b1(khri brgyad): rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / tshangs pa gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa de dag kyang der lhags nas
9b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par byas nas phyir 'dong bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ de la gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu
9b3(khri brgyad): mi che ba dang / shin tu mthong dang / gya nom snang dang / mi gdung ba dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag kyang der lhags nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang /
9b4(khri brgyad): bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par byas te phyag byas nas phyir 'dong bar sems par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des kyang 'di snyam du sems bskyed
9b5(khri brgyad): par bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu rgyal chen bzhi'i ris su gtogs pa nas 'bras bu che ba man chad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
9b6(khri brgyad): byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa gang yin pa de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gang yin pa rnams dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha
9b7(khri brgyad): ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang rin pa de dag 'dir lhags nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang
10a1(khri brgyad): kun chub par byas shing phyag byas te mchod pa byas pa rnams phyir dong zhing / chos kyi sbyin pa 'di'ang de dag la byin par gyur cig /snyam du sems bskyed
10a2(khri brgyad): par bya'o/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na 'khod pa'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu gang yin pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu man chad bla na med pa yang dag
10a3(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa gang yin pa rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag kyang der lhags nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
10a4(khri brgyad): pa 'di 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed /klog par byed/ kun chub par byed cing phyag byas te btud nas phyir 'dong bar sems so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
10a5(khri brgyad): 'di na 'khod pa'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu gang yin pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu man chad dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na 'khod pa'i rgyal chen
10a6(khri brgyad): bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha man chad gang yin pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed cing / de la
10a7(khri brgyad): glags tshol ba gang gis kyang glags mi rnyed de/ las kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag kyang
10b1(khri brgyad): yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sems
10b2(khri brgyad): can thams cad kyi skyabs bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i ched du yang dag par zhugs pa'i phyir ro/ /
10b3(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / kun
10b4(khri brgyad): chub par bgyi ba dang / bsti stang du bgyi ba dang / bla mar bgyi ba dang / ri mor bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / 'dud par bgyi ba'i slad du/ phyogs bcu'i khor khor yug dag nas
10b5(khri brgyad): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams der mchi ba dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu man chad mchi bar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ji ltar rtogs par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
10b6(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos mi ma yin pa'i lha'i dri sngon ma myong bar tshor bar gyur na/ des lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba dag shes rab kyi pha
10b7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan pa dang / gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir
11a1(khri brgyad): 'dir lhags so/ /snyam du shes par bya'o/ /kau shi ka /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des gtsang sbra byas na/ gtsang sbra byas pa des lha de
11a2(khri brgyad): dag lhags nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang /
11a3(khri brgyad): mchod pa byas nas yid rangs par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs de na lha gzi brjid chung ngu gang yin pa de dag ni/ lha gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag gis gzi brjid dang / byin mi bzod
11a4(khri brgyad): pas de nas gud du 'dong bar sems so/ /lha gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag ji tsam du der 'ong ba de tsam du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag rgya cher mos par 'gyur ro/ /sa
11a5(khri brgyad): phyogs der yang gtsang spra mi byed pa'i bag spyad par mi bya ste/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
11a6(khri brgyad): dang / ba dan dag gis kyang sa phyogs de brgyan cing spos kyis byugs la me tog sil mas gtor bar bya'o/ /dar gyi lda ldi mang po dbyang zhing bla re bres la rnam pa du mas sa phyogs de
11a7(khri brgyad): brgyan par bya'o/ /kau shi ka /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i lus ngal bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lus bde bar 'gyur ba dang / lus yang bar 'gyur ba dang / lus
11b1(khri brgyad): las su rung ba dang / sems yang ba dang / sems las su rung ba dang / sems bde bar nyams su tshor bar 'gyur te/ de phyin chad de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa thag pa nas
11b2(khri brgyad): yongs su rtog cing / sdig pa'i rmi lam rmi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
11b3(khri brgyad): kyis spras pa/ sku gser gyi kha dog can/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas pa/ chos ston cing bzhugs pa dag
11b4(khri brgyad): mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i gtam nyid thos par 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang ldan pa dang / sangs
11b5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang ldan pa'i gtam nyid thos par 'gyur te/ pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi don thos pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi don thos
11b6(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi shing yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par
11b7(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ 'di
12a1(khri brgyad): ltar yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams ni/ 'di ltar yongs su smin par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni/ 'di ltar yongs su gzung bar bya zhes
12a2(khri brgyad): chos bgro ba byed pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /shar phyogs nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang po dag gi sgra'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang /
12a3(khri brgyad): byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs mtshams dag nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhig na de bzhin
12a4(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig
12a5(khri brgyad): phrag 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig gis mdun gyis bltas nas yongs su bskor te chos ston cing bzhugs so/ /zhes thos par 'gyur ro/ /shar phyogs na sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
12a6(khri brgyad): p hrag 'bum phrag mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong zhing phyogs bcu'i bar du sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag
12a7(khri brgyad): kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten sku gdung gi rten rin po che sna tshogs las byas pa'i mchod rten bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag kyang mthong bar
12b1(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro/ /mchod rten de dag la'ang me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti
12b2(khri brgyad): stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod pa byed pa dag mthong bar 'gyur te/ kau shi ka /de ltar/ rigs kyi bu'am /rigs kyi bu mo rmi lam bzang po de lta bu de dag rmi bar 'gyur ro/ /bde bar
12b3(khri brgyad): gnyid kyis log cing bde bar sad par 'gyur te/ lus la gzi brjid 'jug par nyams su tshor zhing lus kyang lci ba med de/ yang bar nyams su tshor bar 'gyur ro/ /de kha zas la'ang brkam pa'i
12b4(khri brgyad): shas che bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad la brkam par mi 'gyur te/ kau shi ka /'di lta ste/ dper na/ dge slong rnal
12b5(khri brgyad): 'byor spyod pa ting nge 'dzin las langs pa de ni/ yid la byed pas tshim par gyur pa'i sems kyis zas la brkam pa'i shas che bar mi 'gyur gyi/ chung bar 'gyur ba bzhin no/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin
12b6(khri brgyad): du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la mi ma yin pa rnams gzi brjid sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang /
12b7(khri brgyad): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag kyang lus la gzi brjid 'jug par byed do/ /kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
13a1(khri brgyad): kyi bu mo gang gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ldan pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun
13a2(khri brgyad): chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni/ tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes
13a3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par mi byed/ 'chang bar mi byed/ klog par mi byed/ kun chub par mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed par glegs bam du bris te 'chang la/ me tog
13a4(khri brgyad): dang | bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/
13a5(khri brgyad): mchod pa byed kyang / kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur gyi/ gang gis phyogs bcu khor yug gi 'jig rten gyi khams na de
13a6(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na
13a7(khri brgyad): ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod pa byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
13b1(khri brgyad): rgyas de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten dang / nyan thos dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la'ang gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad
13b2(khri brgyad): rnams kyis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod pa byed pa ni/ de lta ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ 'dzin pa dang / ri mor byed pa'i phan
13b3(khri brgyad): yon gyi le'u zhes bya ste/ sum cu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka /gal te dzam+bu gling
13b4(khri brgyad): 'di| de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur byas te bkang la/ de dag la'ang me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang /
13b5(khri brgyad): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod pa byed pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di khyod la byin pa
13b6(khri brgyad): gang yin pa cha 'di gnyis las khyod gang 'dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te dzam+bu'i gling 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gang ba bdag
13b7(khri brgyad): la stsal pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris te stsal ba la/ bdag ni/ cha 'di gnyis bzhag pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'tshal lags so/ /de ci'i
14a1(khri brgyad): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag la ma gus pa'ang ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
14a2(khri brgyad): ni| gus pa kho na lags te/ bdag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dag la bsti stang bgyid par mi 'tshal ba'am/ bla mar bgyid par mi 'tshal ba'am/ ri mor bgyid par
14a3(khri brgyad): mi 'tshal ba'am/ mchod pa bgyid par mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams ni/ shes rab kyi
14a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ba lags te/ de'i slad du de dag bsti stang du bgyi ba dang / bla mar bgyi ba dang / ri mor bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs
14a5(khri brgyad): pa'i sku gdung rnams ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgos pa lags te/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams kyis mchod pa brnyes pa lags so/ /de nas
14a6(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ gzung du med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/
14a7(khri brgyad): 'di ltar/ mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa yin na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung du med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ 'di ltar/ mtshan nyid med pa/
14b1(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid gcig pa de khyod kyis ji ltar blang bar sems/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzung ba'am/ mi gzung ba'am/ 'grib pa'am/ 'phel ba'am/ dbri ba'am/
14b2(khri brgyad): bsnan pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'i phyir gnas pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin
14b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / slob pa'i chos rnams dang / mi slob pa'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar
14b4(khri brgyad): byed pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin
14b5(khri brgyad): par byed pa ma yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan
14b6(khri brgyad): lag dang / lam dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sbyin par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun
14b7(khri brgyad): pa| shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin par byed pa ma yin par bdag gis kyang
15a1(khri brgyad): shes so| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gnyis su nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /de
15a2(khri brgyad): bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
15a3(khri brgyad): phyin pa'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i phyir gnyis su nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin
15a4(khri brgyad): te| kau shi ka / de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ legs so/ /legs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gnyis
15a5(khri brgyad): su nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
15a6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i phyir gnyis su nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
15a7(khri brgyad): gnyis su 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod par zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /chos kyi dbyings dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gnyis su
15b1(khri brgyad): med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
15b2(khri brgyad): dang | sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyang gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa gang yin pa de
15b3(khri brgyad): ni| de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod par zad do/ /de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi bar du gnyis su 'dod par zad do/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom
15b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la bslab na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi
15b5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i gnas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe lha'i mdun sa chos bzang na lha'i
15b6(khri brgyad): dbang po'i stan la bdag mchis pa'i gnas la bdag mchis pa na/ der lha'i bu dag bdag la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa'i slad du mchis te/ gang gi tshe bdag gi seng+ge'i khri la bdag ma mchis
15b7(khri brgyad): pa de'i tshe lha'i bu de dag / chos kyi stan 'di la lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'dug nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la chos bstan to/ /zhes bdag gi stan de la phyag bgyis nas slar mchis so/ /
16a1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du gang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris pa gnas sam/ kha ton du bgyid dam/ gzhan dag la yang dag par ston
16a2(khri brgyad): pa der phyogs bcu nas lha'i bu dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang lhags pa de dag shes rab kyi pha
16a3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di la phyag 'tshal du mchi zhing / phyag bgyis nas slar mchi bar sems lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
16a4(khri brgyad): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'di las byung la/ sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad rnams kyang 'di las skyes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gang lags pa de dag
16a5(khri brgyad): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ba'i slad du'o/ /de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na'ang rnam pa thams
16a6(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rten du gyur cing / rkyen du gyur/ rgyur gyur/ stobs par gyur pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags pas bdag ni/ cha de gnyis las/ shes rab kyi pha rol
16a7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa nyid 'tshal lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blangs nas dam pa'i chos la sems gdungs pas kha ton du bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe bdag
16b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bgyid pa de'i tshe 'jigs par 'gyur ba'am/ bag 'khums par 'gyur ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
16b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis shing / bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis/ smos su
16b3(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas rnam pa
16b4(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du smos su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma dang bcas pa zhig lags te/ mtshan ma ma
16b5(khri brgyad): mchis pa ma lags na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod
16b6(khri brgyad): du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma
16b7(khri brgyad): mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par chos ston par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi slad du shes rab kyi pha
17a1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis/ smos su ma mchis pa lags pa de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos
17a2(khri brgyad): thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab par thugs su chud nas bla na med pa
17a3(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos
17a4(khri brgyad): su ma mchis pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / tha snyad ma mchis pa'i chos ston lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar lags pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ni/ lha
17a5(khri brgyad): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis
17a6(khri brgyad): bsti stang du bgyi ba dang / bla mar bgyi ba dang / ri mor bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba dang / bzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / kun chub par bgyi ba lags te/ de la ni /
17a7(khri brgyad): sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi lags so/ /nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
17b1(khri brgyad): ltung ba'ang ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur gyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / sems
17b2(khri brgyad): can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang /
17b3(khri brgyad): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyi ba dang / bla mar bgyi ba dang / ri mor bgyi ba dang / mchod pa bgyi ba dang
17b4(khri brgyad): 'bral bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis yongs su bkang ste
17b5(khri brgyad): byur bur bgyis pa zhig kyang bdag la stsal la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang bdag la stsal na/ bdag ni/ cha gnyis bzhag pa 'di las/ shes rab kyi
17b6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'tshal lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams ni/ de las byung ste/ bsti stang du bgyi ba dang / bla mar bgyi ba dang / ri mor bgyi ba
17b7(khri brgyad): dang | mchod pa bgyi ba lags pas/ des na/ rigs kyi bu gang dag gis bsti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ ri mor bgyid/ mchod pa bgyid na/ de dag ngan 'gro dag tu skye bar mi 'gyur te
18a1(khri brgyad): lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa nyams su myong nas smon lam ji ltar btab pa bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ theg
18a2(khri brgyad): pa chen pos yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba gang lags pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
18a3(khri brgyad): mthong ba gang lags pa 'di ni/ mtshungs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar lags pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang
18a4(khri brgyad): lags pa 'di ni/ gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
18a5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyis cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung bstan pa'i sde dang / gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i sde'i bar du yan lag bcu
18a6(khri brgyad): gnyis pa'i chos bstan pa gang lags pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ste kun chub par bgyis nas gzhan dag la'ang
18a7(khri brgyad): bstan pa gang lags pa de ni/ mtshungs pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum dang / mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde
18b1(khri brgyad): dang | lung bstan pa'i sde dang / gtan la bab par bstan pa'i sde'i bar dag ni/ 'di las byung ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa
18b2(khri brgyad): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung bstan pa'i sde dang / gtan la bab par bstan pa'i sde'i bar gyi chos/
18b3(khri brgyad): ston pa gang lags pa dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs mtshams kyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
18b4(khri brgyad): snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung bstan pa'i sde dang / gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i
18b5(khri brgyad): sde'i bar du chos ston pa gang lags pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa nas gzhan dag la ston pa'i bar du bgyid pa gang lags
18b6(khri brgyad): pa de ni/ mtshungs pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang 'di las byung ba lags la/ mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung bstan
18b7(khri brgyad): pa'i sde dang / gtan la bab par bstan pa'i sde'i bar de dag kyang 'di las byung ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang de bzhin gshegs pa
19a1(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang lags pa de dag la'ang me tog dang / bdug pa dang /
19a2(khri brgyad): spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyid/ bla
19a3(khri brgyad): mar bgyid/ ri mor bgyid/ mchod pa bgyid pa de ni/ mtshungs pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
19a4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas rnams ni/ 'di las byung ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
19a5(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par ston
19a6(khri brgyad): pa gang lags pa de la ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi lags
19a7(khri brgyad): so| |nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'ang ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas pa lags
19b1(khri brgyad): so| |de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
19b2(khri brgyad): kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / de la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na
19b3(khri brgyad): bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ ri mor bgyid/ mchod pa bgyid pa de la ni/ gang las kyang
19b4(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa 'byung ba ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper bgyi na/ bu lon pas 'jigs pa'i mi rgyal po la brten na/ de rgyal po la
19b5(khri brgyad): 'khor bas/ de gang dag gis 'jigs par gyur pa de dag nyid kyis bsten par 'gyur te/ de dag gis 'jigs par yang mi 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na /
19b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ mthu dang ldan pa la brten pa ni/ de ltar 'gyur ba'i slad du ste/ rgyal po la brten pa ni/ 'jigs pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan
19b7(khri brgyad): 'das/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgos pa'i sku gdung rnams kyis ni/ mchod pa brnyes lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de la rgyal po de ji lta ba de
20a1(khri brgyad): bzhin du ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa blta bar bgyi lags so/ /rgyal po la brten pa'i mi mchod pa thob pa ji lta ba de bzhin du ni/ de bzhin
20a2(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i sku gdung shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgos pas mchod pa brnyes par blta bar bgyi lags so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i yi shes gang
20a3(khri brgyad): lags pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgos par rig par bgyi lags so/ /de lta lags pas/ bdag ni/ cha 'di gnyis las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
20a4(khri brgyad): 'di nyid 'tshal lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams ni/ 'di las byung ba lags/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni/ 'di
20a5(khri brgyad): las byung ba lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
20a6(khri brgyad): ni| 'di las byung ba lags/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po ni/ 'di las byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po rnams ni/ 'di las byung
20a7(khri brgyad): bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ 'di las byung ba lags pa'i slad du'o// //
20b1(khri brgyad): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/ bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sems can
20b2(khri brgyad): rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa der sems can de dag la mi'am/ mi ma lags pa glags tshol bas
20b3(khri brgyad): glags rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad ni/ rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du'ang 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol
20b4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di ni/ de ltar rin po che ltar don che ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems
20b5(khri brgyad): can gang dag 'khod pa de dag la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bgyid pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
20b6(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der ni/ sangs rgyas byung bar 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper bgyi na/ nor bu rin po che chen po rin thang ma mchis pa zhig
20b7(khri brgyad): mchis la/ nor bu rin po che de'ang yon tan 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ nor bu rin po che de gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der mi ma lags pas glags rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing / gang
21a1(khri brgyad): dang gang na skyes pa 'am/ bud med mi ma lags pas zin pa de dang der nor bu rin po che de phyung na/ nor bu rin po che der phyung ma thag tu mi ma lags pa de nor bu
21a2(khri brgyad): rin po che chen po de'i gzi brjid mi bzod pas 'bros par 'gyur lags so/ /mkhris ba'i dbang gis tsha bar gyur pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che de btags na/ mkhris pa de'ang sel
21a3(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur zhing / rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur la/ zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /bser ma'i bro nad kyis thebs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che de btags na'ang rlung de sel bar 'gyur
21a4(khri brgyad): lags so/ /bad kan gyi bro nad kyis thebs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che de btags na'ang / bad kan de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /rigs kyi bu'am /rigs kyi bu mo
21a5(khri brgyad): 'dus pa'i bro nad kyis thebs pa de'i lus la nor bu rin po che de btags na'ang de'i nad de zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /nor bu rin po che de mtshan mo 'ang snang bar bgyid par 'gyur
21a6(khri brgyad): lags so/ /tsha ba'i dus la bab ba'i chos phyogs gang du nor bu rin po che de bzhag pa'i sa phyogs de'ang bsil bar 'gyur lags so/ /grang ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe sa phyogs
21a7(khri brgyad): gang du nor bu rin po che de bzhag pa'i sa phyogs de'ang dro bar 'gyur lags so/ /nor bu rin po che de gang du bzhag pa'i sa phyogs de grang yang mi grang / tsha 'ang mi tsha ste/ dus tshigs
21b1(khri brgyad): bde bar 'gyur lags so/ /sa phyogs gang du nor bu rin po che de gnas pa'i sa phyogs der sbrul gdug pa dang / sdig pa la sogs pa'am/ sdig sbrul rnams kyang gnas par mi 'gyur
21b2(khri brgyad): lags so/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sbrul gdug pas zin par gyur pa de la nor bu rin po che de bstan na/ de la bstan ma thag tu dug de dag thams cad ma mchis par
21b3(khri brgyad): 'gyur lags so/ /nor bu rin po che de ni/ yon tan de dag la sogs pa dang ldan pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ skyes pa'am/ bud med bro nad sna tshogs kyis thebs pa gang lags pa
21b4(khri brgyad): de dag gis lus la gal te nor bu rin po che de btags na/ de dag gi bro nad thams cad kyang zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chab gang gi nang du nor bu rin po che de stsal ba'i
21b5(khri brgyad): chab de dag thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyi kha dog ji lta ba dang / yan lag brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te nor bu rin po che de ras sngon pos dkris te chab
21b6(khri brgyad): kyi nang du stsal na'ang chab de sngon por 'gyur bar bgyi lags so/ /gal te ser po'am/ gal te dmar po'am/ gal te btsod ka'am/ gal te shel gyi kha dog lta bu'i ras kyis nor bu
21b7(khri brgyad): rin po che de dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na'ang chab de de dag gi kha dog tu 'gyur lags so/ /ras tshon sna tshogs su bsgril ba'i ras kyis nor bu rin po che dkris nas chab kyi nang du stsal
22a1(khri brgyad): na'ang chab de kha dog sna tshogs su 'gyur bar bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chab rnyog pa can gang gi nang du nor bu rin po che de stsal ba'i chab de dag thams cad kyang dang bar
22a2(khri brgyad): 'gyur te/ nor bu rin po che de ni yon tan de dag la sogs pa dang ldan lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ nor
22a3(khri brgyad): bu rin po che de lha'i yin nam/ 'on te dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams la'ang rin po che de lta bu yod snyam mam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ /nor bu rin po che de ni lha'i yin no/ /dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi nor bu
22a4(khri brgyad): rin po che gang yin pa ni chung la lci'o/ /lha'i nor bu rin po che gang yin bde dag ni che la yang ste/ dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi nor bu rin po che rnams ni/ lha'i rin po che de dag ltar yon tan gyi rnam pa shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa
22a5(khri brgyad): ma yin te/ dzam+bu gling pa'i nor bu rin po che de dag ni/ lha'i rin po che rnams kyi grangs su 'ang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ cha dang bgrang ba dang dper yang mi bzod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces
22a6(khri brgyad): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che de za ma tog gi nang du stsal ba las/ gang gi tshe nor bu rin po che de za ma tog de'i nang nas phyung na'ang nor bu rin po che de de'i nang na mchis mchis so/ /zhes za ma tog de'ang
22a7(khri brgyad): yid du mchi bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sa phyogs gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spyod pa der rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gi lus dang / sems kyi sdug bsngal dang /
22b1(khri brgyad): gnod pa mis bgyis pa'am/ mi ma lags pas bgyis pa rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /de la nor bu rin po che zhes bgyi ba de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dwags lags
22b2(khri brgyad): so| |shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni/ dpag tu ma mchis pa lags na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ji snyed cig yongs su brjod par rdo thogs lags/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
22b3(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
22b4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang / thams cad
22b5(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan yang de bzhin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes
22b6(khri brgyad): kyi yon tan de dag ni/ gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams kyis mchod pa brnyes par 'gyur ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang sku gdung de dag ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
22b7(khri brgyad): nyid kyi ye shes dang / bag chags dang / nying mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba dang / rtag tu gtang snyoms su gnas pa dang / bsnyel pa mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid kyi snod du gyur pa lags te/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs
23a1(khri brgyad): pa'i sku gdung rnams kyis mchod pa brnyes pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sku gdung de dag ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che rnams kyi snod du gyur ba lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
23a2(khri brgyad): gdung de dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / blang ba ma mchis pa dang / dor ba ma mchis pa'i
23a3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod du gyur pa lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ chos nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod du gyur pa lags so/ /de bzhin
23a4(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ chos nyid kyis yongs su bsgos pa lags te/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams ni/ mchod pa brnyes pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong
23a5(khri brgyad): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis yongs su bkang ste byur bur bgyis pa lta zhog / lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed de bzhin gshegs
23a6(khri brgyad): pa'i sku gdung gis yongs su bkang ste byur bur bgyis la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang glegs bam du bris te stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni cha 'di gnyis bzhag pa las/ shes rab kyi pha rol
23a7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di 'tshal lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgos pa de las byung ba'i slad du mchod pa brnyes pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
23b1(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la bsti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ ri mor bgyid/ mchod pa bgyid pa gang lags pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni/ mthar phyin nas lha rnams dang / mi
23b2(khri brgyad): rnams kyi bde ba dag nyams su myong ste/ rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su'am /bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su'am/
23b3(khri brgyad): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang du bde ba nyams su myong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid
23b4(khri brgyad): kyis sdug bsngal mthar bgyid par 'gyur ba tsam du bas kyi/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul
23b5(khri brgyad): bzhin du yid la bgyid pa gang lags pa de ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid
23b6(khri brgyad): lags so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags so/ /tshul
23b7(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags so/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du yongs
24a1(khri brgyad): su rdzogs bar bgyid lags te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug par bgyid lags so/
24a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa rnams thob par 'gyur lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa rnams thob nas sangs
24a3(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi zhing lus gang dag gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i lus bsam bzhin du len par bgyid de/ yang na 'khor
24a4(khri brgyad): los bsgyur ba'i lus sam/ rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i lus
24a5(khri brgyad): blangs nas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags pas/ bdag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la gus par mi
24a6(khri brgyad): bgyid pa'ang ma lags la/ len bar mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsti stang bgyid pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams
24a7(khri brgyad): la'ang bsti stang bgyis par 'gyur/ bla mar bgyis par 'gyur/ ri mor bgyis par 'gyur/ mchod par bgyis par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang phyogs
24b1(khri brgyad): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis pa dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa de dag chos kyi sku dang /
24b2(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi skur mthong bar 'tshal ba gang lags pa des ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ gzhan dag
24b3(khri brgyad): la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi zhing / tshul bzhin du'ang yid la bgyi'o/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
24b4(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la spyod pa des ni/ chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par
24b5(khri brgyad): bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos nyid ni/ 'di gnyis lags te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dus byas kyi chos kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi chos nyid lags so/ /bcom
24b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ de la 'dus byas kyi chos kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/ nang stong pa nyid 'tshal ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'tshal ba gang lags pa'i bar dang / byang
24b7(khri brgyad): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 'tshal ba gang lags ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'tshal ba gang lags pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'tshal ba gang lags
25a1(khri brgyad): pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'tshal ba gang lags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'tshal ba gang lags pa dang / dge ba
25a2(khri brgyad): dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams 'tshal ba gang lags pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa rnams dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba ma mchis
25a3(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams 'tshal ba gang lags pa ste/ 'di ni/ 'dus
25a4(khri brgyad): byas kyi chos kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o/ /de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/ chos gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma
25a5(khri brgyad): mchis pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / 'grib ba ma mchis
25a6(khri brgyad): pa dang / 'phel ba ma mchis pa dang / chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid kyi bar dag lags so/ /chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis ba nyid kyang gang lags she na/
25a7(khri brgyad): chos thams cad ni/ dngos bo ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags pas/ 'di ni/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang
25b1(khri brgyad): po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byung ba
25b2(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de
25b3(khri brgyad): b zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag
25b4(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
25b5(khri brgyad): y ang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
25b6(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos su gyur pa gang yin pa de dag dang / ma
25b7(khri brgyad): byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
26a1(khri brgyad): b com pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i spangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos da ltar 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la
26a2(khri brgyad): bsten nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /thob bar 'gyur ro/ /'thob
26a3(khri brgyad): bo| |'das pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa gang yin pa de dag dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag dang / da lta ba phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
26a4(khri brgyad): gyi khams dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag na rang sangs rgyas gnas te 'tsho zhing sdod pa gang yin pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas rang byang chub
26a5(khri brgyad): thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /'thob bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir te/ de dag kyang mtshan ma med pa'i
26a6(khri brgyad): tshul dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i tshul dang / blang
26a7(khri brgyad): ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i tshul dang / dbri ba med pa dang / bsnan pa med pa'i tshul dang / gzung ba med pa dang / spong ba med pa'i tshul gyis bstan te/ de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad
26b1(khri brgyad): kyis bya ba yin gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ma yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa'i phyir te/
26b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ pha rol lam /tshu rol lam/ thang ngam/ gshong ngam/ mnyam pa'am/ mi mnyam ba'am /mtshan ma'am/ mtshan ma med pa'am/ 'jig rten
26b3(khri brgyad): pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas sam /dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ 'das pa'am/ ma 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau
26b4(khri brgyad): shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang yang sbyin par byed pa ma yin te/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos
26b5(khri brgyad): rnams kyang sbyin par byed pa ma yin no/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ ches che ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
26b6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams kyang rab tu 'tshal la sems can yang mi dmigs/
26b7(khri brgyad): shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar yang mi dmigs/ gzugs kyang mi dmigs/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang mi dmigs/ mig kyang
27a1(khri brgyad): mi dmigs/ gzugs kyang mi dmigs/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang mi dmigs/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang mi dmigs/ mig gi 'dus te reg
27a2(khri brgyad): pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bde ba'ang ma lags/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma lags pa gang lags pa de'ang mi dmigs lags so/ /de bzhin du
27a3(khri brgyad): rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang mi dmigs/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba
27a4(khri brgyad): bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bde ba'ang ma lags/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma lags pa gang lags pa de'ang mi dmigs lags so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang mi
27a5(khri brgyad): dmigs/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam yang mi dmigs lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs
27a6(khri brgyad): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang mi dmigs lags so/ /byang chub dang / sangs rgyas
27a7(khri brgyad): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mi dmigs lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma lags
27b1(khri brgyad): pa'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar/ gang gis dmigs pa dang / gang la dmigs pa rang bzhin gyis ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau
27b2(khri brgyad): shi ka/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni/
27b3(khri brgyad): byang chub kyang mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' lta ci smos/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams lta'ang ci smos/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'
27b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig la spyod par bgyid kyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan dag la spyod par mi bgyid lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
27b5(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig la spyod pa ma yin gyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la'ang spyod do/ /de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
27b6(khri brgyad): spyod de/ de sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa po'ang mi dmigs/ len pa po 'ang mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims
27b7(khri brgyad): 'chal pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /bzod pa'ang mi dmigs/ bzod par bya ba'ang mi dmigs/ bzod pa dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs/ bya ba'ang mi dmigs /
28a1(khri brgyad): lus dang sems kyang mi dmigs so/ /sems kyang mi dmigs/ ting nge 'dzin kyang mi dmigs/ mnyam par bzhag pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyang
28a2(khri brgyad): mi dmigs/ shes par bya ba'ang mi dmigs/ shes rab dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
28a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa
28a4(khri brgyad): sgom pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i sngon du 'gro ba yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams
28a5(khri brgyad): rnam par 'byed pa'i sngon du 'gro ba yin no/ /de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyar bar bya'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
28a6(khri brgyad): sum cu rtsa bdun la'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyar bar bya'o/ /stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig ba rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
28a7(khri brgyad): 'dres pa bco brgyad la'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyar bar bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyar bar bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/
28b1(khri brgyad): dper na/ dzam+bu'i gling gi shing ljon pa lo ma tha dad pa dang / 'bras bu tha dad pa'i shing ljon pa ji snyed pa de dag gi grib ma ni/ grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba ma gtogs par khyad
28b2(khri brgyad): par ram/ tha dad du dbye ba med do/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
28b3(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsdos pa rnams la ni/ khyad par ram/ tha dad du dbye ba med do/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ snying rje
28b4(khri brgyad): chen po dang ldan pa lags/ yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa lags/ yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa lags
28b5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ yon tan thug pa ma mchis pa dang ldan pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha
28b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la'ang bris te 'chang la/ me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
28b7(khri brgyad): mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ ri mor bgyid/ mchod pa bgyid de/ ji ltar lung phog pa bzhin du'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul
29a1(khri brgyad): bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bris te gzhan dag la
29a2(khri brgyad): stsal na| 'di gnyis las gang bsod nams ches mang du bskyed pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de'i phyir 'di khyod nyid la dri'i/ khyod kyis ji
29a3(khri brgyad): ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob cig / kau shi ka/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la me tog dang /
29a4(khri brgyad): bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor
29a5(khri brgyad): byed| mchod pa byed pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs 'bru tsam gzhan dag la byin te bgo bsha' byas nas rigs kyi
29a6(khri brgyad): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs 'bru tsam po de la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
29a7(khri brgyad): gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod pa byed na/ de gnyis las gang bsod nams ches mang
29b1(khri brgyad): du bskyed snyam mam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs
29b2(khri brgyad): pa'i sku gdung de dag la bdag nyid kyang me tog la sogs pas bsti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ ri mor bgyid/ mchod par bgyid pa bas/ gzhan dag la'ang stsol bar bgyid pa de ni/ de
29b3(khri brgyad): las bsod nams ches mang du bskyed lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas sems can gyi tshogs kyi nang na sems can de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
29b4(khri brgyad): gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba rnams la thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig ste de bzhin gshegs
29b5(khri brgyad): pa'i sku gdung rnams su byin gyis brlabs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tha na de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs
29b6(khri brgyad): 'bru tsam la mchod par bgyid pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur gyi bar du de dag thams cad kyis de'i mtha' rtogs par rngo mi thogs lags so/ /bcom ldan
29b7(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog
30a1(khri brgyad): dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed pa
30a2(khri brgyad): dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa bas gang gis yi ger bris nas gzhan dag la sbyin par byed na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de de las ches bsod
30a3(khri brgyad): nams mang du bskyed do/ /kau shi ka /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji ltar lung phog pa bzhin du gzhan dag gi drung du song ste
30a4(khri brgyad): 'chad cing ston pa dang / brjod cing 'grel pa dang / gsal bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo snga ma bas/ ches bsod
30a5(khri brgyad): nams mang du bskyed de/ ston pa'am/ bla ma'i gnas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa gang yang rung ba zhig yin par shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la
30a6(khri brgyad): ston pa'ang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan pa ni/ ma yin gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin la/ ston pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu
30a7(khri brgyad): phyin pa yin pas na/ 'di ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin par blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin
30b1(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab pas byung ba yin la/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas
30b2(khri brgyad): pa gang yang rung ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
30b3(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab pas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob
30b4(khri brgyad): par gyur to/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs so/ /'jug go /
30b5(khri brgyad): 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ de bas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon sum du bya
30b6(khri brgyad): bar 'dod pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bya
30b7(khri brgyad): pa dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod pa bya bar 'dod pa des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid glegs bam la bris te me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos
31a1(khri brgyad): dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bya/ bla mar bya/ ri mor bya /
