91b6(khri brgyad): med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
91b7(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar gyi sngon gyi mtha' ni/ ma bcings/ ma grol ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon gyi mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /
92a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ gzugs phyi ma'i mtha' ni/ ma bcings/ ma grol ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyi ma'i mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ gzugs yin pa'i
92a2(khri brgyad): phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyi ma'i mtha' ni/ ma bcings/
92a3(khri brgyad): ma grol ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyi ma'i mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs da ltar byung ba ni/ ma bcings/
92a4(khri brgyad): ma grol ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da ltar byung ba dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
92a5(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar da ltar byung ba ni/ ma bcings/ ma grol ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da ltar byung ba dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/
92a6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mngon par mi brtson ba rnams dang / dge
92a7(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa rnams dang / sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis pa rnams dang / bdud kyi dbang du mchis pa rnams dang / le lo can rnams dang / brtson 'grus zhan pa
92b1(khri brgyad): rnams dang / bskyung ngas pa rnams dang / shes bzhin can ma lags pa rnams kyis mos par dka' ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de
92b2(khri brgyad): bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mngon par mi brtson pa rnams dang / shes bzhin can ma yin pa'i bar dag gis mos par bka' ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs rnam
92b3(khri brgyad): par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par
92b4(khri brgyad): dag pa nyid do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri
92b5(khri brgyad): brgyad stong pa bam po nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /'bras bu rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes
92b6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs rnam par dag pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam
92b7(khri brgyad): par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /'bras bu rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
93a1(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na/ gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / 'bras bu
93a2(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer
93a3(khri brgyad): med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
93a4(khri brgyad): phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs rnam par dag pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam
93a5(khri brgyad): par dag pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na/ gzugs rnam par dag pa dang /
93a6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du
93a7(khri brgyad): med do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdag rnam par dag ba gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs rnam par dag pa'o/ /gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ bdag rnam par dag pa ste/ de
93b1(khri brgyad): ltar na/ bdag rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/ /sems can dang / srog dang / shes pa po dang /
93b2(khri brgyad): mthong ba po'i bar du rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams
93b3(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang 'dod chags rnam par dag pas gzugs
93b4(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na/ 'dod chags rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
93b5(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/ /de bzhin du zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnam par dag pas/ gzugs
93b6(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na/ zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang /
93b7(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang 'dod chags
94a1(khri brgyad): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnam par dag pas/ gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na/
94a2(khri brgyad): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med
94a3(khri brgyad): de/ gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang ma rig pa rnam par dag pas/ 'du byed rnam par dag pa'o/ /'du byed rnam par dag pas/ rnam par
94a4(khri brgyad): shes pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /de bzhin du ming dang gzugs rnam par dag pa'o/ /skye mched drug rnam par dag pa'o/ /reg pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /tshor ba rnam par dag pa'o/ /sred pa rnam par
94a5(khri brgyad): dag pa'o/ /len pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /srid pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /skye ba rnam par dag pa'o/ /skye ba rnam par dag pas/ rga shi rnam par dag pa'o/ /rga shi rnam par dag pas/ sbyin
94a6(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam
94a7(khri brgyad): par dag pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /brtson
94b1(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
94b2(khri brgyad): pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/ nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
94b3(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rnam par dag pa'o/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams
94b4(khri brgyad): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnam par dag pa'o/ /lam rnam par dag pas/ thams cad shes
94b5(khri brgyad): pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ /thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par dag pas/ stobs bcu rnam par dag pa'o/ /stobs bcu rnam par dag pas/ mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa
94b6(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
94b7(khri brgyad): nyid rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su
95a1(khri brgyad): dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs rnam par
95a2(khri brgyad): dag pa'o/ /gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par
95a3(khri brgyad): dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad
95a4(khri brgyad): du med do/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag
95a5(khri brgyad): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs rnam par dag pa'o/ /gzugs rnam par
95a6(khri brgyad): dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa
95a7(khri brgyad): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/ /nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa
95b1(khri brgyad): dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnam
95b2(khri brgyad): par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'o/ /stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam
95b3(khri brgyad): par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams
95b4(khri brgyad): cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag
95b5(khri brgyad): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang 'dus byas rnam
95b6(khri brgyad): par dag pas/ 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pa'o/ /'dus ma byas rnam par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na/ 'dus byas
95b7(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa dang / 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med cing tha
96a1(khri brgyad): mi dad de gcad du med do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang 'das pa rnam par dag pas/ ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pas/
96a2(khri brgyad): 'das pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pas/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pas/ da ltar
96a3(khri brgyad): byung ba rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na/ 'das pa rnam par dag pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis
96a4(khri brgyad): dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ sems can dmyal ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa 'di ni/ zab lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
96a5(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ /gang shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du zab pa lags/
96a6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
96b1(khri brgyad): par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par
96b2(khri brgyad): shes pa'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /
96b3(khri brgyad): gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /
96b4(khri brgyad): tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid shin
96b5(khri brgyad): tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shin tu rnam
96b6(khri brgyad): par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
96b7(khri brgyad): phyir zab pa yin no/ /stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa
97a1(khri brgyad): yin no/ /byang chub shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /shA ri'i
97a2(khri brgyad): bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par
97a3(khri brgyad): dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du snang ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i
97a4(khri brgyad): bu/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag
97a5(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /mig shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid shin tu
97a6(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang
97a7(khri brgyad): ba yin no/ /sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
97b1(khri brgyad): phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang /
97b2(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
97b3(khri brgyad): phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /dran pa nye bar
97b4(khri brgyad): gzhag pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi
97b5(khri brgyad): yan lag dang / lam shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
97b6(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/
97b7(khri brgyad): snang ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa ni/ nying mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i
98a1(khri brgyad): bu| shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang nying mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis pas/ rnam par dag pa
98a2(khri brgyad): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gzugs 'pho ba med pas/ nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni/ rnam par dag pa yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad
98a3(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'pho ba med pas/ nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni/ rnam par dag pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa ni/ kun
98a4(khri brgyad): nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan
98a5(khri brgyad): 'das/ gang la kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pas/ rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gzugs ni/ rang bzhin gyis kun nas
98a6(khri brgyad): nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni/ rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no/ /
98a7(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa ni/ thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA
98b1(khri brgyad): ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la thob pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam par
98b2(khri brgyad): dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gzugs la thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no/ /rnam pa thams
98b3(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa ni/ mngon
98b4(khri brgyad): par ma grub pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang mngon par
98b5(khri brgyad): grub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gzugs mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no/ /
98b6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa ni/ 'dod pa'i
98b7(khri brgyad): khams su mi skye ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ rnam
99a1(khri brgyad): par dag pa 'dod pa'i khams su mi skye ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med
99a2(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa mi skye'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa ni/ gzugs kyi khams su mi skye ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
99a3(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ rnam par dag pa gzugs kyi khams su mi skye ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
99a4(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa mi skye'o/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag
99a5(khri brgyad): pa ni/ gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams su mi skye lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom
99a6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ rnam par dag pa gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams su mi skye ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gzugs med pa'i khams kyi
99a7(khri brgyad): rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa mi skye'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa ni/ 'tshal ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan
99b1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ rnam par dag pa 'tshal ba ma mchis
99b2(khri brgyad): pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos bem po nyid kyi phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ shes pa med pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam
99b3(khri brgyad): par dag pa ni/ gzugs ma 'tshal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom
99b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ rnam par dag pas/ gzugs ma 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par
99b5(khri brgyad): dag pas gzugs mi shes so/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du rnam par dag pa ni/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
99b6(khri brgyad): pa ma 'tshal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/
99b7(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ rang gi
100a1(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par dag pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes so/ /shA ri'i bus
100a2(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa ni/ chos thams cad ma 'tshal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
100a3(khri brgyad): ro| |shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ rnam par dag pa'i chos thams cad ma 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ chos thams
100a4(khri brgyad): cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pas chos thams cad mi shes so/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad
100a5(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid la sman par yang mi bgyid/ gnod par yang mi bgyid pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i
100a6(khri brgyad): bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sman par yang mi bgyid/ gnod par yang mi bgyid pa lags/ bcom
100a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par yang mi byed/ gnod par
100b1(khri brgyad): yang mi byed do/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ni/ chos gang yang longs su 'dzin par mi bgyid pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
100b2(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa chos gang yang
100b3(khri brgyad): yongs su 'dzin par mi bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ chos kyi dbyings mi g.yo ba nyid kyi phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
100b4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du gzugs rnam par dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
100b5(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du/ bdag rnam par dag pas/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
100b6(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ bdag med pa'i phyir gzugs med pa ni/ shin tu rnam par dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i
100b7(khri brgyad): slad du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
101a1(khri brgyad): phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
101a2(khri brgyad): shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ bdag med pa'i phyir tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
101a3(khri brgyad): par shes pa med pa ni/ shin tu rnam par dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa lags
101a4(khri brgyad): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par
101a5(khri brgyad): dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rnam par dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i
101a6(khri brgyad): slad du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams rnam par dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
101a7(khri brgyad): bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par
101b1(khri brgyad): rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rnam par dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag ba'i phyir ro/ /rab
101b2(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
101b3(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ bdag med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad med pa ni/ shin tu rnam par dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
101b4(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
101b5(khri brgyad): dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub rnam par dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor/ rang gi mtshan nyid
101b6(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa dang / bdag rnam par
101b7(khri brgyad): dag pas/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
102a1(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du byang chub rnam par
102a2(khri brgyad): dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag rnam par
102a3(khri brgyad): dag pas/ byang chub rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
102a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par
102a5(khri brgyad): dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom
102a6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes pa ma rnyed/ ma stor ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gnyis su ma mchis shing rnam par
102a7(khri brgyad): dag pa ni/ thob pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
102b1(khri brgyad): ro| |rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du gnyis su ma mchis shing / rnam par dag pa thob pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan
102b2(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag mu ma mchis pa'i
102b3(khri brgyad): slad du gzugs mu ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
102b4(khri brgyad): ci'i slad du bdag mu ma mchis pas/ gzugs mu ma mchis shing rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
102b5(khri brgyad): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag mu ma mchis pa'i slad du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
102b6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa mu ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
102b7(khri brgyad): 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag mu ma mchis pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu ma mchis shing / rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom
103a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis
103a2(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar rtogs pa gang lags pa don/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
103a3(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du de ltar rtogs pa gang lags pa de/ byang
103a4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi phyir
103a5(khri brgyad): ro| |rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ tshu rol gyi 'gram mam/ pha rol
103a6(khri brgyad): gyi 'gram mam/ gnyi ga ma mchis pa la'ang mi dmigs pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
103a7(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshu rol gyi 'gram mam/ pha rol gyi
103b1(khri brgyad): 'gram mam/ gnyi ga ma mchis pa la'ang mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
103b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ gal te theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la 'di ltar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'du
103b3(khri brgyad): shes su bgyid na/ de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu bgyid pa lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgyang ring du bgyid pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
103b4(khri brgyad): pa/ rab 'byor/ legs so/ /legs so/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /ming du'ang chags/ mtshan mar yang chags te/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ mtshan
103b5(khri brgyad): ma med pa/ ming med pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ ming du'ang chags pa lags/ mtshan mar yang chags pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
103b6(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ming du'ang 'dzin par byed/ mtshan mar yang
103b7(khri brgyad): 'dzin par byed cing / ming dang / mtshan mar bzung nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su byed de/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su
104a1(khri brgyad): byed pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong zhing rgyang ring du byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems
104a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang / chags pa dang / ma chags pa 'di dag legs par bshad cing shin tu mthar gtugs pa ni/ ngo
104a3(khri brgyad): mtshar lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
104a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa ni/ gang yin/ ma chags pa ni/ gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg
104a5(khri brgyad): pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pa gzugs stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na/ chags pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
104a6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na/ chags pa yin no/ /khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams la'ang de bzhin no/ /sbyin
104a7(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na/ chags pa yin no/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha
104b1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na/ chags pa yin no/ /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na/ chags pa yin no/ /de bzhin du yang dag par
104b2(khri brgyad): spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
104b3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na/ chags pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg
104b4(khri brgyad): pa ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pa 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na/ chags pa yin no/ /ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma
104b5(khri brgyad): 'ongs pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na/ chags pa yin no/ /da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar 'du shes na/ chags pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang
104b6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sems dang po bskyed phyin chad dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ chags pa yin no//
104b7(khri brgyad): tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ chags pa yin no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par
105a1(khri brgyad): spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams la spyod na/ chags pa yin no/ /stobs bcu dang /
105a2(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod na/ chags pa yin no/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/
105a3(khri brgyad): gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma chags pa gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
105a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di snyam du/ gzugs kyis gzugs kun tu mi shes so/ /tshor ba
105a5(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pas rnam par shes pa kun tu mi shes so/ /'das pa'i chos rnams kyis 'das pa'i chos rnams kun tu mi shes so/ /ma 'ongs
105a6(khri brgyad): pa'i chos rnams kyis ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams kun tu mi shes so/ /da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyis da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kun tu mi shes so/ /snyam du mi sems so/ /tshe dang ldan
105a7(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po thabs la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
105b1(khri brgyad): dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
105b2(khri brgyad): dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
105b3(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di snyam du/ bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin
105b4(khri brgyad): par bya'o/ /'di la sbyin par bya'o/ /'di sbyin par bya'o/ /zhe'am/ de bzhin du bdag gis tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab bsgom
105b5(khri brgyad): bar bya'o/ / shes rab 'di bsgom par bya'o/ /shes rab 'di ltar bsgom par bya'o/ /zhe'am/ bdag gis bsod nams spel bar byed pa'o/ /bsod nams 'di spel bar bya'o/ /bsod nams
105b6(khri brgyad): 'di ltar spel bar bya'o/ /zhe'am/ bdag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa'o/ /bdag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'o/ /bdag ni/ sems can rnams
105b7(khri brgyad): yongs su smin par byed pa'o/ /bdag ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed pa'o/ /snyam du mi sems te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
106a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag la ni/ de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa dag med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/
106a2(khri brgyad): de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma chags pa yin no/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang
106a3(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ rnam grangs gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chags par 'gyur ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
106a4(khri brgyad): kau shi ka /'di la byang chub sems dpas sems su kun tu shes pa dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab tu kun tu
106a5(khri brgyad): shes pa dang / nang stong pa nyid du kun tu shes pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du kun tu shes pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag
106a6(khri brgyad): par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su kun tu shes pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su kun tu shes pa dang / sangs rgyas las bskyed pa'i dge
106a7(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba rnams su kun tu shes pa de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te brtul cing gzhal nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chags pa ste/
106b1(khri brgyad): des ni/ chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di ltar/
106b2(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni/ yongs su bsngo bar mi nus la/ kau shi ka/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang yongs su bsngo bar
106b3(khri brgyad): mi nus shing / de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin yang yongs su bsngo bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
106b4(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub kyi don du gzhan dag la ston par 'dod pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
106b5(khri brgyad): du rtogs pa'i yid kyis yang dag par bstan par bya/ yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par bya/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya zhing /
106b6(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ci nas kyang bdag ni/ sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'o/ /bdag ni/ tshul khrims srung ba'o/ /bdag ni/ bzod pa sgom pa'o/ /bdag ni/ brtson
106b7(khri brgyad): 'grus rtsom pa'o/ /bdag ni/ bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /bdag ni/ shes rab sgom pa'o/ /bdag ni/ nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'o/ /bdag ni/ dngos po med pa'i
107a1(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'o/ /bdag ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gsum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa'o/ /bdag ni/ byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'o/ /
107a2(khri brgyad): snyam du rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de ltar yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar gzhan dag la yang dag par ston pa
107a3(khri brgyad): dang / yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa de ni/ bdag kyang nyams par mi 'gyur la/ de dag
107a4(khri brgyad): la'ang sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pas yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa yin no/ /kau shi ka /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de la
107a5(khri brgyad): ltar gzhan dag la yang dag par bstan par bya/ yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par bya/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ste/ kau
107a6(khri brgyad): shi ka / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de ltar chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
107a7(khri brgyad): 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gang khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa'i mtha' de dag bstan pa legs so/ /legs so//
107b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ chags pa'i rnam pa de bas kyang phra ba gzhan dag kyang khyod la bstan par bya'i/ de dag legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /
107b2(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin no/ /zhes gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
107b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ 'di la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan mar
107b4(khri brgyad): yid la byed na/ rab 'byor/ ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no/ /gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung
107b5(khri brgyad): ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das
107b6(khri brgyad): nas ji srid du dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar yid la byed cing / yid la byas nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
107b7(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na/ rab 'byor/ ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa thams cad dang bral ba
108a1(khri brgyad): rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag dang / de las gzhan pa sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang mtshan mar yid la byas nas bla na med yang
108a2(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na/ rab 'byor/ ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs
108a3(khri brgyad): pa ni/ mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin la/ de dag las gzhan pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
108a4(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ zab pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos
108a5(khri brgyad): thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lags so/ /bcom ldan
108a6(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ ma byas shing mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ni/ sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par
108a7(khri brgyad): mi nus so/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad ni/ mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par dka' ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
108b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ chos kyi rang bzhin ni/ gnyis ma yin te/ gcig tu zad do/ /rab 'byor/ chos kyi rang bzhin gcig pa gang yin pa de ni/ rang bzhin ma yin no/ /gang rang
108b2(khri brgyad): bzhin ma yin pa de ni/ ma byas pa'o/ /gang ma byas pa de ni/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang lta ba rang bzhin gcig pa
108b3(khri brgyad): dang / rang bzhin ma yin pa dang / ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas par shes na/ chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
108b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rtogs par dka' ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/
108b5(khri brgyad): sus kyang ma mthong / ma thos shing / bye brag ma phyed de/ rnam par ma shes la/ mngon par rdzogs par khong du ma chud pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes
108b6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa ni/ sus kyang mi shes
108b7(khri brgyad): pa ste| gzugs kyis mi shes so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pas mi shes so/ /khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
109a1(khri brgyad): pa rnams kyis mi shes so/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis mi shes so/ /stobs rnams
109a2(khri brgyad): dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis ma shes so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/
109a3(khri brgyad): chos thams cad rnam par dag par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad
109a4(khri brgyad): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ bgyid pa po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol
109a5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa ni/ chos thams cad dmigs su med par byed pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
109a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
109a7(khri brgyad): la spyod pa'i tshe gal te gzugs la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
109b1(khri brgyad): shes pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa
109b2(khri brgyad): rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
109b3(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces
109b4(khri brgyad): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang /
109b5(khri brgyad): sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba
109b6(khri brgyad): dang / mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba
109b7(khri brgyad): dang / sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhen/ gang rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug
110a1(khri brgyad): bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs med la/ gang rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa'am/
110a2(khri brgyad): bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
110a3(khri brgyad): shes pa'ang med cing / de bzhin du gang rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur
110a4(khri brgyad): ba de lta bu'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
110a5(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gal te gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa'am/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin
110a6(khri brgyad): du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'am/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
110a7(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'am/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
110b1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa'am/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ gzugs ma yin no/ /zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes
110b2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin la/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'am/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang
110b3(khri brgyad): yin pa de/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin zhing / de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
110b4(khri brgyad): kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'am/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ma yin no/ /zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
110b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
110b6(khri brgyad): 'di ltar chags pa dang / chags pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la legs par gsungs
110b7(khri brgyad): pa ni| ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
111a1(khri brgyad): ba'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa dang / ma chags pa dag legs par bshad do/ /rab 'byor/
111a2(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
111a3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
111a4(khri brgyad): la spyod pa yin no/ /mig chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
111a5(khri brgyad): yid chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
111a6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa
111a7(khri brgyad): med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
111b1(khri brgyad): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/
111b2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ gzugs chags pa med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
111b3(khri brgyad): pa chags pa med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chags pa med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /
111b4(khri brgyad): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa med pa zhes bya
111b5(khri brgyad): bar 'du shes pa med do/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po nyi shu dgu pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
111b6(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar chos bstan pa zab mo 'di bshad kyang 'phel ba ma mchis la/ ma bshad kyang 'grib pa ma mchis pa de ni/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /de
111b7(khri brgyad): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
112a1(khri brgyad): ni| bshad kyang 'phel ba med la/ ma bshad kyang 'grib pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
112a2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing nam mkha'i bsngags pa dang / bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par gyur kyang nam mkha' la ni/ bsngags ba brjod kyang 'phel ba med la/ bsngags pa ma
112a3(khri brgyad): yin pa brjod kyang 'grib pa med de/ nam mkha' ni/ bsngags kyang 'phel ba med la/ ma bsngags kyang 'grib pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la ni/ bsngags pa brjod kyang
112a4(khri brgyad): 'phel ba med la/ bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang 'grib pa med de/ bsngags pa brjod kyang rjes su chags pa med/ bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang khong khro ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du chos rnams
112a5(khri brgyad): kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de'ang bshad kyang de bzhin la/ ma bshad kyang de bzhin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol
112a6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa na/ zhum par yang mi 'gyur la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
112a7(khri brgyad): byang chub las kyang slar mi ldog pa de dag ni/ dka' ba bgyid pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de ni/ nam mkha' sgom
112b1(khri brgyad): pa lags te/ nam mkha' la ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims
112b2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ma mchis/ nam mkha' la ni/ gzugs kyang ma mchis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang ma mchis/ nam
112b3(khri brgyad): mkha' la ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyang ma mchis/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang ma mchis/ nam mkha' la ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu
112b4(khri brgyad): 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams kyang ma mchis/ nam mkha' la ni/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
112b5(khri brgyad): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ nam mkha' la ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis/ de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra
112b6(khri brgyad): bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyang ma mchis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis sems
112b7(khri brgyad): can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni/ nam mkha'i slad du brtson par 'tshal ba dang / 'bad par 'tshal ba dang / rtsol bar 'tshal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag sems can rnams kyi
113a1(khri brgyad): slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni/ nam mkha' yongs su grol bar 'tshal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis
113a2(khri brgyad): nam mkha' lta bu'i chos thams cad kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni/ go cha chen po 'tshal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag gis sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha chen po 'tshal ba de dag
113a3(khri brgyad): ni| nam mkha' bar snang la gdeg par 'tshal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
113a4(khri brgyad): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis de lta bu'i
113a5(khri brgyad): go cha 'tshal bde dag la bdag phyag 'tshal lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis 'di lta ste/
113a6(khri brgyad): dper bgyi na/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ mda' rgyu'i tshal lam/ til gyi zhing ltar yongs su gtams par gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis
113a7(khri brgyad): bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par chos bshad par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang sems can tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa dag yongs su smin par mdzad kyang bcom ldan
113b1(khri brgyad): 'das/ sems can gyi khams la ni/ 'grib pa'am/ 'phel bar mi mngon pa'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan
113b2(khri brgyad): 'das/ de bzhin du phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal
113b3(khri brgyad): lam| mda' rgyu'i tshal lam/ til gyi zhing ltar yongs su gtams par gyur cing bzhugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par chos bshad par gyur nas
113b4(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang sems can tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa dag yongs su smin par mdzad kyang / bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gyi khams la ni/ 'grib pa'am/ 'phel bar mi
113b5(khri brgyad): mngon lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ bdag gis 'di skad du/ byang chub sems
113b6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/ nam mkha' yongs su grol bar
113b7(khri brgyad): 'tshal ba lags so/ /zhes gsol to/ /de nas dge slong zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di lta ste/ chos gang yang skye ba'ang med/ 'gag pa'ang med la/ tshul khrims kyi phung po'ang yod/ shes rab kyi phung po
114a1(khri brgyad): dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'ang yod/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang yod/ lan
114a2(khri brgyad): gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyang yod /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/
114a3(khri brgyad): dkon mchog gsum po sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun yang yod/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /snyam
114a4(khri brgyad): mo| |de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor
114a5(khri brgyad): du byed pa de/ gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par bya bar sems pa de ni/
114a6(khri brgyad): nam mkha' la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol
114a7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba ji lta bu zhig bgyi lags/ rab 'byor
114b1(khri brgyad): gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ gang la bsrung pa dang / bskyab pa dang / sba
114b2(khri brgyad): bar bya ba'i chos de ni/ kho bos yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas na/ 'di
114b3(khri brgyad): nyid de la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par 'gyur ro/ /ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral na/ de la mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ byang
114b4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang zhig bsrung pa dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya bar sems pa de ni/ nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar sems
114b5(khri brgyad): pa yin no/ /kau shi ka/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dag bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar nus snyam mam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa
114b6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ de ni/ mi nus so/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa bdag la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang /
114b7(khri brgyad): sba bar bya bar sems pa de'ang 'di ltar mi 'grub pa dang / ngal ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar zad do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa
115a1(khri brgyad): dag bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar nus snyam mam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ mi nus so/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ de bzhin du gang
115a2(khri brgyad): zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag la bsrung pa dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya bar sems pa de'ang 'di ltar mi 'grub pa dang / ngal ba'i skal ba
115a3(khri brgyad): can du 'gyur bar zad do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar
115a4(khri brgyad): nus snyam mam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ mi nus so/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
115a5(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pa bdag la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya bar sems pa de'ang 'di ltar mi 'grub pa dang / ngal ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar zad do/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub
115a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ ji tsam gyis na/ chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / brag ca lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu
115a7(khri brgyad): dang / chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur yongs su shes par 'gyur zhing / de ltar yongs su shes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam
115b1(khri brgyad): bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed cing / sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes bya bar
115b2(khri brgyad): rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
115b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ga lte gzugs rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyi mtshan mar yang rlom
115b4(khri brgyad): sems su mi byed na/ rmi lam du rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed cing /
115b5(khri brgyad): sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin
115b6(khri brgyad): du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam
115b7(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi
116a1(khri brgyad): byed| rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed na/ rmi lam rlom sems su mi
116a2(khri brgyad): byed| rmi lam bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed cing / sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul
116a3(khri brgyad): pa bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed pa yin no/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
116a4(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris
116a5(khri brgyad): dang | tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dag thogs te bcom ldan
116a6(khri brgyad): 'das ga la ba de logs su mngon par 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod
116a7(khri brgyad): do| |de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis shar phyogs na sangs rgyas stong
116b1(khri brgyad): rnam pa 'di dag nyid dang / ming 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi mthus dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang / shes
116b2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dag bsam bar gyur to/ /de bzhin
116b3(khri brgyad): du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs mtshams kun na'ang sangs rgyas stong stong rnam pa 'di dag nyid dang / ming 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston cing / sangs
116b4(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi mthus dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dang / lha'i
116b5(khri brgyad): dbang po brgya byin sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dag bsam par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
116b6(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
116b7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas nas kyang sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag bskal pa bzang po 'di la 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
117a1(khri brgyad): p ar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab
117a2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
117a3(khri brgyad): 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rnam pa gang dag dang /
117a4(khri brgyad): rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la
117a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag
117a6(khri brgyad): ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs
117a7(khri brgyad): sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs bcings zhes bya ba dang / grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du
117b1(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / rnam par
117b2(khri brgyad): shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa bcings zhes bya
117b3(khri brgyad): ba dang / grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes
117b4(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
117b5(khri brgyad): bar du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bcings zhes bya ba dang / grol zhes bya bar chos ston
117b6(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na
117b7(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar chos ston par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs
118a1(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par dag go / zhes shin tu rnam par dag ba'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
118a2(khri brgyad): par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go / zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag go /zhes
118a3(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yongs su dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan
118a4(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes
118a5(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
118a6(khri brgyad): kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ gzugs yongs su dag
118a7(khri brgyad): pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad
118b1(khri brgyad): du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha
118b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa
118b3(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ gzugs yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag
118b4(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
118b5(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar du skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa yin
118b6(khri brgyad): no| |rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji
118b7(khri brgyad): ltar na/ nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' ni/ skye
119a1(khri brgyad): ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir yongs su dag pa ste/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' gos pa
119a2(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ nam mkha' gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab
119a3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag
119a4(khri brgyad): pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ nam mkha' gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom
119a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' smra ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
119a6(khri brgyad): 'das| ji ltar na/ nam mkha' smra ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta
119a7(khri brgyad): ste| dper na/ brag ca gnyis kyi sgra ji lta ba de bzhin du rab 'byor nam mkha' smra ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
119b1(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
119b2(khri brgyad): ji ltar na/ nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha'
119b3(khri brgyad): la ni/ rab tu brjod pa gang yang med de/ de ltar na/ nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ nam mkha' dmigs
119b4(khri brgyad): su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du
119b5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' la ni/ ci'ang dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na
119b6(khri brgyad): nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye ba med pa
119b7(khri brgyad): dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang
120a1(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang /
120a2(khri brgyad): kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
120a3(khri brgyad): par du shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab
120a4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun
120a5(khri brgyad): nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ chos
120a6(khri brgyad): thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su ma mchis pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par
120a7(khri brgyad): byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
120b1(khri brgyad): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
120b2(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub bar bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la ni/ mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i
120b3(khri brgyad): nad dang / lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /yid kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /lus ngal bar mi
120b4(khri brgyad): 'gyur lags so/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ gshis ngan du 'gum par mi 'gyur lags so/ /de'i slad bzhin du chos nyan par 'tshal ba'i lha stong phrag mang po dag kyang
