120b5(khri brgyad): 'brang bar 'gyur lags so/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur lags so/ /gang na dam pa'i
120b6(khri brgyad): chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di smra bar bgyid pa der lha'i tshogs mang po dag kyang
120b7(khri brgyad): 'du bar 'gyur lags so/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di smra bar bgyid pa de ni/ bsod nams mang du bskyed bar 'gyur te/ bsod nams dpag tu ma
121a1(khri brgyad): mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa dag bskyed par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
121a2(khri brgyad): de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smra bar
121a3(khri brgyad): byed pa de ni/ bsod nams dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa dag bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta
121a4(khri brgyad): ste| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rin po che yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la brten na/ sems can dmyal ba las thar
121a5(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten las thar par 'gyur ro/ /mi dbul po las thar par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs shing sA la
121a6(khri brgyad): chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar
121a7(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab
121b1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang
121b2(khri brgyad): chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub skyed par byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
121b3(khri brgyad): rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de la brten nas rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang / khyim bdag gi rigs
121b4(khri brgyad): shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
121b5(khri brgyad): byed kyi lha rnams yod pa dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams yod pa dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs 'khor dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang /
121b6(khri brgyad): tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams dang / shin tu mthong dang / gya nom snang dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / 'og min
121b7(khri brgyad): gyi lha rnams dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar
122a1(khri brgyad): 'gro ba'i lha rnams yod pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra
122a2(khri brgyad): bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsam gtan bzhi yod pa dang / tshad med pa
122a3(khri brgyad): bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes
122a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
122a5(khri brgyad): dang / lam rnams yod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid yod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa dang / stobs bcu yod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
122a6(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa'i phyir te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
122a7(khri brgyad): 'di las de dag la sogs pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan pas na/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rin po che zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi
122b1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la ni/ skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su bzung ba'am/ dor ba'i chos gang yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
122b2(khri brgyad): ltar| gang dag skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su bzung ba'am/ 'dor bar bya ba'i chos de dag med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ shes
122b3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni/ dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa med pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'am/ nyon
122b4(khri brgyad): mongs pa dang bcas pa'am/ nyon mongs pa med pa'am/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med do/ /rab
122b5(khri brgyad): 'byor| rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ nor bu rin po che yin te/ rab 'byor/ pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de ni/ chos gang gis kyang ma gos pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
122b6(khri brgyad): ltar| gang gis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos de/ dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ des na/ pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di ni/ gos pa med pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
122b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te de ltar 'du shes par yang mi byed/ de ltar rnam par rtog par yang mi byed/ de ltar dmigs par yang mi byed/ de ltar
123a1(khri brgyad): spros par yang mi byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
123a2(khri brgyad): mthong ba yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi
123a3(khri brgyad): zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song nas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rab 'byor/
123a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang yang thob par byed pa ma yin/ ston par byed pa ma yin/ 'dzin par byed pa ma yin/ sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ skyed par byed pa ma
123a5(khri brgyad): yin| 'gog par byed pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa ma yin/ rnam par byang bar byed pa ma yin/ 'grib par byed pa ma yin/ 'phel bar byed pa ma yin/ 'das
123a6(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed
123a7(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma yin/ gnas par byed pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa'ang ma yin/ gnas par byed pa'ang ma
123b1(khri brgyad): yin| sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha
123b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nying stong
123b3(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/ de bzhin du
123b4(khri brgyad): yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang | dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma
123b5(khri brgyad): yin| stobs bcu sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
123b6(khri brgyad): brgyad sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/ lan gcig phyir 'ong
123b7(khri brgyad): ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed
124a1(khri brgyad): pha'ang ma yin no/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/
124a2(khri brgyad): so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar
124a3(khri brgyad): byed pa'ang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dus
124a4(khri brgyad): byas kyi khams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin no/ /'dus ma byas kyi khams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin na/ /de
124a5(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul 'di ni/ gnas pa nyid de/ de de bzhin
124a6(khri brgyad): gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par thugs su chud de/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ba dang /
124a7(khri brgyad): rnam par 'grel ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas lha'i bu 'bum phrag rab tu mang po dag steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas ca co dang / ga zha
124b1(khri brgyad): 'don cing / lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+dA ra ba dag gis gtor nas 'di skad du/ a la la dzam+bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis
124b2(khri brgyad): bskor ba 'di mthong ngo / /zhes tshig tu'ang brjod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa na/ de las lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de
124b3(khri brgyad): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos
124b4(khri brgyad): gang yang 'jug par bya ba'am/ ldog par bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin pas/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa'ang ma yin/ gcig pa'ang ma yin no/ /
124b5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang yang 'jug par bgyi'am/ ldog par bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags
124b6(khri brgyad): pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
124b7(khri brgyad): de bzhin du bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /nang stong pa nyid ni/ nang stong pa nyid
125a1(khri brgyad): kyis stong ngo / /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/ dran
125a2(khri brgyad): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams ni/ lam
125a3(khri brgyad): gyis stong ngo / /stobs bcu ni/ stobs bcus stong ngo / /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi
125a4(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo / /de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
125a5(khri brgyad): 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
125a6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ che ba lags te/ chos thams cad kyang chos thams
125a7(khri brgyad): cad kyi rang bzhin gyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
125b1(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'ang chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis shing / chos kyi 'khor lo'ang bskor la chos gang yang 'jug par bgyid pa'am/ ldog par
125b2(khri brgyad): bgyid pa'ang ma mchis te/ chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba'ang ma mchis la/ chos gang yang yongs su ma mthong ba'ang ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar /gang 'jug
125b3(khri brgyad): pa'am/ ldog pa'i chos de dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ 'di ltar/ chos thams cad gtan mngon par ma grub pa lags pas/ stong pa nyid ni/ 'jug par bgyid pa'am/
125b4(khri brgyad): ldog par bgyid pa ma lags la/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'ang 'jug par bgyid pa'am/ ldog par bgyid pa ma lags so/ /de ltar na/ gang shes rab kyi pha
125b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / brjod pa dang / gdags pa dang / 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'grel ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / smos pa dang / gsal bar bgyid
125b6(khri brgyad): pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa lags so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de'ang sus kyang ma bstan/
125b7(khri brgyad): sus kyang ma bzung lags so/ /gang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni/ sus kyang mngon sum du ma bgyis lags so/ /gang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung / sus
126a1(khri brgyad): kyang mngon sum du ma bgyis pa de la ni/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa su'ang ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la su'ang sbyin gnas su 'gyur ba'ang ma
126a2(khri brgyad): mchis lags so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ gnas med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das
126a3(khri brgyad): la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ /ma mchis pa lags so/ /
126a4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu
126a5(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di ni/ mnyam pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad dmigs su med par mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
126a6(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dben pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha'
126a7(khri brgyad): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rdzi ba ma mchis pa lags
126b1(khri brgyad): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha
126b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ gzhi ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming med pa dang / lus med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
126b3(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ nam mkha' lta bu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dmigs su med
126b4(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ brjod du ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan
126b5(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
126b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ ming ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
126b7(khri brgyad): pa'i phung po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'gro ba ma mchis pa
127a1(khri brgyad): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta
127a2(khri brgyad): ste| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mi 'phrog pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab
127a3(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bas pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos
127a4(khri brgyad): thams cad shin tu byang zhing zad pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ skye ba ma
127a5(khri brgyad): mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
127a6(khri brgyad): 'das| 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byed pa po ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigs su
127a7(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ shes pa po ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom
127b1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
127b2(khri brgyad): ni| 'pho ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di
127b3(khri brgyad): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'jig pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'jig
127b4(khri brgyad): pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rmi lam lta bu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
127b5(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmi lam rmis pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa
127b6(khri brgyad): 'di ni/ brag ca lta bu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgra'i brjod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/
127b7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mig yor lta bu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs brnyan dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
128a1(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ smig rgyu lta bu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
128a2(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
128a3(khri brgyad): ni| sgyu ma lta bu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes
128a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ gti mug ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab
128a5(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan
128a6(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
128a7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yod par mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
128b1(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ gnas ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
128b2(khri brgyad): chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dmigs su ma
128b3(khri brgyad): mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
128b4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ spros pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
128b5(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rlom sems ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
128b6(khri brgyad): pa| rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
128b7(khri brgyad): ni| g.yo ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas ba nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di
129a1(khri brgyad): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dod chags dang bral ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos
129a2(khri brgyad): thams cad ma nor ba de bzhin nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
129a3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ kun nas ldang ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir
129a4(khri brgyad): ro| |rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ zhi ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
129a5(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med cing dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
129a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dod chags ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags kyi mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab
129a7(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ zhe sdang ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
129b1(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// //'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po sum cu pa/ rab 'byor gyis gsol
129b2(khri brgyad): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ gti mug ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gti mug
129b3(khri brgyad): gi mun pa rnam par sel ba nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ nyon mongs pa ma
129b4(khri brgyad): mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yongs su rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
129b5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sems can ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis
129b6(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ tshad ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos
129b7(khri brgyad): thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtha' gnyis su
130a1(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
130a2(khri brgyad): 'das| 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ ma 'dres pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dres pa med pa'i
130a3(khri brgyad): phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ nag nog ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan
130a4(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab
130a5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rnam par mi rtog pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
130a6(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ tshad ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
130a7(khri brgyad): pa| chos thams cad kyi tshad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/
130b1(khri brgyad): nam mkha' lta bu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
130b2(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mi rtag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir
130b3(khri brgyad): ro| |rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sdug bsngal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
130b4(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ chos thams cad lhag par chags par bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha
130b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bdag ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
130b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang
130b7(khri brgyad): bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtshan nyid ma mchis
131a1(khri brgyad): pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
131a2(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos rnams dmigs su med
131a3(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ phyi stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan
131a4(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol
131a5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi dang / nang gi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol
131a6(khri brgyad): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong
131a7(khri brgyad): pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chen po stong
131b1(khri brgyad): pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes
131b2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /
131b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
131b4(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin
131b5(khri brgyad): pa 'di ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
131b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha'
131b7(khri brgyad): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ thog ma
132a1(khri brgyad): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /
132a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
132a3(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha
132a4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyis chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab
132a5(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
132a6(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
132a7(khri brgyad): pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab
132b1(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
132b2(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa
132b3(khri brgyad): 'di ni| dngos po med pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
132b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
132b5(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
132b6(khri brgyad): pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di
132b7(khri brgyad): lta ste| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos
133a1(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ yang dag
133a2(khri brgyad): par spong ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
133a3(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs
133a4(khri brgyad): su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dbang po lags so/ /bcom ldan
133a5(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu
133a6(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di ni/ stobs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
133a7(khri brgyad): 'das| 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag
133b1(khri brgyad): bdun dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ lam lags so/ /bcom
133b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
133b3(khri brgyad): pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lta bar gyur pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
133b4(khri brgyad): 'das| 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dmigs su
133b5(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ smon pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom
133b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin
133b7(khri brgyad): pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
134a1(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ snyoms par 'jug pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
134a2(khri brgyad): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
134a3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam dmigs
134a4(khri brgyad): su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
134a5(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ser sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/
134a6(khri brgyad): tshul khrims lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di
134a7(khri brgyad): lta ste| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bzod pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnod sems dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
134b1(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ le
134b2(khri brgyad): lo dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan lags so/ /
134b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ g.yeng ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu
134b4(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di ni/ shes rab lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chal pa'i shes rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
134b5(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ stobs bcu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad dmigs
134b6(khri brgyad): su dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mi 'jigs pa lags so/ /
134b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zhum pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
135a1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams cad du ye shes chags pa
135a2(khri brgyad): med cing thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ snying rje chen po lags so/ /
135a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
135a4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
135a5(khri brgyad): las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ de bzhin nyid lags
135a6(khri brgyad): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brjod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab
135a7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rab byung lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol
135b1(khri brgyad): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam
135b2(khri brgyad): pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ dmigs su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grags pa de dag kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba la
135b3(khri brgyad): lhag par bya ba byas pa yin la/ gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grags par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed cing /
135b4(khri brgyad): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yin no/ /gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs la bklags shing kun
135b5(khri brgyad): chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang
135b6(khri brgyad): pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs la bklags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa de dag gis ni/ sangs rgyas mang po
136a1(khri brgyad): dag la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mi skrag mi
136a2(khri brgyad): dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la'ang yongs su zhu ba byas pa yin
136a3(khri brgyad): no| |gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni/ bskal pa bye ba phrag mang po dag nas sbyin
136a4(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad cing / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa yin no/ /snyam mo/ /
136a5(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
136a6(khri brgyad): zab mo 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur la/ 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du'ang brtson par bgyid pa'i rigs kyi
136a7(khri brgyad): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji lta ba de ltar gzung bar bgyi lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
136b1(khri brgyad): 'das/ 'di ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ zab lags te/ sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag lam spyad pa dag gis ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
136b2(khri brgyad): mos par rngo mi thogs pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs
136b3(khri brgyad): kyi bu mo de dag gis ni/ sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
136b4(khri brgyad): kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la dad pa ma mchis pa dang / dga' ba ma mchis pa dang / dang ba ma mchis pas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag
136b5(khri brgyad): gis sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la 'di skad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni/ ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus
136b6(khri brgyad): dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni/ ji ltar spyod par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid la ni/ ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ phyi stong pa nyid la ni/ ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/
136b7(khri brgyad): phyi nang stong pa nyid la ni/ ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la ni/ ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ni/ ji ltar bsgom
137a1(khri brgyad): par bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams la ni/ ji ltar
137a2(khri brgyad): bsgom par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ni/ ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
137a3(khri brgyad): 'dres pa rnams la ni/ ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongs su zhu ba ma bgyis pa'i slad du'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras
137a4(khri brgyad): so| |btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar ngo mtshar yang ci che ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ shin tu zab pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sngon gyi mthar
137a5(khri brgyad): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par ma gyur pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan
137a6(khri brgyad): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos par ma gyur pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la mos par ma gyur pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mos par ma gyur
137a7(khri brgyad): pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mos par ma gyur pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par
137b1(khri brgyad): shes pa lnga dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos par ma gyur pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong bar byed pa ni/ ngo mtshar mi che'o/ /btsun pa
137b2(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba yin pas na/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab
137b3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ gang
137b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di ltar/ sangs rgyas
137b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las nges par byung la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam pa thams cad
137b6(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis rab tu bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi
137b7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed par 'dod pa dang / bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa
138a1(khri brgyad): thams cad yang dag par 'joms par 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa
138a2(khri brgyad): dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ /de bzhin du sems can rnams rgyun
138a3(khri brgyad): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa
138a4(khri brgyad): dang / rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang / sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun yongs
138a5(khri brgyad): su bsdu bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
138a6(khri brgyad): 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
138a7(khri brgyad): pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na/ rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na/ bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha
138b1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na/ rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/ nang stong pa nyid la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/
138b2(khri brgyad): ji ltar na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi
138b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes
138b4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sangs
138b5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
138b6(khri brgyad): to| |kau shi ka / gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni/ legs so/ /legs so/ /kau shi ka/ khyod kyi spobs pa skyes pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin
138b7(khri brgyad): te| kau shi ka/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
139a1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gzugs la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin
139a2(khri brgyad): du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe rnam par shes pa la rnal
139a3(khri brgyad): 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin du mig la mi gnas/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mi gnas te/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal
139a4(khri brgyad): 'byor du byed do/ /de bzhin du gzugs la mi gnas/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la mi gnas te/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal
139a5(khri brgyad): 'byor du byed do/ /de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang /
139a6(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas
139a7(khri brgyad): par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du
139b1(khri brgyad): byed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
139b2(khri brgyad): rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /tshad
139b3(khri brgyad): med pa bzhi la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par
139b4(khri brgyad): shes pa lnga la mi gnas/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi gnas par shes
139b5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ gang la gnas pa dang / gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa'i gzugs de dmigs su med pa dang / de bzhin
139b6(khri brgyad): du gang la gnas pa dang / gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched
139b7(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi
140a1(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/
140a2(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed de/ gang gi phyir gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de
140a3(khri brgyad): bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed de/ gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar rnam par
140a4(khri brgyad): shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
140a5(khri brgyad): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
140a6(khri brgyad): 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor bar mi byed de/ gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la
140a7(khri brgyad): rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gzugs sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ gzugs phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/
140b1(khri brgyad): gzugs da ltar byung bar mi dmigs shing / de bzhin du tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar
140b2(khri brgyad): mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa da ltar byung bar mi dmigs la/ de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang
140b3(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
140b4(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ da ltar byung bar mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
140b5(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ zab pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab
140b6(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir /
140b7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /
141a1(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
141a2(khri brgyad): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin no/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha
141a3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa ni/ gting dpag dka' ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gzugs gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
141a4(khri brgyad): gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
141a5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams
141a6(khri brgyad): dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas
141a7(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ / shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi
141b1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ tshad ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin
141b2(khri brgyad): no| |shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin
141b3(khri brgyad): du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
141b4(khri brgyad): dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
141b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa tshad med pa yin no/ / shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/
141b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te gzugs zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
141b7(khri brgyad): spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de
142a1(khri brgyad): bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
142a2(khri brgyad): dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi
142a3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
142a4(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel
142a5(khri brgyad): par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so
142a6(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no/ /zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/
142a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te gzugs gting
142b1(khri brgyad): dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka'
142b2(khri brgyad): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin
142b3(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs
142b4(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar/ gzugs kyi
142b5(khri brgyad): gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de
142b6(khri brgyad): ni| rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams
142b7(khri brgyad): cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi
143a1(khri brgyad): gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no/ /zhes bya bar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
143a2(khri brgyad): pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/
143a3(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te gzugs tshad med do/ /zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
143a4(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa tshad med do/ /zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
143a5(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar/ gzugs kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
143a6(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par
143a7(khri brgyad): 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so
143b1(khri brgyad): so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no/ /zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod pa na/
143b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi
143b3(khri brgyad): chos rnams ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ de tsam du zab pa dang / de tsam du gting dpag dka' ba
143b4(khri brgyad): dang / de tsam du rtogs par dka' ba dang / de tsam du tshad ma mchis pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang
143b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mdun du bshad par mi bgyi ste/ de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na/ skrag cing / dngang la dngang bar 'gyur
143b6(khri brgyad): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du bshad par bgyi ste/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
143b7(khri brgyad): 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang la/ dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing / nem nur bgyid par mi 'gyur/ the tshom 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba'i steng du thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur lags
144a1(khri brgyad): so| |de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub
144a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad na/ nyes pa cir 'gyur/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ kau shi ka/ theg pa la
144a3(khri brgyad): gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad par gyur na/ skrag cing dngang la/ dngang bar
144a4(khri brgyad): 'gyur zhing / phyir ldog pa dang / phyir spong bar 'gyur te/ mos par mi 'gyur la/ kau shi ka/ gang gi phyir theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
144a5(khri brgyad): chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ phyir spong zhing / log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i las gsog par 'gyur te/ yun ring pos kyang bla na med pa yang dag
144a6(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba'i gnas de yod do/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
144a7(khri brgyad): chen po lung ma bstan pa gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba lta yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ kau shi
144b1(khri brgyad): ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni/ ring po mi thogs
144b2(khri brgyad): par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/ gnyis las mi 'da' ba'i bar gyis bla na
144b3(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ de de
144b4(khri brgyad): bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang par mi
144b5(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba'i steng du thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed cing / ji skad bstan pa bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par 'gyur
144b6(khri brgyad): ba de dag ni/ yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs shing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa yin no/ /de nas bcom
144b7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dpe brjod par bdag shin tu spobs lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag spobs lags
145a1(khri brgyad): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ khyod spobs par gyis shig/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/
145a2(khri brgyad): dper bgyi na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo zhig gi g.yar lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / bsam
145a3(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
145a4(khri brgyad): pa la sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la mchis pa'i bar dag rmis par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
145a5(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa lags par rig par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag sad pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
145a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang /
145a7(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang byang chub kyi snying po la mchis shing chos kyi
145b1(khri brgyad): 'khor lo bskor bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ba lta smes kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
145b2(khri brgyad): 'das| rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mnyan pa'i slad du rnyed cing / thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du sgrub par bgyid pa de dag
145b3(khri brgyad): ni| dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang
145b4(khri brgyad): ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni/ yun ring po nas theg pa la zhugs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / sangs rgyas
145b5(khri brgyad): mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
145b6(khri brgyad): kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed par 'gyur zhing / rnyed par gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul
145b7(khri brgyad): bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du nye ba'am/ lung bstan par 'gyur ba'am/ bla
146a1(khri brgyad): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ mi zhig 'brog
146a2(khri brgyad): dgon pa dpag tshad brgya pa zhig nas byung bar gyur tam/ 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad nyis brgya pa zhig nas sam/ dpag tshad sum brgya pa zhig nas sam/ dpag tshad bzhi brgya pa
146a3(khri brgyad): zhig nas sam/ dpag tshad lnga brgya pa zhig nas byung bar gyur nas de byung ba'i tshe grong khyer gyi snga ltas ba lang rdzi dag gam/ phyugs rdzi dag gam/ sa mtshams sam/ kun
146a4(khri brgyad): dga' ra ba'am/ tshal dag gam/ skyed mos tshal dag mthong bar gyur tam/ grong khyer gyi snga ltas grong dag gam/ grong rdal dag gam/ ljongs dag gam/ yul 'khor dag
146a5(khri brgyad): gam/ mtshan ma gzhan gang yang rung ba dag mthong bar gyur na/ de 'di snyam du/ snga ltas 'di lta bu 'di dag gda' ba las na/ 'di nas grong dang / grong rdal dang / grong khyer
146a6(khri brgyad): dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang nye bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas dbugs phyin par 'gyur zhing / de la slan chad chom rkun gyis 'jigs pa'am/ gdug pas 'jigs
146a7(khri brgyad): ba'am/ gdol pas 'jigs pa'am/ gcan gzan khro bos 'jigs pa'am/ bkres pa dang / skom pas 'jigs pa dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
146b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rnyed par 'gyur zhing / rnyed par gyur nas kyang 'dzin par bgyid/ 'chang bar
146b2(khri brgyad): bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ kun chub par bgyid/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ lung bstan du nye ba dang /
146b3(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang ring po mi thogs par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar rig par bgyi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
146b4(khri brgyad): po des nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sas 'jigs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' po des 'di lta ste/
146b5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba rnyed cing mnyan du rnyed de/ snga ltas de dag mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces
146b6(khri brgyad): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus
146b7(khri brgyad): khyod shin tu spobs par gyis shig/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po lta 'tshal bar gyur nas de rgya mtsho chen po blta
147a1(khri brgyad): ba'i slad du mchis na/ ji lta ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po blta ba'i slad du mchis pa de lta de ltar des yal ga gel ba'am/ yal ga gel ba'i mtshan ma'am/
147a2(khri brgyad): ri'am| ri'i mtshan ma dag mthong bar gyur na/ des 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po ni/ 'di nas thag ring ste/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ 'di nas thag nye ba ma lags so/ /snyam du rig par bgyi'o//
147a3(khri brgyad): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po dang nye ba na yal ga gel pa'am/ yal ga gel ba'i mtshan ma'am/ ri'am/ ri'i mtshan ma dag ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
147a4(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po lta 'tshal bar gyur nas ji lta ji ltar mchis pa de lta de ltar des yal ga gel pa'am/ yal ga gel ba'i mtshan ma'am/ ri'am/
147a5(khri brgyad): ri'i mtshan ma dag ma mthong bar gyur na/ de 'di snyam du/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ 'di nas thag mi ring ngo / /snyam du sems par 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po
147a6(khri brgyad): dang nye ba na yal ga gel pa'am/ yal ga gel ba'i mtshan ma'am/ ri'am/ ri'i mtshan ma dag mi gda' ba'i slad du'o/ /mi de'i mig gis rgya mtsho chen po ma mthong du lags
147a7(khri brgyad): kyang / des bdag ni/ rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar gyur te/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ 'di nas thag nye'o/ /rgya mtsho chen po ni/ 'di nas thag mi ring ngo / /zhes bgyi bar nges par rtogs lags
147b1(khri brgyad): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub
147b2(khri brgyad): par bgyid pa des kyang 'di ltar rig par bgyi zhing / 'di ltar bsam par bgyi ste/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa 'di snyed cig gam/ bskal pa brgya phrag 'di snyed cig gam/
147b3(khri brgyad): bskal pa stong phrag 'di snyed cig gam/ bskal pa 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig gam/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
147b4(khri brgyad): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes mngon sum du lung ma bstan kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
147b5(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du nye ba lags so/ /snyam du rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar/ bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta zhing mnyan du rnyed la/
147b6(khri brgyad): thos nas kyang bzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyir mchis so/ /snyam du sems pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
147b7(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ dpyid byung ste/ yal ga gel pa rnams kyi lo ma dang / 'dab ma lhags par gyur pa na/ dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis 'di ltar/ da ni/ ring po mi
148a1(khri brgyad): thogs par lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam du rig par bgyi lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar yal ga
148a2(khri brgyad): gel pa rnams la snga ltas de dag gda' ba'i slad du ste/ dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis yal ga gel ba rnams la snga ltas de dag mthong nas 'di snyam du/ da ni/ ring po mi thogs par
148a3(khri brgyad): lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas yid dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
148a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / mnyan pa'i slad du rnyed cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par bgyid/ 'chang bar bgyid/ klog par bgyid/
148a5(khri brgyad): kun chub par bgyid/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa lags par
148a6(khri brgyad): rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa lags par rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom
148a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang 'di snyam du/ gang gi slad du bdag cag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rnyed cing bltar
148b1(khri brgyad): mchis pa dang / mnyan du mchis pa dang / phyag bgyir mchis pa dang / ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgrub tu mchis pa las na/ bdag cag ni/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa
148b2(khri brgyad): ba dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsnyen pa lags so/ /snyam du rig par bgyi lags so/ /de nas gang dag sngon sangs rgyas mthong bar gyur pa'i lha'i bu dag 'di
148b3(khri brgyad): snyam du/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la'ang lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i snga ltas 'di lta bu de dag byung bar gyur pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
148b4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po 'di dag kyang ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang /
148b5(khri brgyad): yid bde ba skye lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ bud med sbrum pa ni/ ji lta ji ltar bu btsa' bar nye ba de lta de ltar de'i lus 'gyur te/ lus ngal ba'i tshor pa
148b6(khri brgyad): chen po skye ba dang / 'chag par mi bgyid pa dang / dran pa chung ba dang / g.yar zas kyi dad chung ba dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid chung ba dang / tshor ba de lta bu dag byung bas smra ba nyung ba dang /
148b7(khri brgyad): des sngon tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyis shing bsten pa dang / lan mang du bgyis shing kun tu bsten pas/ 'di lta bu'i tshor ba 'di dag nyams su myong ngo / /snyam du rtogs nas mi sten
149a1(khri brgyad): pa'i ngang tshul can du 'gyur zhing / bud med gzhan dag gis kyang bud med de'i mtshan ma gang lags pa de dag mthong nas 'di snyam du/ bud med 'di ni/ ring
149a2(khri brgyad): po mi thogs par bu btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes rtogs par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/
149a3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa/ spyod pa legs par spyad pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa dag shes rab kyi pha
149a4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rnyed cing / rnyed nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
149a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
149a6(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ khyod spobs pa skyes pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin te/ shA ri'i bu/ legs so/ /legs so// //shes rab kyi pha
149a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po sum cu rtsa gcig pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/
149b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la sman btags pa ni/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom
149b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten
149b3(khri brgyad): la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa yin te/ byang chub sems
149b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag spyad pa spyod pa na/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don mthun pa dang / don spyod pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa'
149b5(khri brgyad): stong phrag mang po dag la phan 'dogs shing / sems can rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa
149b6(khri brgyad): bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing / bdag kyang chos de dag la gnas par byed do/ /bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
149b7(khri brgyad): spyod cing / gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go /bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
150a1(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / gzhan dag kyang shes rab kyi pha
150a2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten cing / thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god
150a3(khri brgyad): par byed kyang bdag nyid kyis mngon sum du ni/ mi byed do/ /de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang
