212a4(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa gang yin pa de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
212a5(khri brgyad): nyid dmigs snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na/ chos thams
212a6(khri brgyad): cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di dag ni/ chos thams cad
212a7(khri brgyad): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du de bzhin
212b1(khri brgyad): gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
212b2(khri brgyad): pa ste| rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni/ bsam gyis mi lang ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal gyis mi lang ba'i
212b3(khri brgyad): phyir gzhal du med pa dang / dpag gis mi la'ang ba'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / bgrang gis mi lang ba'i phyir grangs med pa dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa med pa'i phyir mi
212b4(khri brgyad): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang /
212b5(khri brgyad): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni/ bsam pa las 'das pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa
212b6(khri brgyad): dang / gzhal ba las 'das pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa dang / tshad las 'das pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / bgrang pa las 'das pa'i phyir grangs med pa dang / mnyam pa dang mi
212b7(khri brgyad): mnyam pa las 'das pa'i phyir mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba de ni/ bsam gyis mi lang ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /rab
213a1(khri brgyad): 'byor| gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gzhal gyis mi lang pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /rab 'byor/ dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba de ni/ tshad med pa'i tshig bla dwags
213a2(khri brgyad): so| |rab 'byor/ grangs med pa zhes bya ba de ni/ grangs las 'das pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /rab 'byor/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba de ni/ mnyam pa med pa dang mnyam
213a3(khri brgyad): pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / dpag tu med pa
213a4(khri brgyad): dang / grangs med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du
213a5(khri brgyad): gzhal du med pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs
213a6(khri brgyad): pa'i chos rnams ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin te/ de dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang
213a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang bsam pa'am/ gzhal ba'am/ dpag pa'am/ bgrang bar mi nus te/ de ltar na/ sangs rgyas rnams kyang
213b1(khri brgyad): dpag tu med la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang dpag tu med do/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / mi mnyam pa
213b2(khri brgyad): dang mnyam pa'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya ni/ len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dge slong ma nyis stong yang len
213b3(khri brgyad): pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dge bsnyen drug khri ni/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /dge bsnyen ma sum
213b4(khri brgyad): khri'ang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go / byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/ de dag kyang bcom ldan
213b5(khri brgyad): 'das kyis skal pa bzang po 'di nyid la sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar lung bstan to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bzhi
213b6(khri brgyad): bcu rtsa gsum pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ zab
213b7(khri brgyad): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bgyid pa chen pos nye bar gnas pa lags so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bgyid pa mtshungs pa ma mchis
214a1(khri brgyad): pa dang / bgyid pa dpag tu ma mchis pa dang / bgyid pa grangs ma mchis pa dang / bgyid pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas pa lags so/ /
214a2(khri brgyad): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/
214a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byed pa chen pos nye bar gnas pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byed pa mtshungs pa med pa dang /
214a4(khri brgyad): byed pa dpag tu med pa dang / byed pa grangs med pa dang / byed pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha
214a5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa drug 'dus pa dang / rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir nang stong pa nyid 'dus pa dang / dngos po
214a6(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'dus pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga
214a7(khri brgyad): dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dus pa dang / rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
214b1(khri brgyad): 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dus pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dus pa
214b2(khri brgyad): dang / rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir sangs rgyas kyi sa 'dus pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag 'dus pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta
214b3(khri brgyad): ste| dper na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ yul gyi mi rnams la mthu che zhing dbang thob pa'i rgyal po'i bya ba dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyi bya ba ci yod pa de
214b4(khri brgyad): dag thams cad blon po byed du bcug na/ rgyal po'i bya ba'am/ yul gyi mi'i bya ba de dag la rgyal po snying las chung zhing khur bor ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du nyan thos kyi
214b5(khri brgyad): chos rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang ci'ang rung ba de dag thams cad ni/ shes rab kyi pha
214b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ de dag gi bya ba byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang
214b7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byed pa chen pos nye bar gnas pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byed pa mtshungs pa med pa dang / byed pa dpag tu med pa
215a1(khri brgyad): dang / byed pa grangs med pa dang / byed pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ shes rab
215a2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/ gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa med cing / mngon par zhen pa med par nye bar gnas pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
215a3(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med cing / mngon par zhen pa med par nye bar gnas pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la yongs su
215a4(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa med cing / mngon par zhen pa med par nye bar gnas pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yongs su 'dzin pa med cing / mngon par zhen pa med par nye bar
215a5(khri brgyad): gnas pa dang / de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag
215a6(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar dag la yongs su 'dzin pa med cing / mngon par zhen pa med par nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
215a7(khri brgyad): 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji ltar gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis shing / mngon par zhen pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ bcom
215b1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ ji ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis shing / mngon par zhen pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags
215b2(khri brgyad): ji ltar bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar dag la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis shing / mngon par zhen pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
215b3(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ khyod kyis gang la yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gang la mngon par zhen pa dang / gang yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gang mngon par zhen pa'i gzugs de
215b4(khri brgyad): yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ rab 'byor/ khyod kyis gang la yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gang la mngon par zhen pa dang / gang yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gang mngon par zhen pa'i
215b5(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/
215b6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ khyod kyis gang la yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gang la mngon par zhen pa dang / gang yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gang mngon par zhen pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
215b7(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ legs so/ /legs
216a1(khri brgyad): so| |rab 'byor/ ngas kyang gang la yongs su 'dzin pa'am/ mngon par zhen pa'am/ gang yongs su 'dzin pa'am/ mngon par zhen pa'i gzugs yang dag
216a2(khri brgyad): par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /rab 'byor/ ngas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas
216a3(khri brgyad): yongs su mi 'dzin to/ /yongs su mi 'dzin pas mngon par zhen pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ ngas kyang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad
216a4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su mi 'dzin te/ yongs su mi 'dzin pas
216a5(khri brgyad): mngon par zhen pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gzugs la yongs su gzung bar mi bya zhing / mngon par zhen
216a6(khri brgyad): par mi bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la yongs su gzung bar mi bya zhing / mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/
216a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la yongs su gzung bar mi bya zhing / mngon par
216b1(khri brgyad): zhen par mi bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
216b2(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di ni/ zab cing mthong bar dka' la rtogs par dka' ste/ brtag par mi nus shing / rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags la/ zhi ba/ zhib mo brtag pa'i mkhas pa dang / mdzangs
216b3(khri brgyad): pa'i rig par bgyi ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos pa de dag ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par
216b4(khri brgyad): bgyi ba bgyis pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa
216b5(khri brgyad): de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed bskyed pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag gnas pa de dag thams
216b6(khri brgyad): cad dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang /
216b7(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas su gyur kyang de dag thams cad kyi shes pa gang lags pa dang / spong ba gang lags pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gdugs gcig bzod pa
217a1(khri brgyad): dang | 'dod pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / dpyod pa dang / rtog pa gang lags pa las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lta bu 'di la 'dod
217a2(khri brgyad): cing bzod pa gang lags pa de nyid/ chos mchog tu gyur pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad
217a3(khri brgyad): pa dang | rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi shes pa dang / spong ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas
217a4(khri brgyad): rnams kyi shes rab dang / spong ba gang lags pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de nas
217a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag/ legs so/ /legs so/ /lha'i bu dag /de de bzhin no/ /de de
217a6(khri brgyad): bzhin te/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa
217a7(khri brgyad): dang | rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa dang / spong ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod pa yin no/ /lha'i bu
217b1(khri brgyad): dag/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos la/ thos nas kyang yi ger 'bri ba dang / bris nas kyang lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed
217b2(khri brgyad): pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar shes par bya'i/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas
217b3(khri brgyad): kyi theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i mdo sde gzhan dag la spyod pa de dag ni/ de ltar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /
217b4(khri brgyad): chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyis gang la bslab par bya ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa
217b5(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang la bslab par bya ba dang / de bzhin
217b6(khri brgyad): g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang la bslab nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
217b7(khri brgyad): pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yang dag phul gyi chos rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las rgya cher
218a1(khri brgyad): bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
218a2(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ che ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtshungs pa ma mchis
218a3(khri brgyad): pa dang | pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu ma mchis pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa grangs ma mchis pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
218a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / brgyad pa rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig
218a5(khri brgyad): phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslab pas nges par byung bar gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
218a6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnams kyis de la bslab pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ni/ bri ba'am/
218a7(khri brgyad): gang ba ma mchis so/ /zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
218b1(khri brgyad): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas dong ste/ de dag ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'dod
218b2(khri brgyad): pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag ni/ 'dod pa'i khams su 'khod do/ /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag ni/ gzugs kyi khams su 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan
218b3(khri brgyad): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma
218b4(khri brgyad): thag tu mos par 'gyur ba de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes
218b5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur te/ zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur la/ de yid rtul bar mi 'gyur zhing / de yid gnyis
218b6(khri brgyad): mi byed la the tshom mi za zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par mngon par dga' ste/ thos nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yid la byed pa 'di nyid
218b7(khri brgyad): dad mi 'bral zhing / 'gro'ang rung / 'ong yang rung / 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung ste/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yid la byed pa de dag mi gtong la/ chos smra bas gang zag de dag
219a1(khri brgyad): gi phyi bzhin du rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'brang ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ba drus ma be'u mi gtong ba bzhin du/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
219a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di/ nam lus la gnas par byas pa dang / zin pa dang / byang ba dang / chub par bklags pa dang / yid
219a3(khri brgyad): kyis brtags pa dang / mthong bas shin tu rtogs par ma gyur gyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i phyir chos smra ba mi gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
219a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i gang zag de ni/ rab 'byor/ mi las shi 'phos nas mir skyes pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs
219a5(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des/ sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bris la/ bris nas kyang glegs bam du chud par byas te me tog dang / bdug pa dang /
219a6(khri brgyad): spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti stang byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par
219a7(khri brgyad): byas pa'i phyir te/ de ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des mi las shi 'phos te mir skyes nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis
219b1(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan de dag dang ldan pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas de nas shi 'phos te 'dir
219b2(khri brgyad): skyes nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos la/ mos nas kyang yi ger 'bri ba dang / bris nas kyang lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du
219b3(khri brgyad): yid la bgyid par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
219b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa'ang de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes te/ shes
219b5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos la/ mos nas kyang yi ger 'bri ba dang / bris nas kyang lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed
219b6(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
219b7(khri brgyad): 'di thos la/ thos nas kyang bzung zhing bcangs la/ kha ton du byas shing tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa'i phyir te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / yid la byed pa de dag gis 'dir
220a1(khri brgyad): skyes so/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos nas mi rnams dang skal ba
220a2(khri brgyad): mnyam par 'dir skyes pa de nyid kyang yon tan de dag dang ldan par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des
220a3(khri brgyad): ni| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su dri ba byas pas na/ de ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'dir skyes pa'i phyir ro//
220a4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sngon gyi mtha' nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma thos la yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni/ mi'i 'jig
220a5(khri brgyad): rten du skyes na/ the tshom can dang / yid rtul bar 'gyur te/ de'i sems zhum par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sngon gyi mtha'
220a6(khri brgyad): nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos la yongs su dri ba byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos na/ the tshom can du mi 'gyur zhing / yid
220a7(khri brgyad): rtul bar mi 'gyur te/ sems zhum par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
220b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang sbyin
220b2(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma thos la yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos na/ the tshom can du 'gyur zhing / yid rtul bar 'gyur
220b3(khri brgyad): te| sems zhum par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i
220b4(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ma thos shing / yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos na/ the tshom can du 'gyur zhing / yid rtul
220b5(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur te/ sems zhum par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ma
220b6(khri brgyad): thos la yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos nas the tshom can du 'gyur zhing / yid rtul bar 'gyur te/ sems zhum par 'gyur ro/ /
220b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga
221a1(khri brgyad): dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma thos sam/ thos nas kyang yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de
221a2(khri brgyad): ni| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos na/ the tshom can du 'gyur zhing / yid rtul bar 'gyur te/ sems kyang zhum par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang
221a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing yongs su dris la/ thos shing yongs su dris nas nyi ma
221a4(khri brgyad): gcig gam/ nyi ma gnyis sam/ nyi ma gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ lnga'am/ drug gam/ nyi ma bcur yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyams su mi len cing mi sgom pa de
221a5(khri brgyad): ni| 'phrog par 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dang yang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
221a6(khri brgyad): chen po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la res 'ga' ni/ 'dun par 'gyur te/ res 'ga' ni/ 'dun par mi 'gyur ba de ni/ 'phrog par 'gyur te/ shing bal
221a7(khri brgyad): gyi 'da' ba bzhin du blo shin tu mi brtan par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ theg pa la yang dag par zhugs nas ring po ma
221b1(khri brgyad): lon pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur ma byas par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'
221b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lung ma mnos/ kha ton du ma byas/ tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma
221b3(khri brgyad): bslab pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha
221b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la ma bslab pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la ma bslab pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la ma bslab pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ma bslab
221b5(khri brgyad): pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam la ma bslab pa dang /
221b6(khri brgyad): mngon par shes pa lnga dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams
221b7(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la ma bslab pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ rab 'byor/ theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa yin par rig par bya ste/
222a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ de dag ni/ dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang ldan pa yin gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / bklag pa dang / lung
222a2(khri brgyad): nod pa dang / bsam gtan du bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya bar mi nus so/ /rab 'byor/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas shes rab
222a3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'bri bar mi byed/ lung nod par mi byed/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
222a4(khri brgyad): zab mo 'di'ang 'dzin par mi byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'dzin par mi byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'ang nyams su
222a5(khri brgyad): mi len pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nyams su mi len pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
222a6(khri brgyad): dang / sa rnam pa 'di gnyis las gcig tu 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni/ sngon gyi mtha'
222a7(khri brgyad): nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger ma bris shing lung ma mnos te/ kha ton du ma byas la tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
222b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'dis kyang yongs su ma zin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyams su ma blangs pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir
222b2(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag sa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ 'dus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bzhi
222b3(khri brgyad): bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o/ / //rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gang gi tshe rgya mtsho'i gru zhig par gyur pa na/ de'i nang na mi 'khod pa dag gis shing ngam/ rkyal pa'am/ mi ro
222b4(khri brgyad): la ma 'jus shing ma bzung na/ rab 'byor/ mi de dag ni/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram du ma phyin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ rgya mtsho'i gru zhig pa na mi gang dag shing
222b5(khri brgyad): ngam| rkyal pa'am/ mi ro la 'ju zhing 'dzin par byed na/ rab 'byor/ mi de dag ni/ rgya mtsho'i nang du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/ bde bar rgya mtsho las rgal bar 'gyur zhing / nye zho med
222b6(khri brgyad): par thang la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang ldan pa ste/ shes
222b7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'bri bar mi byed/ lung nod par mi byed/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ bsam gtan gyi
223a1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
223a2(khri brgyad): phyin pa yi ger 'bri bar mi byed/ lung nod par mi byed/ kha ton du mi byed/ lhag par dmigs par mi byed pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
223a3(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i mdo sde yi ger 'bri bar mi byed/ lung nod par mi byed/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed pa dang / lhag par dmigs par mi byed pa'i gang zag
223a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la zhugs pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ bar ma dor lam du nyon mongs par 'gyur bar rig par bya ste/ de dag ni/ nyan
223a5(khri brgyad): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
223a6(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir dad pa yod pa dang / bzod pa yod pa dang / dang ba yod pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yod pa dang / 'dod pa yod
223a7(khri brgyad): pa dang / mos pa yod pa dang / gtong ba yod pa dang / brtson pa mi gtong ba yod pa de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger 'bri bar byed/ lung nod par byed/
223b1(khri brgyad): kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa dang / bzod pa
223b2(khri brgyad): dang / dang ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / 'dod pa dang / mos pa dang / gtong ba dang / brtson pa mi gtong ba de dag dang / gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin
223b3(khri brgyad): cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du yongs su 'dzin pa de dag bar ma dor nyon mongs par mi 'gyur zhing / de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te sems
223b4(khri brgyad): can rnams yongs su smin par byas shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba la ltos/
223b5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes pa'am/ bud med cig gis bum pa so ma btang / ma bsregs pas chu bcu bar sems na/ rab 'byor/ bum pa de ni/ ring por mi thub ste/
223b6(khri brgyad): myur ba nyid du 'jig cing zhu bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ bum pa so ma btang ba'i phyir te/ de ni/ phyir sa tha mal ba nyid du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/
223b7(khri brgyad): de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod/ bzod pa'ang yod/
224a1(khri brgyad): dga' ba'ang yod/ dang ba'ang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/ 'dod pa'ang yod/ mos pa'ang yod/ gtong ba'ang yod/ brtson pa mi gtong
224a2(khri brgyad): ba'ang yod du zin kyang de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin la/ thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
224a3(khri brgyad): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang / nang
224a4(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma zin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma zin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma zin/ yang dag par
224a5(khri brgyad): spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam gyis yongs su ma zin/ mngon par
224a6(khri brgyad): shes pa lngas yongs su ma zin/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma
224a7(khri brgyad): zin| rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma zin na/ rab 'byor/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag ni/ bar ma dor
224b1(khri brgyad): nyon mongs par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa bar ma dor nyon mongs par 'gyur ba gang yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos
224b2(khri brgyad): kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes pa'am/ bud med gcig gis bum pa so btang bas chu klung ngam/ khron pa'am/ mtsho'am/ mtshe'u'am/
224b3(khri brgyad): lteng ka nas chu bcus na/ rab 'byor/ bum pa de ni/ bde bar khyim du phyin par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang
224b4(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod/ bzod pa'ang yod/ dga' ba'ang yod/ dang ba'ang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/ 'dod pa'ang yod/ mos pa'ang yod/
224b5(khri brgyad): gtong ba'ang yod/ brtson pa mi gtong ba'ang yod la/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin cing thabs la mkhas pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis
224b6(khri brgyad): yongs su zin na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ bar ma dor lam du 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par nyon mongs
224b7(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyur zhing / nye zho med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya
225a1(khri brgyad): mtsho'i gru legs par ma btsoms shing zag lhan ma byas par rdzas kyis lci bar byas te chu la btang na/ rab 'byor/ gru de ni/ bar ma dor nub par 'gyur te/
225a2(khri brgyad): rdzas kyang logs shig /gru'ang logs shig tu 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i tshong pa de ni/ thabs la mi mkhas shing gnod pa chen po dang phrad par 'gyur ba dang / rin po che chen
225a3(khri brgyad): po dag dang bral bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod/ bzod pa'ang
225a4(khri brgyad): yod| dga' ba'ang yod/ dang ba'ang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/ 'dod pa'ang yod/ mos pa'ang yod/ gtong ba'ang yod/ brtson pa mi gtong ba'ang yod du zin kyang
225a5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin la/ thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma zin na/ rab 'byor/
225a6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ bar ma dor nyon mongs par 'gyur te/ don chen po las yongs su nyams shing / 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
225a7(khri brgyad): kyi rin po che'i phung po chen po las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar ma dor nyon mongs par 'gyur ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
225b1(khri brgyad): nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis rgya mtsho'i gru legs par btsems shing zag lhan byas la
225b2(khri brgyad): shin tu sbyangs na/ rab 'byor/ rgya mtsho'i gru de ni/ bar ma dor zhig par mi 'gyur zhing / des gang du bgrod par bya ba der phyin par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
225b3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod/ bzod pa'ang yod/ dga' ba'ang yod/ dang ba'ang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang
225b4(khri brgyad): yod| 'dod pa'ang yod/ mos pa'ang yod/ gtong ba'ang yod/ brtson pa mi gtong ba'ang yod la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas kyang yongs su zin cing / thabs la mkhas pas
225b5(khri brgyad): kyang yongs su zin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis kyang yongs su zin na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ bar ma dor bla na med pa
225b6(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad
225b7(khri brgyad): pa'ang yod/ bzod pa'ang yod/ dga' ba'ang yod/ dang ba'ang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/ 'dod pa'ang yod/ mos pa'ang yod/ gtong ba'ang yod/ brtson pa mi gtong
226a1(khri brgyad): ba'ang yod la/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas kyang yongs su zin cing / thabs la mkhas pas kyang yongs su zin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
226a2(khri brgyad): gyis kyang yongs su zin pa'i phyir te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ nyan thos kyis dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
226a3(khri brgyad): dper na/ mi skyes nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa/ rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa zhig yod de/ de'i lus la rlung las gyur pa'am/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'am/ bad kan las gyur
226a4(khri brgyad): pa'am| 'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad 'ga' zhig byung na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci/ mi de rang dgar ldang ba'i mthu dang ldan nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de
226a5(khri brgyad): ni| ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ ci/ mi de ldang bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mi de ni/ khri las ldang ba'i rdo
226a6(khri brgyad): thogs su lags kyang de ni/ rgas pa de dang / bro nad de dag gis nyams dmas pas/ dpag tshad gcig gi bar ram/ dpag tshad gnyis kyi bar du mchi ba'i mthu'ang ma mchis te/ khri de
226a7(khri brgyad): las ldang ba'i rdo thogs su lags kyang mchi ba'i rdo ni/ mi thogs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
226b1(khri brgyad): po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod/ bzod pa'ang yod/ dga' ba'ang yod/ dang ba'ang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/ 'dod pa'ang
226b2(khri brgyad): yod| mos pa'ang yod/ gtong ba'ang yod/ brtson pa mi gtong ba'ang yod du zin kyang de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
226b3(khri brgyad): bar gyis yongs su ma zin na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas
226b4(khri brgyad): pas yongs su ma zin pa'i phyir bar mdor lam du nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi skyes nas lo brgya nyi shu
226b5(khri brgyad): lon pa| rgas shing 'khogs la/ gtugs par gyur pa de la rlung las gyur pa'am/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'am/ bad kan las gyur pa'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad kyis nyams
226b6(khri brgyad): dmas pa de nyid mi stobs dang ldan pa gnyis kyis mchan g.yas g.yon nas brten te btegs nas khri de las bslangs te 'di skad du/ kye/ mi khyod kho bo cag gnyis kyis brten te bzung
226b7(khri brgyad): gi/ gang du 'dod pa dang / gang dga' bar song zhig dang gnas der ma phyin gyi bar du bar mdor 'gyel bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer ba da bzhin du/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'
227a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod/ bzod pa'ang yod/ dga' ba'ang yod/ dang ba'ang yod/
227a2(khri brgyad): lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/ 'dod pa'ang yod/ mos pa'ang yod/ gtong pa'ang yod/ brtson pa mi gtong ba'ang yod la/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas kyang yongs su
227a3(khri brgyad): zin cing / thabs la mkhas pas kyang yongs su zin na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ bar ma dor ldog par mi 'gyur bar rig par bya ste/
227a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gnas de 'thob pa'i mthu dang ldan pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis
227a5(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
227a6(khri brgyad): yongs su ma zin cing thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin la/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang ltung bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
227a7(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so/ /legs so/ /rab 'byor/
227b1(khri brgyad): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thog ma kho nar sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa na/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par ltung ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing / tshul khrims gang
227b2(khri brgyad): srung ba dang / bzod pa gang sgom pa dang / brtson 'grus gang rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan gang la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab gang sgom pa de'ang ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir
227b3(khri brgyad): 'dzin par ltung ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom par byed do/ /sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa na/ 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sbyin pa 'di sbyin par bya'o/ /bdag ni/
227b4(khri brgyad): sbyin pa dang ldan no/ /bdag gis tshul khrims bsrung ngo / /bdag gis tshul khrims bsgom par bya'o/ /bdag ni/ tshul khrims dang ldan no/ /bdag gis bzod par bya'o/ /bdag gis
227b5(khri brgyad): bzod pa bsgom par bya'o/ /bdag ni/ bzod pa dang ldan no/ /bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsams so/ /bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o/ /bdag ni/ brtson 'grus dang ldan no//
227b6(khri brgyad): bdag bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go /bdag gis bsam gtan bsgom par bya'o/ /bdag ni/ bsam gtan dang ldan no/ /bdag gis shes rab bsgom mo/ /bdag gis shes rab
227b7(khri brgyad): 'di bsgom par bya'o/ /bdag ni/ shes rab dang ldan no/ /snyam ste/ de sbyin pa des rlom sems su byed do/ /sbyin pa de rlom sems su byed do/ /bdag gi sbyin pa'o/ /snyam du rlom sems su byed
228a1(khri brgyad): do| |de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab rlom sems su byed do/ /shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed do//
228a2(khri brgyad): bdag gi shes rab bo/ /snyam du rlom sems su byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni/ rnam par rtog pa de dag med de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ pha mthar phyin
228a3(khri brgyad): pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni/ rnam par rtog pa de dag med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
228a4(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang de bzhin du rnam par rtog pa mi skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ pha mthar phyin pa yin no//
228a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des ni/ pha mtha' yang mi shes/ pha rol kyang mi shes pa'i phyir te/ de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin cing / tshul khrims kyi pha
228a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma
228a7(khri brgyad): zin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma zin pas/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges
228b1(khri brgyad): par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa ji ltar thabs la mi mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/
228b2(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thabs la mi mkhas pas thog ma kho nar sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing / thabs la mi mkhas pas tshul khrims srung par byed/ thabs la mi mkhas pas
228b3(khri brgyad): bzod pa sgom par byed/ thabs la mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/ thabs la mi mkhas pas bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par byed/ thabs la mi mkhas pas shes rab
228b4(khri brgyad): sgom par byed cing / de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin no/ /'di la sbyin par bya'o/ /sbyin pa 'di sbyin par bya'o/ /bdag gis tshul khrims bsrung ngo / /bdag gis bzod pa
228b5(khri brgyad): bsgom mo/ /bdag gis brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /bdag gis bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o/ /bdag gis shes rab bsgom par bya'o/ /shes rab 'di bsgom par bya'o/ /snyam
228b6(khri brgyad): ste| de sbyin pa de rlom sems su byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni/ sbyin pa dang ldan pa'o/ /snyam du rlom sems su byed do/ /de tshul khrims rlom sems su byed do/ /tshul khrims
228b7(khri brgyad): kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/ /snyam du rlom sems su byed do/ /bzod pa rlom sems su byed/ bzod pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni/ bzod pa
229a1(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'o/ /snyam du rlom sems su byed do/ /brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni/ brtson 'grus dang
229a2(khri brgyad): ldan pa'o/ /snyam du rlom sems su byed do/ /bsam gtan rlom sems su byed/ bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni/ bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o/ /snyam du rlom sems
229a3(khri brgyad): su byed do/ /shes rab rlom sems su byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni/ shes rab dang ldan pa'o/ /snyam du rlom sems su byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ji
229a4(khri brgyad): ltar rnam par rtog pa bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni/ mthar phyin pa
229a5(khri brgyad): yin la| de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ pha mthar phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ji ltar rnam par rtog pa bzhin du shes rab kyi pha
229a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni/ pha mthar phyin pa yin na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems
229a7(khri brgyad): dpa'i theg pa pa des ni/ pha mtha' yang mi shes/ pha rol kyang mi shes pa'i phyir ro/ /de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ shes
229b1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyis yongs su ma zin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma zin pas/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur
229b2(khri brgyad): zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs
229b3(khri brgyad): la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin pas/ nyan thos kyis dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar shes rab kyi pha
229b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin la/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur
229b5(khri brgyad): zhe na| rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma kho nar sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par mi byed cing /
229b6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi bar du sgom par byed de/ de 'di snyam du/ bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sbyin pa 'di sbyin par bya'o/ /'di la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/ /snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do/ /shes
229b7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar te/ de sbyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag gi sbyin pa'o/ /snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de bzhin
230a1(khri brgyad): du sbyar te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag gi shes rab bo/ /snyam du rlom sems
230a2(khri brgyad): su mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni/ gang gis rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du
230a3(khri brgyad): gang gis rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du pha mthar phyin pa yin
230a4(khri brgyad): la| byang chub sems dpa' de'ang pha mtha' yang shes/ pha rol kyang shes te rlom sems su mi byed pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa yin no/ /tshul khrims
230a5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
230a6(khri brgyad): yongs su zin cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su zin te/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
230a7(khri brgyad): pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin cing / de bzhin du thabs la mkhas
230b1(khri brgyad): pas yongs su zin te nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nag po'i phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du dkar po'i phyogs thams cad la'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ /shes
230b2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ gru'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po sum cu rtsa
230b3(khri brgyad): lnga pa|de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
230b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
230b5(khri brgyad): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub
230b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'dod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
230b7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i bshes
231a1(khri brgyad): gnyen dag la bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du slob par 'dod pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag
231a2(khri brgyad): la bsten par bya/ bsnyen par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /de dag kyang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston te/ rigs kyi bu/ tshur shog /khyod kyis sbyin pa gang dang gang sbyin pa
231a3(khri brgyad): de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig/ rigs kyi bu/ tshur shog /khyod tshul khrims gang dang gang bsrungs pa dang / bzod pa
231a4(khri brgyad): bsgoms pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab bsgoms pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
231a5(khri brgyad): chub tu yongs su bsngos la/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gzugs las rtog par ma byed cig /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
231a6(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las rtog par ma byed cig /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las rtog par ma byed
231a7(khri brgyad): cig |tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rtog par ma byed cig /nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo
231b1(khri brgyad): po nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las rtog par ma byed cig /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi
231b2(khri brgyad): yan lag dang / lam rnams las rtog par ma byed cig/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
231b3(khri brgyad): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad las rtog par ma byed cig /rigs kyi bu/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la'ang rtog par ma byed cig /rnam ba
231b4(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la'ang rtog par ma byed cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs la mi rtog na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur zhing / tshor ba dang /
231b5(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi rtog na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
231b6(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi rtog/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi rtog/
231b7(khri brgyad): nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi rtog /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi rtog na/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang
232a1(khri brgyad): po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam la mi rtog /mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so
232a2(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi rtog na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/
232a3(khri brgyad): khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ gzugs la 'dod pa ma skyed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni/ 'dod pa med pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod tshor ba
232a4(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar la 'dod pa ma skyed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ rnam par shes pa ni 'dod pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /
232a5(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu/ khyod sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig /tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dod pa ma
232a6(khri brgyad): skyed cig/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig /nang stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la
232a7(khri brgyad): 'dod pa ma skyed cig / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi
232b1(khri brgyad): yan lag dang / lam rnams kyi bar la 'dod pa ma skyed cig /mngon par shes pa lnga dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
232b2(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang 'dod pa ma skyed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ rnam pa thams cad
232b3(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid ni/ 'dod pa med cing / 'dod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'dod pa ma skyed cig /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i
232b4(khri brgyad): 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig /de
232b5(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhen/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub ni/ 'dod pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /zhes chos
232b6(khri brgyad): ston to| |rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la bla na med
232b7(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba dag ni/ dka' ba
233a1(khri brgyad): bgyid pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
233a2(khri brgyad): chen po gang ngag chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
233a3(khri brgyad): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dag ni/ dka' ba byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ chos
233a4(khri brgyad): thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / rmi lam lta bur shes nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
233a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnams ni/ 'jig rten la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin te/ bdag 'jig rten gyi skyob par gyur cig /ces bla na med pa yang dag par
233a6(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi skyabs su gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi gnas dang / 'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen dang / 'jig rten gyi gling dang /
233a7(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren pa dang / 'jig rten gyi rten du gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ byang
233b1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji ltar 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
233b2(khri brgyad): rnams kyis sems can rnams 'gro ba lnga las yongs su grol bar byas nas mya ngan las 'das pa 'jigs pa med pa bde ba'i thang la 'god par byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang
233b3(khri brgyad): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir yang dag par
233b4(khri brgyad): zhugs pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji ltar 'jig rten la bde ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang
233b5(khri brgyad): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyis sems can rnams sdug bsngal ba dang
233b6(khri brgyad): yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las grol bar byas nas mya ngan las 'das pa 'jig pa med pa bde ba'i thang la 'god par byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems
233b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten la bde ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par
234a1(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams ji ltar 'jig rten gyi skyob pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems
234a2(khri brgyad): d pa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya par 'dod pa rnams kyis 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa
234a3(khri brgyad): de dag las sems can rnams la skyob cing / de dag spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/ de dag gis chos de thos nas rim gyis theg pa gsum po dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
234a4(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod
234a5(khri brgyad): pa rnams 'jig rten gyi skyob pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
234a6(khri brgyad): rgya bar 'dod pa rnams ji ltar 'jig rten gyi skyabs yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
234a7(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyis sems can skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
234b1(khri brgyad): dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa
234b2(khri brgyad): rnams las yongs su grol bar byed la/ yongs su bkrol nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang
234b3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten gyi skyabs yin no/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji ltar 'jig rten gyi gnas yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/
234b4(khri brgyad): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad 'dre ba med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa
234b5(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams 'jig rten gyi gnas yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar chos thams cad
234b6(khri brgyad): 'dre ba chis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa de ni/ gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa yin te/ de ni/ gzugs kyi skye ba med pa yin no/ /
234b7(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs kyi 'gag pa med pa yin te/ de ni/ gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
235a1(khri brgyad): shes pa'i skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba med pa yin te/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang sbyar
235a2(khri brgyad): bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams chos
235a3(khri brgyad): thams cad 'dre ba med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
235a4(khri brgyad): 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams ji ltar 'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can rnams la 'di skad du
235a5(khri brgyad): chos ston te/ gzugs kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par
235a6(khri brgyad): shes pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /zhes chos ston te/ rab 'byor/
235a7(khri brgyad): gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos thams cad gzugs ji lta ba bzhin lags na/ byang chub sems
235b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyid du mi 'gyur lags sam/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam
235b2(khri brgyad): par rtog pa ci'ang ma mchis la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa ci'ang ma mchis te/ de bzhin du/ 'di ni/ gzugs so/ /'di ni/
235b3(khri brgyad): tshor ba'o/ /'di ni/ 'du shes so/ /'di dag ni/ 'du byed rnams so/ /'di ni/ rnam par shes pa'o/ /zhes bgyi ba dang / 'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /zhes bgyi ba'i bar du rnam pa thams
235b4(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa ci'ang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ gzugs kyi pha
235b5(khri brgyad): rol ni rnam par rtog pa ci'ang med la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa ci'ang med de/ rab 'byor/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
235b6(khri brgyad): chos de lta bu dag la nges par sems shing zhum par yang mi 'gyur la/ de ltar chos de dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /snyam ste/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
235b7(khri brgyad): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos de dang / ni/ 'di ltar zhi ba'o/ /'di ltar gya nom pa'o/ /zhas sten par byed pa ni/ dka' ba byed pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems
236a1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dong pa rnams 'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen yin no/ /rab 'byor/
236a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar 'jig rten gyi gling du 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta
236a3(khri brgyad): ste| dper na/ chu klung chen po rnams sam rgya mtsho chen po dag na/ sa phyogs gang dag chus yongs su chod pa de dag ni/ gling zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du gzugs ni/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi
236a4(khri brgyad): ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
236a5(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar ni/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa de dag gis chos thams cad yongs su chad do/ /rab
236a6(khri brgyad): 'byor/ chos thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang / dmigs su med pa dang / lam chad pa dang / sred pa zad pa dang /
236a7(khri brgyad): lhag ma med pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa yin te/ de ni/ zhi ba'o/ /de ni/ gya nom pa'o/ /de ni/ ji lta ba'i bdag nyid yin te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar
236b1(khri brgyad): na| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos thams cad sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs
236b2(khri brgyad): su chad par ston pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi gling yin no/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
236b3(khri brgyad): ji ltar 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren par 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
236b4(khri brgyad): bar 'dod pa rnams sems can gyi ris la snying rje chen po bskyed nas gzugs skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad
236b5(khri brgyad): do| |tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par chos ston te/ de bzhin du pha
236b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
236b7(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do/ /rang byang
237a1(khri brgyad): chub skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skye ba med pa
237a2(khri brgyad): dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do/ /de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
237a3(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa nyid skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
237a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
237a5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub
237a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gzugs ni/ nam mkha'i tshul can no/ /zhes chos ston cing 'chad
237a7(khri brgyad): do| |tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ nam mkha'i tshul can no/ /zhes sems can rnams la chos ston cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nam
237b1(khri brgyad): mkha'i tshul can no/ /zhes chos ston to/ /gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni/ 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med pa ste/ de la 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med do/ /zhes sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes
237b2(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni/ 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni/ 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med pa ste/ de la 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med do/ /zhes sems can rnams la chos
237b3(khri brgyad): ston to/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid ni/ 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med pa ste/ de la 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med do/ /zhes sems can rnams la chos ston te/ rab 'byor/ de
237b4(khri brgyad): ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
237b5(khri brgyad): na| rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ stong pa nyid kyi tshul can te/ de dag tshul de las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
237b6(khri brgyad): chos thams cad ni/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshan ma med pa la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ chos
237b7(khri brgyad): thams cad ni/ smon pa med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ smon pa med pa la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/
238a1(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ste/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du
238a2(khri brgyad): sbyar te| rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de
238a3(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams
238a4(khri brgyad): cad ni/ rmi lam lta bu'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rmi lam la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du chos thams cad
238a5(khri brgyad): ni| sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul can dang / mig yor lta bu'i tshul can dang / sprul pa lta bu'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sprul pa la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs
238a6(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa la
238a7(khri brgyad): 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ mtha' yas mu med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtha' yas mu med
238b1(khri brgyad): pa la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ dbri ba med pa dang / bsnan pa med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbri ba
238b2(khri brgyad): med pa dang / bsnan pa med pa la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med pa'i tshul can no/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ blang ba
238b3(khri brgyad): med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i tshul can no/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ phrad pa med pa dang / bral ba med pa dang / 'dre ba med pa dang / mi 'dre ba med pa'i tshul can no/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams
238b4(khri brgyad): cad ni| bdag gi tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ bdag la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ sems can
238b5(khri brgyad): gyi tshul can no/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ srog dang / skye ba po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / slong ba po dang /
238b6(khri brgyad): shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ bdag gtan med cing sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang /
238b7(khri brgyad): gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / slong ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'ang gtan med na/ rab 'byor/ 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta dmigs par ga
239a1(khri brgyad): la 'gyur/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ rtag ba'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rtag pa ci'ang gtan med na/ 'gro
239a2(khri brgyad): ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ bde ba'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ bdag gi tshul can dang / sdug
239a3(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / bdag dang / sdug pa gtan med na/ de dag gi 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la
239a4(khri brgyad): yod| rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ mi rtag pa'i tshul can yin no/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de
239a5(khri brgyad): las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mi rtag pa gtan med cing sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag med pa'am/ mi sdug pa gtan med na/ de'i 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab
239a6(khri brgyad): 'byor| chos thams cad ni/ 'dod chags kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'dod chags kyi dngos po gtan med na/ 'dod chags lta ga la
239a7(khri brgyad): yod| rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ zhe sdang gi tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ zhe sdang gi dngos po gtan med na/ zhe sdang lta ga la yod/
239b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ gti mug gi tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gti mug gi dngos po gtan med na/ gti mug lta ga la yod/ rab
239b2(khri brgyad): 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ lta bar gyur pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ lta bar gyur pa'i dngos po gtan med na/ lta bar gyur pa lta ga la yod/
239b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ de bzhin nyid kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin nyid la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//
239b4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul can no/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshul can dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul can dang / bsam gyis mi khyab
239b5(khri brgyad): pa'i dbyings kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/
239b6(khri brgyad): chos thams cad ni/ mi g.yo ba'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos 'ga' la'ang g.yo ba med pas/ 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /
239b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ gzugs kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gzugs gtan med na/ de la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod//
240a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ de bzhin du chos thams cad ni/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir
240a2(khri brgyad): zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rnam par shes pa gtan mi dmigs na/ de'i 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul can te/ de
240a3(khri brgyad): dag ni| tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sbyin pa gtan med na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du chos thams cad ni/ tshul khrims kyi
240a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul can no/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las
240a5(khri brgyad): mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtan med na/ de'i 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyi tshul can
240a6(khri brgyad): yin no/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
240a7(khri brgyad): pa nyid gtan med na/ de'i 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
240b1(khri brgyad): na| dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gtan med na/ de dag gi 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du chos thams cad ni/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang /
240b2(khri brgyad): stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi tshul can te/ de dag
240b3(khri brgyad): ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i tshul
240b4(khri brgyad): can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni/
