240b5(khri brgyad): tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rang sangs rgyas rnams la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
240b6(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ni/ 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//
240b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las dag mos par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
241a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gang dag sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir spyod spyod pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la lhag par bya ba byas pa dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams
241a2(khri brgyad): kyis yongs su smin par byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su
241a3(khri brgyad): zin pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bzhi
241a4(khri brgyad): bcu rtsa drug pa'o/ / //rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par
241a5(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba de dag gi rtags rnams dang / rnam pa rnams dang / mtshan ma rnams dang / rang bzhin du 'gyur ba gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
241a6(khri brgyad): 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni/ 'dod chags
241a7(khri brgyad): bsal bas/ dben pa'i rang bzhin can dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsal bas dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de dag ni/ 'dod chags kyi rtags kyis dben pa'i rang
241b1(khri brgyad): bzhin can du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rtags kyis dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de dag ni/ 'dod
241b2(khri brgyad): chags kyi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin can du
241b3(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rtogs par gyur pa de dag ji lta bu'i tshul can
241b4(khri brgyad): du 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rtogs pa de dag ni/ rnam pa thams
241b5(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can de dag ni/ sems
241b6(khri brgyad): can thams cad kyi rten lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab
241b7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can yin pas/ sems can thams cad kyi rten yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
242a1(khri brgyad): 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis 'di ltar bdag cag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /zhes go cha de dag
242a2(khri brgyad): 'tshal la/ de la sems can dang / sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs pa ni/ dka' ba bgyid pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab
242a3(khri brgyad): 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /zhes go cha de bgos pa de dag ni/ dka' ba byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/
242a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ gzugs dang 'brel ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gzugs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i go cha gtan med pa'i phyir te/ de bas
242a5(khri brgyad): na| go cha de ni/ gzugs dang 'brel ba ma yin no/ /zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ go cha de ni/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir
242a6(khri brgyad): zhe na| rab 'byor/ rnam par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i go cha gtan med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bas na/ go cha de ni/ rnam par shes pa dang 'brel ba ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ go cha de
242a7(khri brgyad): ni| bdag gi bar dang 'brel ba ma yin zhing / sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po
242b1(khri brgyad): dang / slong ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po dang 'brel ba ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ go cha de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rnam pa
242b2(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gtan med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ rnam pa thams cad
242b3(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel ba ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ kye ma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang dag gis 'di ltar bdag cag gis sems can thams cad yongs
242b4(khri brgyad): su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /zhes go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ chos thams cad dang 'brel ba ma yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
242b5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /zhes go cha 'tshal ba de ni/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
242b6(khri brgyad): sa'i gnas gnyis su mi mchi bar 'tshal bar bgyi ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni/ gnas ma mchis shing go skabs ma lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
242b7(khri brgyad): gang sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /zhes de ltar go cha 'tshal ba de nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba de ni/ gnas ma mchis lags so/ /de
243a1(khri brgyad): ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ sa mtshams bkum ste sems can rnams kyi ched du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags
243a2(khri brgyad): pa'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ khyod kyis don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na
243a3(khri brgyad): 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
243a4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis las gnas gcig tu mi 'gro bar shes par bya'o/ /zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems
243a5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ phyogs gcig gi sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
243a6(khri brgyad): po ni/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du go cha 'tshal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam
243a7(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems
243b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ phyogs gcig gi sems can rnams kyi phyir go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can thams cad
243b2(khri brgyad): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyir go cha bgos pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
243b3(khri brgyad): phyin pa ni/ zab lags te/ de ni/ sus kyang bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ gang du'ang bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ ji ltar yang bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
243b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ni/ gang bsgom pa dang / gang la bsgom pa dang / gang gis sgom pa'i chos 'ga' yongs su grub pa'ang mi dmigs te/
243b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ nam mkha' bsgom pa lags so/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ chos thams
243b6(khri brgyad): cad ma mchis pa bsgom pa lags so/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ ma mchis pa bsgom pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
243b7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ bsgom pa rnam par 'jig
244a1(khri brgyad): pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de gang bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa yin/ rab
244a2(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ gzugs bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab
244a3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/
244a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ bdag bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ shes
244a5(khri brgyad): pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
244a6(khri brgyad): bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi bsgom pa
244a7(khri brgyad): rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
244b1(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par
244b2(khri brgyad): 'jig pa lags so/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
244b3(khri brgyad): dang / lam bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ stobs bcu bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab
244b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
244b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong
244b6(khri brgyad): ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa
244b7(khri brgyad): rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ gzugs
245a1(khri brgyad): bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
245a2(khri brgyad): bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ ci/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par zhen par ma gyur tam zhes
245a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol
245a4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i
245a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
245a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya ste/ ci/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par zhen par ma gyur tam/ ci/ phyir mi
245a7(khri brgyad): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni/ gzhan gyis smras pa dang / gzhan gyis bstan pa la snying por mi lta'am/
245b1(khri brgyad): ci| phyir mi ldog ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de/ gzhan gyi dad pas mi 'gro'am/ ci/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub
245b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de/ 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi 'phrog gam/ zhe sdang dang / gti
245b3(khri brgyad): mug dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi 'phrog gam/ ci/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa
245b4(khri brgyad): de| sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
245b5(khri brgyad): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ ci/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa
245b6(khri brgyad): de| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na/ mi skrag gam/ mi dngang ngam/ dngang bar mi 'gyur ram/ zhum par mi 'gyur ram/ 'gong bar mi 'gyur ram/ de'i yid phyir
245b7(khri brgyad): phyogs par mi 'gyur ram/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi 'brel lam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa la mngon par dga'am/ thos
246a1(khri brgyad): nas kyang 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed dam/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed dam zhes brtag
246a2(khri brgyad): par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ sngon gyi dus na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dri ba byas pa
246a3(khri brgyad): dang / bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ phyir mi ldog
246a4(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na/ mi skrag /mi dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing / zhum par mi 'gyur/
246a5(khri brgyad): 'gong bar mi 'gyur te/ yid phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba'i steng du thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed
246a6(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na/ mi skrag/ mi
246a7(khri brgyad): dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing / zhum par mi 'gyur/ 'gong bar mi 'gyur te/ de'i yid phyir phyogs par yang mi 'gyur ba lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
246b1(khri brgyad): des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar rnam par dpyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems
246b2(khri brgyad): kyi rgyud rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par dpyad par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub
246b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems kyi rgyud rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar rnam par dpyad par
246b4(khri brgyad): bgyi| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems kyi rgyud stong pa nyid la gzhol ba dang / stong pa nyid la 'bab pa
246b5(khri brgyad): dang / stong pa nyid la bab pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par dpyod pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ sems kyi rgyud mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba dang / smon pa med
246b6(khri brgyad): pa la gzhol ba dang / sems kyi rgyud nam mkha' la gzhol ba dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rab 'byor/ sems kyi rgyud skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med
246b7(khri brgyad): pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba dang / sems kyi rgyud de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
247a1(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la gzhol bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par dpyod pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ sems kyi rgyud rmi lam
247a2(khri brgyad): lta bu la gzhol ba dang / sprul pa lta bu la gzhol bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par dpyod pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
247a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud stong pa nyid la gzhol bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par dpyod pa yin no/ /
247a4(khri brgyad): zhes bgyi ba nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud rmi lam lta bu'i bar la gzhol bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
247a5(khri brgyad): rnam par dpyod pa yin no/ /zhes bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la'ang rnam par dpyod pa bgyid pa lags
247a6(khri brgyad): sam| tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la'ang rnam par dpyod par bgyid lags sam/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
247a7(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar la'ang rnam par dpyod pa bgyid lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ gzugs
247b1(khri brgyad): la rnam par dpyod par mi byed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par dpyod par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub
247b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rnam par dpyod par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ rnam pa thams
247b3(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ sus kyang ma byas/ 'gyur bar ma byas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du'ang ma song / gang na'ang mi 'dug la/ yul na'ang mi gnas/ phyogs na'ang
247b4(khri brgyad): mi gnas te/ de la ni/ grangs dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba mi dmigs la/ gang la grangs dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba mi dmigs pa de ni/ sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par
247b5(khri brgyad): byang chub par mi nus te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson
247b6(khri brgyad): 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar gyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir
247b7(khri brgyad): zhe na| gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa dang / tshor ba nyid dang / 'du shes nyid dang / 'du byed nyid dang / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
248a1(khri brgyad): yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
248a2(khri brgyad): gang yin pa 'di ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig go /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
248a3(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig go /de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
248a4(khri brgyad): kyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
248a5(khri brgyad): pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yin no/ /de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid yin no/ /
248a6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ 'dod chags 'dul ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri
248a7(khri brgyad): brgyad stong pa/ bam po sum cu rtsa drug pa/ de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma blangs shing / lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da
248b1(khri brgyad): dang / pad+ma dkar po dag blangs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor to/ /gtor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
248b2(khri brgyad): phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
248b3(khri brgyad): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du /gzugs
248b4(khri brgyad): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang
248b5(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
248b6(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni/ gcig ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid
248b7(khri brgyad): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni/ gcig ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /zhes ston pa
249a1(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ zab cing mthong bar dka' la rtogs par dka' ste/ brtag mi nus
249a2(khri brgyad): shing rtog ge'i spyod pa ma lags la/ zhi ba zhib mor brtag pa'i mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rig pa lags te/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa lags so/ /de skad
249a3(khri brgyad): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha'i bu dag /de de bzhin no/ /
249a4(khri brgyad): de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag/ gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes
249a5(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /de bzhin du
249a6(khri brgyad): sbyar te| sangs rgyas kyi bar nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas so/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
249a7(khri brgyad): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni/ gcig ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te
249b1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni/ gcig ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis
249b2(khri brgyad): su dbyer med do/ /don gyi dbang de gzigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'phrin las chung ngu la thugs gzhol te/ chos bstan pa la gzhol ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye
249b3(khri brgyad): ma 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni/ zab cing mthong bar dka' la rtogs par dka' ste/ brtag mi nus shing rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin la/ zhi ba zhib
249b4(khri brgyad): mor brtag pa'i mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rig pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa yin te/ de ni/ sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas shing / gang du'ang
249b5(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/ gang la gnyis kun tu rgyu ba med pa de ni/ chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /
249b6(khri brgyad): lha'i bu dag/ de bzhin nyid zab pa dang / chos kyi dbyings zab pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i
249b7(khri brgyad): bu dag / mtha' yas mu med pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / skye ba dang / 'gag pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par
250a1(khri brgyad): byang ba med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / bdag zab pa nyid dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du zab pa'i
250a2(khri brgyad): phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir
250a3(khri brgyad): chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
250a4(khri brgyad): zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag
250a5(khri brgyad): pa zab pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//
250a6(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa zab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du zab pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
250a7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir lha'i bu dag/ kye ma chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ kye ma/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi
250b1(khri brgyad): mthun pa'i chos 'di bstan lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos 'di ni/ gzugs gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du'ang ma lags/
250b2(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du'ang ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
250b3(khri brgyad): brgyad kyi bar du gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du'ang ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i
250b4(khri brgyad): slad du'ang ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos bstan pa zab mo 'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i
250b5(khri brgyad): slad du'ang ma lags/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung
250b6(khri brgyad): ba'i slad du/ bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du'ang ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten ni/ bdag gi gzugs so/ /bdag ni/ gzugs so/ /bdag gi tshor ba'o/ /'du
250b7(khri brgyad): shes so| |'du byed rnams so/ /rnam par shes pa'o/ /bdag ni/ rnam par shes pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du de bzhin du sbyar te/ bdag gi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
251a1(khri brgyad): bu'o/ /bdag ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag gi lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag
251a2(khri brgyad): gi phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag gi dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /bdag ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /bdag gi rang byang chub bo/ /bdag ni/
251a3(khri brgyad): rang byang chub bo/ /bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /bdag ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /zhes bgyi bar 'dzin pa la spyod lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
251a4(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag/ chos de ni/ gzugs gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa'ang ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa'ang ma yin
251a5(khri brgyad): no| |tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa'ang ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa'ang ma yin no/ /lha'i bu dag /gang
251a6(khri brgyad): dag gzugs gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag la ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'i skal ba med
251a7(khri brgyad): de| bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du sgom par mi nus so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
251b1(khri brgyad): sgom par mi nus so/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos 'di ni/ chos thams cad dang mthun pa lags te/ chos 'di ni/ chos gang dag dang mthun pa lags she na/
251b2(khri brgyad): chos 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
251b3(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dang mthun pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos 'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid dang
251b4(khri brgyad): mthun pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos 'di ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang mthun pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos 'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad
251b5(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang mthun pa lags so/ /chos 'di ni/ gang la'ang thogs pa ma mchis pa lags te/ ci la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags she na/ gzugs la thogs pa ma
251b6(khri brgyad): mchis pa lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
251b7(khri brgyad): la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /chos 'di ni/ nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa
252a1(khri brgyad): nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis
252a2(khri brgyad): pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan
252a3(khri brgyad): nyid lags so/ /chos 'di ni/ gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba
252a4(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i slad du skye
252a5(khri brgyad): ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /chos 'di ni/ gzugs kyi gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
252a6(khri brgyad): pa'i gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du gzhi ma mchis pa lags
252a7(khri brgyad): so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni/
252b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ci dang ci ston pa de thams cad stong pa nyid kho na las brtsams te ston pa'i slad du'o/ /
252b2(khri brgyad): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu dag /gang 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ gnas
252b3(khri brgyad): brtan rab 'byor 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes pa lags so/ /zhes smras pa ni/ ji ltar rjes su skyes pas/ gnas brtan rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes pa
252b4(khri brgyad): yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ ma 'ongs ma song ba ste/ de bzhin du rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma 'ongs ma song ba ste/ de ltar na/ gnas
252b5(khri brgyad): brtan rab 'byor ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /chos thams cad kyi
252b6(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin
252b7(khri brgyad): nyid ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gnas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam
253a1(khri brgyad): par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid
253a2(khri brgyad): gang la'ang thogs pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang gang la'ang thogs pa med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams
253a3(khri brgyad): cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de bzhin nyid ni/ ma byas pa ste/ de bzhin nyid de ni/ gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa'ang
253a4(khri brgyad): med de/ gang gi phyir de bzhin nyid de gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa'ang med cing / nam yang de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa ma yin pa de'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid de ni/ gnyis su med
253a5(khri brgyad): cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de ltar na/ gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ thams
253a6(khri brgyad): cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa ste/ de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang thams cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do/ /ji ltar de bzhin
253a7(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid tha mi dad pa/ dbyer med pa/ dmigs su med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha mi dad pa/ dbyer med pa/ dmigs su med pa'o/ /
253b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha mi dad pa/ dbyer med pa/ dmigs su med pa ste/ de ltar na/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin
253b2(khri brgyad): no| |de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yod pa ma yin te/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yod pa ma yin pa gang
253b3(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni/ nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa ma yin zhing / de ni/ rtag tu de bzhin nyid do/ /gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang de lta bu ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa gzhan ma yin pas/ de
253b4(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes kyang gang du'ang skyes pa med do/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin pa de bzhin du
253b5(khri brgyad): chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin no/ /de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa
253b6(khri brgyad): ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ de ltar na/ gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa zhes bya'o/ /lha'i bu dag /'di la 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis
253b7(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin
254a1(khri brgyad): nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin
254a2(khri brgyad): nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis da
254a3(khri brgyad): ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid de/ de ltar na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni/ gnyis su med de/
254a4(khri brgyad): gnyis su dbyer med do/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba
254a5(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis tshor ba dang / 'du
254a6(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de ltar na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i
254a7(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
254b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis bdag gi de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin du shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin
254b2(khri brgyad): nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid do/ /de ltar na/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gyi de
254b3(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / tshul khrims dang /
254b4(khri brgyad): bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med
254b5(khri brgyad): do| |nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med
254b6(khri brgyad): do| |dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de
254b7(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs
255a1(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin
255a2(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /de ltar na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de
255a3(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid de ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med do/ /lha'i bu dag /de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
255a4(khri brgyad): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan brnyes so/ /de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
255a5(khri brgyad): gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to/ /g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg
255a6(khri brgyad): go |chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/ /
255a7(khri brgyad): shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'o/ /nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'o/ /byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'o/ /lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'o/ /mtha' mtho na dbus dma'o//
255b1(khri brgyad): dbus mtho na mtha' dma'o/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor la lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag gis gtor
255b2(khri brgyad): mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs
255b3(khri brgyad): pa'i rjes su skyes pa ni/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /zhes tshig tu brjod do/ /de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi gtam de nyid kyi rgyud nas bzung ste lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces
255b4(khri brgyad): smras so/ /lha'i bu dag /'di ltar/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni/ gzugs kyi rjes su ma skyes/ gzugs las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ gzugs
255b5(khri brgyad): gyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rjes su ma skyes/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/
255b6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rjes
255b7(khri brgyad): su ma skyes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
256a1(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'dus byas kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi
256a2(khri brgyad): rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'dus ma byas kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus ma byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'dus ma byas kyi
256a3(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ gang gis rjes su skyes pa dang / gang rjes su skye ba'i
256a4(khri brgyad): chos de med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de
256a5(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam
256a6(khri brgyad): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni/ zab pa ste/ de la ni/ gzugs mi dmigs/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs
256a7(khri brgyad): par lta ga la 'gyur/ de la ni/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam par shes pa
256b1(khri brgyad): nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs/ rnam pa thams cad
256b2(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ bcom
256b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin nyid ni/ zab pa ste/ de la gzugs mi dmigs/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/
256b4(khri brgyad): gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ de la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/ rnam
256b5(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams
256b6(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
256b7(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur te/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong nyis brgya len pa
257a1(khri brgyad): med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dge slong ma lnga brgya ni/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag
257a2(khri brgyad): go / byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yongs su nyams pa'i chos can drug cu ni/ len pa med par zag pa rnams las
257a3(khri brgyad): sems rnam par grol lo/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis ni/ sangs rgyas lnga brgya la bsnyen bkur byas te thams cad du sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod
257a4(khri brgyad): pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan bskyed/ shes rab bsgoms kyang de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin cing / thabs la mkhas pas yongs
257a5(khri brgyad): su ma zin pas/ 'di ltar spyad de/ 'di ni/ sbyin pa'o/ /'di la sbyin par bya'o/ /bdag gis tshul khrims 'di bsrung ngo / /bzod pa 'di bsgom mo/ /brtson 'grus 'di brtsam mo/ /bsam
257a6(khri brgyad): gtan 'di la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o/ /shes rab 'di bsgom par bya'o/ /snyam du de ltar spyod pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma
257a7(khri brgyad): zin pas/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab bsgom zhing de dag 'du shes sna tshogs la spyod pas tha dad pa med pa ma
257b1(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i phyir de dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la ma zhugs so/ /de dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la ma zhugs pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /dgra bcom
257b2(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar du thob bo/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam stong pa nyid dam/ mtshan ma med pa'am/ smon pa med pa yod mod kyi/ de dag shes rab
257b3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing / thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byas nas nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol
257b4(khri brgyad): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la bsgoms su 'dra'ang thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba ngag /yang
257b5(khri brgyad): dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bgyis nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur la/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa
257b6(khri brgyad): dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid bsgoms su bas kyang thabs la mkhas pa la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba
257b7(khri brgyad): lags| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la kha cig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang bral bar stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
258a1(khri brgyad): med pa'i chos rnams bsgom zhing / thabs la mkhas pa la ma brten pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub
258a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba rnams ni/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams bsgom
258a3(khri brgyad): zhing / thabs la mkhas pa la brten nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shA ri'i
258a4(khri brgyad): bu| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dab chags bya zhig lus dpag tshad brgya'am/ lus dpag tshad nyis brgya'am/ dpag tshad sum brgya'am/ dpag tshad bzhi brgya'am/ dpag tshad lnga
258a5(khri brgyad): brgya pa zhig yod la/ de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas dzam+bu'i gling du 'ong bar sems la/ bya de'ang 'dab ma med pa zhig yin zhing / de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas bdag
258a6(khri brgyad): nyid mchongs te dzam+bu'i gling du 'gro bar bya bar sems la/ gal te bya de sa la ma lhung bar 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su gnas par bya'o/ /snyam
258a7(khri brgyad): du sems na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ bya de phyir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du gnas par nus snyam mam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ rngo mi
258b1(khri brgyad): thogs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te de bar de nas 'di snyam du/ ma la bdag ma smas ma snad bar dzam+bu'i gling du gnas par bya'o/ /snyam du bsam na/ shA
258b2(khri brgyad): ri'i bu| 'di ji snyam du sems/ bya de ma smas ma snad par dzam+bu'i gling du gnas par 'gyur snyam mam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ rngo mi thogs lags te/ bcom
258b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ bya de ni/ smas pa'am snad par yang 'gyur la dzam+bu'i gling du ma mchis par 'gum pa'am/ 'gum la thug par sdug bsngal bar yang 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ /
258b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar de ni/ lus che la 'dab ma ma mchis shing / mthon po zhig nas mchongs pas/ de ltar 'gyur du gdon mi 'tshal lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
258b5(khri brgyad): stsal pa| shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu sbyin pa sbyin par byed/ tshul khrims srung / bzod pa sgom/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ bsam
258b6(khri brgyad): gtan la snyoms par 'jug cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de'i 'jug pa'ang che/ sems bskyed pa'ang che/
258b7(khri brgyad): phan gdags par bsam pa'ang tshad med du zin kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin na/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
259a1(khri brgyad): lhung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang bral bar sbyin pa byin/
259a2(khri brgyad): tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan bskyed kyang byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral
259a3(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur te/ des na/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
259a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa la sems shing / kun tu 'dzin la
259a5(khri brgyad): mtshan mar byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul khrims mi shes/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i bar du mi shes na/ de mi shes shing khong du ma chud pas/
259a6(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra thos na/ zhi bar mtshan mar 'dzin te/ mtshan mar bzung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
259a7(khri brgyad): yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i
259b1(khri brgyad): bu| 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa
259b2(khri brgyad): ni| de ltar 'gyur te/ de nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste
259b3(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed/ tshul khrims srung / bzod pa sgrub/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa ni/ shes
259b4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral ba ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge
259b5(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa gang yin pa de thams cad mtshan mar mi 'dzin te/ de stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la
259b6(khri brgyad): mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar mi 'dzin na/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ nyan thos kyi
259b7(khri brgyad): sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye
260a1(khri brgyad): bar bzung ste sbyin pa byin yang mtshan mar ma bzung / tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa bsgrubs/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs/
260a2(khri brgyad): shes rab bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab
260a3(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mtshan mar ma bzung / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms kyang
260a4(khri brgyad): mtshan mar ma bzung ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar/ mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom
260a5(khri brgyad): pa dang / bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab sgom pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod kyang mtshan mar ma bzung ba 'di ni/
260a6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i
260a7(khri brgyad): don 'tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ma
260b1(khri brgyad): bral ba de'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ the tshom ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
260b2(khri brgyad): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i
260b3(khri brgyad): gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos gang yang ma dmigs pa'i slad du'o/ /
260b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba de dag gi bla
260b5(khri brgyad): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ the tshom mchis par rig par bgyi lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
260b6(khri brgyad): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba bdag gis sbyin pa ci dang ci stsal ba de thams cad mtshan mar bzung nas stsal ba dang / tshul khrims
260b7(khri brgyad): ci dang ci bsrungs pa dang / bzod pa bsgrubs pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / bsam gtan gang dang gang la mnyam par bzhag pa de thams cad kyang mtshan mar bzung nas mnyam par
261a1(khri brgyad): bzhag pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
261a2(khri brgyad): ni| the tshom mchis par rig par bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar lags pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
261a3(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral bar rig par bgyi'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs
261a4(khri brgyad): la mkhas pa la gnas te mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa stsal bar bgyi/ tshul khrims bsrung bar bgyi/ bzod pa bsgrub par bgyi/
261a5(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi/ bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi/ shes rab bsgom par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyad par bgyi'o//
261a6(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
261a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang bgyi 'tshal la/ chos de dag kyang ma mchis shing mi dmigs pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
261b1(khri brgyad): chub ni/ mngon par 'byung bar dka' ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag /de de bzhin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ mngon par
261b2(khri brgyad): 'byung bar dka' ba yin no/ /lha'i bu dag /ngas kyang chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ ngas ni/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am/ gang
261b3(khri brgyad): gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu dag /chos thams cad shin tu rnam par
261b4(khri brgyad): dag pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
261b5(khri brgyad): ni| mngon par 'byung bar dka'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba dang / bdag sems pa ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bla na med pa yang
261b6(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid pa
261b7(khri brgyad): su'ang ma mchis shing / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ci'ang ma mchis pas/ chos thams cad ni/ stong pa lags te/ chos thams cad stong pa la ni/ gang mngon par rdzogs par
262a1(khri brgyad): 'tshang rgya bar bgyid pa dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de ma mchis pa'i slad
262a2(khri brgyad): du'o| / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ chos thams cad ni/ stong pa lags te/ chos gang rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba'am/ yongs su 'grib par bgyi ba'i slad du sbyin pa
262a3(khri brgyad): stsol bar bgyid pa dang / bsam gtan gyi bar la snyoms par 'jug par bgyid pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa'i chos de dag kyang ma mchis shing / gang mngon
262a4(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid pa dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de dag thams cad kyang stong pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang
262a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/
262a6(khri brgyad): 'di ltar/ gzugs ni/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhing / de bzhin
262a7(khri brgyad): du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i slad du'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di
262b1(khri brgyad): skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan
262b2(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ nam mkha' ni/ 'di snyam du/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /snyam du mi sems so/ /tshe dang
262b3(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang 'di snyam du/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
262b4(khri brgyad): bya'o| |snyam du mi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ chos thams cad ni/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir te/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos thams
262b5(khri brgyad): cad nam mkha' lta bur mos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams
262b6(khri brgyad): cad nam mkha' lta bur mos par mi byed kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla ste/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba ma
262b7(khri brgyad): yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ rnam grangs
263a1(khri brgyad): des na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ste/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla ba ma yin par
263a2(khri brgyad): mngon no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
263a3(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub las ldog snyam mam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bla na med pa yang dag

263a7(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las gud na yod snyam mam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni/
263b1(khri brgyad): ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi par las gud na yod snyam mam/ smras pa/ tshe
263b2(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

263b7(khri brgyad): nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog snyam mam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ chos
264a1(khri brgyad): nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog snyam mam/ chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i
264a2(khri brgyad): mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog snyam mam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang

264a4(khri brgyad): 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de/ bsam gyis mi

264a6(khri brgyad): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog par 'gyur ba'i chos de gang yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras
264a7(khri brgyad): so| |gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa des bstan pa ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog
264b1(khri brgyad): pa gang yang med de/ de'i phyir gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gsum po gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gsum po de dag
264b2(khri brgyad): rnam par bzhag par yang mi 'gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bstan pa ltar na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa gcig pur 'gyur
264b3(khri brgyad): ro| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gnas brtan rab 'byor byang chub gcig kyang 'dod dam zhes
264b4(khri brgyad): gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di la dri dgos so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i byang
264b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod dam/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ ci/ de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems
264b6(khri brgyad): dpa' gsum 'dod dam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i byang chub sems dpa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i byang chub sems dpa'am/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dod
264b7(khri brgyad): dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ ci/ de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' gsum du dmigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
265a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin nyid rnam pa gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum du dmigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa

265a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' 'di ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'o/ /zhes bya bar sems par gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar byang chub
265a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bye brag med par rab tu phye ba la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing / yid 'gyod pa med pa de ni/
265a6(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/
265a7(khri brgyad): 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab 'byor khyod spobs pa legs so/ /legs so/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi de bzhin
265b1(khri brgyad): nyid kyis bye brag med par rab tu phye ba la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing / yid 'gyod pa med la/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i
265b2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di

265b6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems
265b7(khri brgyad): la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ mi mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis dmigs
266a1(khri brgyad): par bya ste/ mi mnyam pa'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po bskyed par bya'o/ /sems can
266a2(khri brgyad): thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyis dmigs par bya ste/ brlang pa'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la nga rgyal med par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad
266a3(khri brgyad): la g.yo med par dmigs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ gnod pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la phan
266a4(khri brgyad): pa'i sems kyis dmigs par bya ste/ gnod pa'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ zhe 'gras pa'i
