369b4(khri brgyad): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar de la bdag gis kyang bslab par bya dgos pa'i phyir ro/ /gal te 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag
369b5(khri brgyad): dang bral bas 'dres par gnas na/ bdag gis de la bslab par mi bya'i/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
369b6(khri brgyad): byed pa dag dang ma bral bar gnas na/ bdag gis kyang de bzhin du gnas par bya'o/ /snyam ste/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bslab pa mnyam pa yin no/ /
369b7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ bslab pa mnyam pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
370a1(khri brgyad): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to / bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems
370a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nang stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
370a3(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid yin no/ /gzugs ni/ gzugs kyis stong ngo / /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
370a4(khri brgyad): par shes pa ni/ rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /de bzhin du byang chub kyi bar du'ang byang chub kyis stong ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam
370a5(khri brgyad): pa nyid yin te/ mnyam pa nyid de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
370a6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob
370a7(khri brgyad): pa lags sam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'gog pa'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
370b1(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/ gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i
370b2(khri brgyad): bar dag bas par bgyi ba'i bar du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/ de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi skye ba ma mchis pa'i bar du slob na/ rnam pa thams
370b3(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i bar du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags
370b4(khri brgyad): sam| skye ba ma mchis pa'i bar gyi slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi bar du bas par bgyi ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang /
370b5(khri brgyad): skye ba ma mchis pa'i bar du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/ de bzhin du thams cad la'ang rgya cher sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
370b6(khri brgyad): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ gang gzugs zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin
370b7(khri brgyad): nam/ skye ba med pa'i bar du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/
371a1(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam/ skye ba med pa'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi bar du zad
371a2(khri brgyad): par bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / skye ba med pa'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam/ de bzhin du thams cad la'ang rgya cher sbyar
371a3(khri brgyad): bar bya'o/ /zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
371a4(khri brgyad): nyid dang / de bzhin du sbyar te byang chub kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs par gdags
371a5(khri brgyad): pa'i de bzhin nyid de la zad pa'am/ 'gag pa'am/ 'bri bar 'gyur ba yod snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de ni/
371a6(khri brgyad): ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin nyid la slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
371a7(khri brgyad): pa nyid la slob pa yin te/ de bzhin nyid la ni/ zad pa'am/ 'gag pa'am/ 'bri bar 'gyur ba'ang med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de
371b1(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid la slob cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la slob pa
371b2(khri brgyad): yin no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de
371b3(khri brgyad): ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems
371b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po ni/ bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis thul bar mi nus pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur ba nyid du
371b5(khri brgyad): phyir mi ldog pa'i rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rang gi pha de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa yin no/ /
371b6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ mun pa med par byed pa'i chos rnams la spyod pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
371b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i chos rnams la spyod pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byams pa
372a1(khri brgyad): chen po la slob pa yin/ snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba
372a2(khri brgyad): dag la slob pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lan gsum du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i phyir slob
372a3(khri brgyad): pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /zhes slob pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/
372a4(khri brgyad): 'di ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun mi chad par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub
372a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'chi ba med pa'i sgo rnam par dbye bar bya'o/ /zhes slob pa yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ /zhes slob pa yin te/ rab 'byor/
372a6(khri brgyad): sems can dman pa rnams kyis ni/ bslab pa 'di la slob par mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba las
372a7(khri brgyad): 'don par 'dod pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can dmyal bar mi skye'o/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
372b1(khri brgyad): 'jig rten dang / yul mtha' 'khob rnams su mi skye'o/ /gdol pa'i rigs rnams su mi skye'o/ /zhar bar mi 'gyur/ 'theng por mi 'gyur/ 'on par mi 'gyur/ lba ba can du mi 'gyur/ gzhogs phyed
372b2(khri brgyad): skam par mi 'gyur/ dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur te/ dbang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / yongs su ma rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /srog gcod par mi 'gyur/ log par lta ba'i bar du mi 'gyur
372b3(khri brgyad): log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin par mi byed do/ /tshul khrims 'chal par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs su 'dzin par mi byed do/ /rab 'byor
372b4(khri brgyad): de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha tshe ring po rnams kyi nang du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thabs la mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
372b5(khri brgyad): chen po bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug kyang bsam gtan
372b6(khri brgyad): rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dbang gis mi skye ba'i thabs la mkhas pa de la yod pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub
372b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su dag pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi stobs yongs su dag pa rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /de skad
373a1(khri brgyad): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs
373a2(khri brgyad): su dag pa lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang zhig gi yongs su dag pa rtogs par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin
373a3(khri brgyad): te| de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ rang bzhin gyi yongs su dag pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar chos thams cad yongs su dag pa la/ byang chub sems
373a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong ba gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha
373a5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa yin na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis chos nyid de mi shes mi mthong nas/ sems can de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
373a6(khri brgyad): spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la spyod de/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad la de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa
373a7(khri brgyad): rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnam par g.yo ba'i pha rol tu 'gro ba yin
373b1(khri brgyad): no| |rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa chen po'i phyogs dag na gang na dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi sa le sbram dang / dngul dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni/ nyung ngo / /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du sems can gang dag
373b2(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di la slob pa de dag ni/ nyung gi /sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa de dag ni/ de bas ches mang ngo / /rab
373b3(khri brgyad): 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sems can gang dag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de dag ni/ nyung gi /sems can gang dag khams kyi rgyal por
373b4(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de dag ni/ ches mang ngo / /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du sems can gang dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam 'di la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag
373b5(khri brgyad): ni/ nyung gi /sems can gang dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam du yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni/ ches mang ngo / /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang
373b6(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag de bzhin nyid la sgrub pa dag ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang gang dag nyan thos
373b7(khri brgyad): dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba ni/ ches mang ngo / /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing phyir mi ldog
374a1(khri brgyad): pa'i sa gnon par 'gyur ba de dag pas ni/ gang dag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon par mi 'gyur ba dag ches mang ngo / /rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa'
374a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par 'dod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sar bgrang bar chud par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
374a3(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems
374a4(khri brgyad): mi bskyed do/ /'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /le lo dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /rnam par g.yeng ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /'chal pa'i shes rab dang ldan
374a5(khri brgyad): pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /tha ba dang ldan pa'i sems
374a6(khri brgyad): mi bskyed do/ /gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te byang
374a7(khri brgyad): chub kyi bar dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa ni/
374b1(khri brgyad): chos gang yang mi dmigs te/ mi dmigs pas/ chos gang la'ang sems bskyed par mi byed pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
374b2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yang dag par bzung ba yin no/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa yin no/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams
374b3(khri brgyad): cad kyi rjes su song ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
374b4(khri brgyad): dper na/ lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis po dag ni/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i nang du 'dus so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i nang du
374b5(khri brgyad): 'dus so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi 'chi ba'i dus byas pas srog gi dbang po 'gag na/ dbang po thams cad kyang 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
374b6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad rjes su song ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa
374b7(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
375a1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar slob pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
375a2(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag mang ba yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can nyid kyang mang ba lags na/ gang dag stong
375a3(khri brgyad): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ mang lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ stong
375a4(khri brgyad): g sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
375a5(khri brgyad): p ar sangs rgyas bar gyur la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams
375a6(khri brgyad): cad re re la na bza' dang / bshos dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad dag gis bsnyen bkur byas na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang
375a7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang
375b1(khri brgyad): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog
375b2(khri brgyad): pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa'
375b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'i don chen po byed pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems
375b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi bla na med par 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / skyabs med pa rnams
375b5(khri brgyad): kyi skyabs su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / mun pa can rnams kyi sgron mar 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas nyid rjes su
375b6(khri brgyad): thob par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul du phyin par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pas rnam par rtse bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi seng+ge'i sgra sgrog par 'dod pa dang /
375b7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi rnga bo che brdung bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dung 'bud par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang 'phel ba'i gtam zer bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
376a1(khri brgyad): pa zab mo 'di nyid la de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
376a2(khri brgyad): pos ni| phun sum tshogs pa gang thob par bya ba de dag las mi 'thob pa gang yang med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci/ nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang
376a3(khri brgyad): des thob par bgyi lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des thob par bgyi lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nyan
376a4(khri brgyad): thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des thob par bya zhing rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des thob par bya mod kyi/ de la gnas par mi bya/ brten par mi bya ste/ shes pa dang mthong bas
376a5(khri brgyad): rnam par bltas nas shin tu 'da' bar bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa
376a6(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
376a7(khri brgyad): chen po ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ gang
376b1(khri brgyad): dag de las gzhan pa'i sbyin pa'i gnas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin no/ /rab
376b2(khri brgyad): 'byor| de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi gtong zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma
376b3(khri brgyad): bral ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams
376b4(khri brgyad): pa'i chos can du rig par bya ste/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis ring du byed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa yin no/ /gal te de 'di snyam du/ 'di ni/
376b5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub par bya'o/ /snyam du gal te de ltar kun tu shes
376b6(khri brgyad): par byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /gal te 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ 'di na yod do/ /zhes bya bar kun tu shes pa
376b7(khri brgyad): med de/ gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ba dang / gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par 'byung zhing / bla na med pa
377a1(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu'ang mi shes/ mi mthong la/ gal te yang de 'di snyam du/ chos kyi dbyings dang / de
377a2(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas pa'i phyir 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ma yin/ 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'ang ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
377a3(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'dis chos gang yang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang med do/ /snyam du sems na/ rab 'byor/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
377a4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ spyod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya
377a5(khri brgyad): byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
377a6(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la
377a7(khri brgyad): spyod pas kyang / sems can thams cad zil gyis non par 'gyur na/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/
377b1(khri brgyad): sems can gang dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sems 'jug pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed cing / 'tsho ba legs par 'tsho ba yin na/ gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
377b2(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sems can gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag ni/ 'dod par bya ba yin no/ /sems
377b3(khri brgyad): can gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag kyang 'dod par bya ba yin no/ /snyam nas de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis me tog man+dA ra ba dag blangs
377b4(khri brgyad): nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / me tog man+dA ra ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor to/ /mngon par gtor
377b5(khri brgyad): to| |mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas kyang tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang
377b6(khri brgyad): dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dmigs pa de dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang yongs
377b7(khri brgyad): su rdzogs par gyur cig / rang byung gi chos 'di dag nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /'dis zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/
378a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/ bla na med pa gang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
378a2(khri brgyad): chub las slar ldog par 'gyur bar sems skye ba 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag byang chub
378a3(khri brgyad): las slar ldog cing / nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar sems skye ba 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis te/ gzhan du lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don
378a4(khri brgyad): dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dag ni/ de ltar 'khor ba na rgyu ba'i sdug bsngal 'di dag mthong nas 'di ltar sems bskyed par bgyid de/ bdag brgal nas ma brgal
378a5(khri brgyad): ba'i sems can rnams ji ltar bsgral bar bgyi/ bdag grol nas ma grol ba'i sems can rnams ji ltar dgrol bar bgyi/ bdag dbugs phyin nas dbugs ma phyin pa'i sems can rnams
378a6(khri brgyad): ji ltar dbugs dbyung bar bgyi/ bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa'i sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bgyi zhes bla na med
378a7(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'dun pa skyed par bgyid cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam rgya chen po dag kyang 'debs par bgyid lags so/ /bcom
378b1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid
378b2(khri brgyad): pa dang / yun ring du spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
378b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi
378b4(khri brgyad): rang bar bgyid pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
378b5(khri brgyad): kau shi ka /gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni/ srang la gzhal bas tshad gzung du rung yang srid kyi/ rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las byung ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi
378b6(khri brgyad): tshad ni/ de lta ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni/ srang la gzhal bas tshad gzung du rung yang srid kyi/ rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las byung ba'i sems
378b7(khri brgyad): bskyed pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi tshad ni/ de lta ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po dag ni/ skra'i rtse mo brgyar bshags pa'i rtse mos chu'i
379a1(khri brgyad): thigs pa re re nas bcu zhing tshad gzung du rung yang srid kyi/ rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las byung ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi tshad ni/ de lta ma
379a2(khri brgyad): yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang dag sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su
379a3(khri brgyad): yi rang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni/ bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang dag sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni/ bdud
379a4(khri brgyad): kyi phyogs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang dag sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni/ bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du
379a5(khri brgyad): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang dag sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang ba mngon par sgrub cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyid pa de
379a6(khri brgyad): dag ni/ bdud kyi gnas rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur
379a7(khri brgyad): ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag la ni/ rjes su yi rang bar bgyi ba lags so/ /gang dag gis sangs rgyas yongs su ma btang ba dang / chos yongs su ma btang ba dang / dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba
379b1(khri brgyad): de dag gis kyang sems bskyed pa 'di dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o/ /de dag gis rjes su yi rang nas kyang ci nas kyang gnyis su 'du shes su 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang / gnyis ma lags
379b2(khri brgyad): pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba ma mchis pa de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de de bzhin te/
379b3(khri brgyad): de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ kau shi ka /gang sems bskyed pa de la rjes su yi rang ba de dag ni/ myur ba nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
379b4(khri brgyad): rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur zhing / mnyes par byas nas kyang thugs phyung bar byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan
379b5(khri brgyad): pa de dag ni/ gang dang gang du skyes pa de dag dang der yang bsti stang du bya bar 'gyur/ bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'gyur ro/ /nam du'ang gzugs yid du mi 'ong ba mthong
379b6(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur/ sgra yid du mi 'ong ba thos par mi 'gyur/ dri yid du mi 'ong ba tshor bar mi 'gyur/ ro yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar mi 'gyur/ reg bya yid du mi 'ong ba reg par mi 'gyur/ chos yid du mi
379b7(khri brgyad): 'ong ba rnam par shes par mi 'gyur ro/ /nam du'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ sangs
380a1(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ de dag la'ang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par yang 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /'di ltar/ rigs kyi
380a2(khri brgyad): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la rjes su yi rang ba byas shing / bla na
380a3(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa dang / sa dang po la gnas pa rnams dang / sa gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams dang / sa bcu pa'i bar la gnas pa rnams kyi dge
380a4(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yi rang bar byas pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la rjes su yi rang ba byas shing / bla na med
380a5(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir ro/ /de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba rngam par 'phel ba de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ro//
380a6(khri brgyad): de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed par
380a7(khri brgyad): 'gyur te/ kau shi ka /rnam grangs des na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la
380b1(khri brgyad): rjes su yi rang zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/ ci nas kyang sems de la'ang ma yin zhing / sems gzhan la'ang ma yin pa de ltar yongs su bsngo
380b2(khri brgyad): bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyad pa spyod pa rnams dang / phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang / skya ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la'ang rjes su yi rang zhing / bla na
380b3(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/ ci nas kyang sems de la'ang ma yin zhing / sems gzhan la'ang ma yin pa de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
380b4(khri brgyad): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ sgyu ma lta bu'i sems bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
380b5(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma lta bu'i sems de khyod kyis
380b6(khri brgyad): yang dag par rjes su mthong snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma mthong lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni/ sgyu ma dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i sems kyang yang dag par rjes su
380b7(khri brgyad): ma mthong lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang la sgyu ma dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i sems khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i sems gang yin pa de/ bla na med
381a1(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
381a2(khri brgyad): 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gzhan pa'i chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yang dag par rjes
381a3(khri brgyad): su mthong snyam mam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni/ sgyu ma dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gzhan pa'i chos gang bla na med pa yang dag
381a4(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos gzhan yang dag par rjes su ma
381a5(khri brgyad): mthong na/ chos gang zhig mchis zhes bgyi ba'am/ ma mchis zhes bgyi bar nye bar bstan par bgyi/ chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni/ mchis pa'am/ ma mchis par mi 'gyur lags te/ chos gang
381a6(khri brgyad): shin tu dben pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur la/ mchis pa ma lags pa'i chos kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
381a7(khri brgyad): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ gang kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'i
381b1(khri brgyad): chos de dag thams cad ni/ ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shin tu dben pa lags la/ de bzhin
381b2(khri brgyad): du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du'ang shin tu dben pa lags shing / de bzhin du byang chub kyi bar du'ang shin tu dben pa lags pa'i slad du ste/ chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni/ bsgom par bgyi
381b3(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma lags/ rnam par gzhig bar bgyi ba'ang ma lags so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ shin tu dben pa'i slad du/ chos gang yang sgrub par mi bgyid lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
381b4(khri brgyad): pa shin tu dben pa lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
381b5(khri brgyad): yang ji ltar 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shin tu dben pa lags na/ ji ltar dben pas dben pa rjes su rtogs par 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
381b6(khri brgyad): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ legs so/ /legs so/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/
381b7(khri brgyad): shin tu dben pa yin no/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shin tu dben pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du sbyar te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar
382a1(khri brgyad): du'ang shin tu dben pa yin no/ /byang chub kyang shin tu dben pa yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang shin tu dben pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ ji
382a2(khri brgyad): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben pa de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
382a3(khri brgyad): par 'tshang rgya ba'ang dben pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur la/ de bzhin du sbyar te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang shin tu dben
382a4(khri brgyad): par ma gyur na/ de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang mi 'gyur la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
382a5(khri brgyad): pa shin tu dben pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben pa de ltar/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
382a6(khri brgyad): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma yin la/ dben pas kyang dben pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'ang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang yang rgya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
382a7(khri brgyad): pa la ma brten par yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
382b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni/ don zab mo la spyod pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/
382b2(khri brgyad): don zab mo dag la spyod pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang don zab mo la spyod kyang 'di lta ste/ don de dang nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
382b3(khri brgyad): sa mngon sum du mi byed pa ni/ dka' ba byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
382b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po ni/ dka' ba bgyid pa ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar gang mngon sum du bgyid pa'i don de'ang dmigs su ma mchis la/ gang gis mngon
382b5(khri brgyad): sum du bgyi ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang dmigs su ma mchis shing / gang mngon sum du bgyi ba'i chos de'ang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams
382b6(khri brgyad): cad dmigs su ma mchis na/ gang mngon sum du bgyis nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i don gang mngon sum du bgyi bar
382b7(khri brgyad): 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang mngon sum du bgyi bar 'gyur/ chos gang mngon sum du bgyi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs par spyod pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
383a1(khri brgyad): spyod pa lags te/ de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos thams cad la mun pa ma mchis par rjes su 'thob lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
383a2(khri brgyad): gal te de skad bstan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing / mi skrag mi dngang la/ dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang
383a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags te/ des ni/ mtshan ma'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yang dag par
383a4(khri brgyad): rjes su mi mthong / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bgyi bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang
383a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni/ 'di snyam du/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni/ bdag dang ring la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
383a6(khri brgyad): nyid ni/ bdag dang nye ba'o/ /snyam du mi sems lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ nam mkha' ni/ 'di snyam du/ bdag ni/ la la dang ni/ nye'o/ /la la dang ni/ ring ngo //
383a7(khri brgyad): snyam du mi sems lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ nam mkha' la ni/ bye brag ma mchis la/ bcom ldan 'das/ nam mkha' la ni/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad
383b1(khri brgyad): du'o| |bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'di snyam du/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni/ bdag dang ring la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni /nye
383b2(khri brgyad): ba'o| |snyam du mi sems lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi
383b3(khri brgyad): na| sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni/ 'di snyam du/ sgyu ma ni/ bdag dang ring la/ sgyu ma mkhan dang ni/ nye ba'o/ /zhe'am/ skye bo'i tshogs 'dus pa 'di dag ni/ bdag dang nye'o/ /zhe'am/ ring ngo / /zhes bgyi
383b4(khri brgyad): bar mi sems lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la ni/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
383b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa'ang 'di snyam du/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni/ bdag dang ring la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ bdag dang nye ba'o/ /snyam du mi sems lags so/ /
383b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ gzugs brnyan ni/ 'di snyam du/ dmigs pa gang gis gzugs brnyan byung ba de ni/ bdag dang nye la/ me long ngam/ snod kyi chab der ma byung bdag ni/
383b7(khri brgyad): bdag dang ring ba'o/ /snyam du mi sems lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs brnyan ni/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin
384a1(khri brgyad): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang 'di snyam du/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni/ bdag dang
384a2(khri brgyad): ring la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ bdag dang nye ba'o/ /snyam du mi sems lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par
384a3(khri brgyad): rtog pa ma mchis pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni/ sdug pa'am/ mi sdug pa ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de la gang sdug pa'am/
384a4(khri brgyad): mi sdug par 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin dmigs sum mchis pa'i slad du 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
384a5(khri brgyad): rgyas la ni/ sdug pa'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba gang yang mi mnga' lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang sdug pa'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba gang yang ma mchis
384a6(khri brgyad): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ni/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa lags so/ /
384a7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper
384b1(khri brgyad): bgyi na| de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni/ 'di snyam du/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni/ bdag dang ring la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ bdag
384b2(khri brgyad): dang nye ba'o/ /snyam du mi sems lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la ni/ rnam par rtog pa mi mnga'
384b3(khri brgyad): ba'i slad du 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang 'di snyam du/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
384b4(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi sa ni/ bdag dang ring la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ bdag dang nye ba'o/ /snyam du mi sems lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ de bzhin
384b5(khri brgyad): gshegs pas sprul pa zhig sprul mdzad na/ de na de ni/ gang gi slad du sprul pa de'i bgyi ba bgyid kyang sprul pa de ni/ mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
384b6(khri brgyad): phyin pa'ang bgyi ba gang gi slad du sgom pa'i bgyi ba de bgyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni/ mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ shing mkhan nam/ shing mkhan
384b7(khri brgyad): gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis bud med kyi gzugs sam/ skyes pa'i gzugs sam/ glang po che'i gzugs sam/ glang gi gzugs kyi 'khrul 'khor zhig sbyar bar gyur na/ 'khrul 'khor de bgyi ba gang gi slad
385a1(khri brgyad): du bgyis pa'i bgyi ba de bgyid kyang 'khrul 'khor de ni/ mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang bgyi ba gang
385a2(khri brgyad): gi slad du sgom pa'i bgyi ba de bgyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni/ mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras
385a3(khri brgyad): so| |tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ 'on te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa yin la/ sbyin
385a4(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar yang mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar yang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus
385a5(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 'o na ci/ gzugs kyang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa yin
385a6(khri brgyad): nam/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci/ mig kyang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa yin la/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci/
385a7(khri brgyad): gzugs kyang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa yin la/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar dang /
385b1(khri brgyad): mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las byung pa'i tshor ba'ang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog
385b2(khri brgyad): pa yin nam/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci/ bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar
385b3(khri brgyad): gzhag pa rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa
385b4(khri brgyad): yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'ang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ sangs
385b5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang / sangs rgyas kyang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ byang chub kyang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams
385b6(khri brgyad): kyang mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ chos thams cad kyang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gal te chos
385b7(khri brgyad): thams cad mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog pa yin na/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha dang / mi'i 'gro ba lngar 'khor ba zhes tha dad du dbye ba 'di ci las gyur/ rgyun du
386a1(khri brgyad): zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ces bya ba'i bar du rab tu dbye ba'ang ci las gyur/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
386a2(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sems can 'di dag ni/ phyin ci log las byung ba'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las mngon par 'du byed de/ gzhi de
386a3(khri brgyad): las 'dun pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su 'dzin cing mngon par sgrub par byed do/ /yongs su bzung bas rnam par rtog pa las byung ba'i sems can dmyal ba dang / dud
386a4(khri brgyad): 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha dang / mi'i 'gro ba dag mngon par sgrub par byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan
386a5(khri brgyad): gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas zhes rab tu dbye ba'ang ci las gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du dbye ba'ang ci las gyur ces
386a6(khri brgyad): zer ba na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ rnam par mi rtog pas rab tu phye ba yin la/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rang byang chub
386a7(khri brgyad): kyang rnam par mi rtog pas rab tu phye ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyang rnam par mi rtog pas rab tu phye ba yin la/ byang chub kyang rnam par mi rtog pas rab tu phye ba yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin
386b1(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ba/ rnam par rtog pa dang
386b2(khri brgyad): bral ba/ rnam par rtog pa spangs pa yin la/ de bzhin du ma byon pa rnams kyang rnam par rtog pa spong bar 'gyur zhing / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da
386b3(khri brgyad): ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang rnam par rtog pa mi mnga'/ rnam
386b4(khri brgyad): par rtog pa dang bral ba/ rnam par rtog pa spangs pa yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings
386b5(khri brgyad): kyi de bzhin nyid tshad mar byas nas chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
386b6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong
386b7(khri brgyad): pa las/ rnam par mi rtog pa bstan pa'i dpe brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
387a1(khri brgyad): bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
387a2(khri brgyad): spyod pa de ni/ snying po la spyod pa yin no/ /kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ snying po la spyod pa yin no/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
387a3(khri brgyad): bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni/ snying po med pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
387a4(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni/ snying po med pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar/
387a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas snying po med pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ snying po dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ de bzhin du
387a6(khri brgyad): sbyar te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang snying po med pa yin na/ snying po dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rab tu mang po dag
387a7(khri brgyad): 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs bu mo gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa de dag dang / gang dag ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi
387b1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa dang / don de la spyod kyang gang mngon sum du byas pas/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed pa de dag
387b2(khri brgyad): ni| phyag bya bar 'os pa yin te/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chos 'di dag mnyam pa nyid du mngon sum du mi byed pa de dag ni/ phyag bya bar 'os pa yin no/ /snyam mo/ /
387b3(khri brgyad): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gang mngon sum du byas pas/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
387b4(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag mnyam pa nyid du mngon sum du mi byed pa ni/ dka' ba ma yin gyi/ lha'i bu dag /de dag gis sems can grangs med/ tshad med/ dpag tu med pa dag yongs
387b5(khri brgyad): su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /zhes go cha chen po bgos la/ gang gdul bar bya ba'i sems can de dag kyang shin tu mi dmigs pa ni/ dka' ba yin te/ lha'i bu dag /de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
387b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can thams cad gdul bar bya'o/ /zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /gang sems can rnams gdul bar bya'o/ /snyam du sems
387b7(khri brgyad): pa de ni/ nam mkha' gdul bar bya'o/ /snyam du sems pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' dben pa'i phyir sems can dben par blta ba dang / nam mkha' stong pa'i phyir sems can stong par blta ba dang / nam
388a1(khri brgyad): mkha' snying po med pa'i phyir sems can snying po med par blta ba dang / nam mkha' gsog yin pa'i phyir sems can gsog yin pa lta ba'i phyir te/ kye ma lha'i bu dag /rnam grangs
388a2(khri brgyad): des na| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can med pa rnams kyi ched du go cha gyon par byed pa de dag ni/ dka' ba byed pa yin no/ /lha'i bu dag /gang sems can rnams kyi ched du go cha bgo
388a3(khri brgyad): bar sems pa de ni/ nam mkha' dang rtsod par 'dod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ go cha de'ang bgos la/ gang gi don du go cha bgos ba'i sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i
388a4(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ sems can dben pa'i phyir go cha dben par blta ba'i phyir te/ gal te de skad bstan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum par mi 'gyur na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
388a5(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs dben pa'i phyir sems can dben par blta ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams dben pa'i phyir sems
388a6(khri brgyad): can dben pa dang / gzugs dben pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dben pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te gzugs dben pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gal te chos
388a7(khri brgyad): thams cad dben pa nyid du bstan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing / mi skrag mi dngang la/ dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
388b1(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyur ba yin/
388b2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma mchis pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dben pa dang / zhi ba
388b3(khri brgyad): dang / ma skyes pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyur lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
388b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ gang zhum par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis zhum par 'gyur ba dang / gang la zhum
388b5(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de skad bstan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhum pa ma mchis
388b6(khri brgyad): shing mi skrag la/ mi zhum mi 'gong mi skrag /mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ gang zhum par 'gyur ba
388b7(khri brgyad): dang / gang gis zhum par 'gyur ba dang / gang la zhum par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar
389a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / skye rgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis phyag
389a2(khri brgyad): bgyi ba lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de
389a3(khri brgyad): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / skye rgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams nyi tshes phyag bya bar yang ma zad
389a4(khri brgyad): kyi| rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa de la ni/ kha dog las shin tu 'das pa'i lha'i bu dge rgyas pa rnams dang / 'bras
389a5(khri brgyad): bu che ba rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag gis kyang phyag bya ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
389a6(khri brgyad): la spyod pa de la ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
389a7(khri brgyad): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
389b1(khri brgyad): yin no/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba yin no/ /zhes dgongs par
389b2(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
389b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po de ni/ sangs rgyas nyid du zhugs pa yin par gzung bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdud sdig can sha
389b4(khri brgyad): stag tu gyur la/ bdud sdig can re res kyang bdud sdig can de snyed cig mngon par sprul kyang de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la
389b5(khri brgyad): bar chad bya bar mi nus so/ /rab 'byor/ chos gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bdud sdig can rnams kyis mi thul ba yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ des chos thams
389b6(khri brgyad): cad la stong pa nyid du rnam par bltas pa dang / des sems can thams cad yongs su ma btang ba yin te/ rab 'byor/ chos gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/
389b7(khri brgyad): bdud sdig can rnams kyis mi thul ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ bdud sdig can
390a1(khri brgyad): rnams kyis mi thul ba yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin te/ rab 'byor/
390a2(khri brgyad): chos gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ bdud sdig can rnams kyis mi thub pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar spyod
390a3(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du lha'i bu rnams kyang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongs su zhu ba dang / yongs su dri ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro bar sems shing / rigs kyi bu/ khyod
390a4(khri brgyad): ni| myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyis gnas pa dang / mtshan ma
390a5(khri brgyad): med pas gnas pa dang / smon pa med pas gnas pa'i gnas pa de dag gis gnas par gyis shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod gnas pa de dag gis gnas na/ sems can mgon med
390a6(khri brgyad): pa rnams kyi mgon du 'gyur ba dang / sems can skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur ba dang / sems can rten med pa rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ba dang / sems can dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi
390a7(khri brgyad): dpung gnyen du 'gyur pa dang / sems can gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur ba dang / sems can gling med pa rnams kyi gling du 'gyur ba dang / sems can mun par gyur pa rnams kyi snang bar
390b1(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /zhes spro ba skyed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams
390b2(khri brgyad): g rangs med dpag tu med pa dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang byang
390b3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod cing / 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan gyi yo byad de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
390b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ming dang / rigs yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ da ltar nga byang chub
390b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che tog gi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug tor can
390b6(khri brgyad): gyi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa dang / nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
390b7(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i drung du tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ming
391a1(khri brgyad): yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa bzhin no/ /rab 'byor/ shar phyogs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs
391a2(khri brgyad): t e 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'di ltar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de dag la dga' bar mdzad
391a3(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na
391a4(khri brgyad): s angs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag tshangs
391a5(khri brgyad): par spyad pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de dag la dga' bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du rjod par mdzad do/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub
391a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa'i bar de
391a7(khri brgyad): dag la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dga' bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du rjod par mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
391b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag da ltar sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi chad pa'i phyir bzhugs pa dag ni/ dga' ba byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
391b2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slar ldog pa'am/ slar mi ldog pa gang dag gi ming yongs
391b3(khri brgyad): su brjod cing dga' bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston par mdzad lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ byang
391b4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang dag phyir mi ldog pa dag kyang yod/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
391b5(khri brgyad): lung ma bstan pa dag kyang yod de/ de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dga' bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du rjod par mdzad do/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol
391b6(khri brgyad): ba| bcom ldan 'das/ de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bcom
391b7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa de dag ni/ rab 'byor/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
392a1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin te/ de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dga' bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du rjod par
392a2(khri brgyad): mdzad do/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che tog gi rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
392a3(khri brgyad): pa de dag la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dga' bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du rjod par mdzad do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
392a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos thams cad skye ba med par mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa dag dang / chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar
392a5(khri brgyad): mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa dag dang / chos thams cad zhi ba zhes bya bar mos pa dang / chos thams cad 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang / gsog ces bya ba dang / ya
392a6(khri brgyad): ma brla zhes bya ba dang / snying po med pa zhes bya bar mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la/ rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
392a7(khri brgyad): de dag dga' bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du rjod par mdzad do/ /rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
392b1(khri brgyad): chen po gang dag gi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / dga' bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du rjod par mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
392b2(khri brgyad): po de dag ni/ rab 'byor/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su spangs shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas
392b3(khri brgyad): b com ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag gi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched
392b4(khri brgyad): du rjod par mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur zhing / de la gnas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/
392b5(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo thos nas 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji skad gsungs
392b6(khri brgyad): pa de bzhin no/ /zhes nem nur med cing the tshom mi za la rmongs par mi 'gyur na/ des ni/ phyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dang / byang chub
392b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag las 'di nyid rgya cher thos par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos par 'gyur zhing / shes rab
393a1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa na/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin no/ /zhes mos shing phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur te/ rab
393a2(khri brgyad): 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la de ltar gces spras byed pa yin na/ gang mos shing mos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du gnas shing de
393a3(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du gnas shing de bzhin nyid du bsgrubs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rab 'byor gyis gsol
393a4(khri brgyad): pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang de bzhin nyid du gnas shing / de bzhin nyid du bsgrubs na/ chos gang yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ba lags na/ ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa
393a5(khri brgyad): 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis na/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la
393a6(khri brgyad): gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas chos ston par 'gyur te/ de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su ma
393a7(khri brgyad): mchis lags na/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba
393b1(khri brgyad): dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas nas chos ston par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ de ni/ gnas ma mchis lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
393b2(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ khyod 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos gang yang ma mchis na/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur/ su zhig de bzhin
393b3(khri brgyad): nyid la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas chos ston par 'gyur te/ de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs
393b4(khri brgyad): su ma mchis lags na/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid
393b5(khri brgyad): la gnas nas chos ston par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ de ni/ gnas ma mchis lags so/ /zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin to/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/
393b6(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid ma gtogs par chos gang yang dmigs su med na/ gang zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / gang zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
393b7(khri brgyad): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / gang zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas chos ston par 'gyur te/ de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su med na/ gang de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du sbyar
394a1(khri brgyad): te/ de bzhin nyid la gnas nas chos ston par 'gyur ba'i bar dag lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang
394a2(khri brgyad): rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas
394a3(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni/ gnas pa nyid kyi phyir te/ rab 'byor/ gang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa su'ang med/ de bzhin nyid la gnas nas bla na med pa
394a4(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'ang med/ de bzhin nyid la gnas nas chos ston par 'gyur pa'ang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ de bzhin
394a5(khri brgyad): nyid la ni/ gang de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang de bzhin nyid la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / gang
394a6(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid la gnas nas chos ston par 'gyur ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su med pas/ de la skye ba'ang dmigs su med/ 'jig pa'ang med/ gnas pa'ang
394a7(khri brgyad): med/ gzhan du 'gyur ba'ang med de/ de'i phyir chos de la skye ba dmigs su med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas pa med pa dang / gzhan du 'gyur ba med pas na/ su zhig de la gnas par
394b1(khri brgyad): 'gyur/ su zhig de la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ su zhig de la gnas nas chos ston par 'gyur te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /de nas
394b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ zab pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'
394b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba dag ni/ dka' ba bgyid pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang
394b4(khri brgyad): yang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa su'ang ma mchis shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang gang yang ma mchis la/ chos ston pa'ang gang yang ma mchis kyang / de
394b5(khri brgyad): la zhum par yang mi 'gyur/ de la nem nur yang mi bgyid/ rmongs par yang mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka /gang
394b6(khri brgyad): khyod 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chos zab mo rnams la nem nur med cing rmongs pa med pa ni/ dka' ba byed pa yin no/ /zhes zer ba ni/ kau shi ka /chos thams cad
394b7(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid yin pas na/ de la su zhig nem nur ram rmongs par 'gyur/ de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gnas brtan rab 'byor
395a1(khri brgyad): ni| gang ci ston kyang de thams cad stong pa nyid las brtsams shing ston te/ ci la'ang chags pa med do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ mda' nam mkha' la 'phangs pa ni/ gang
395a2(khri brgyad): du'ang chags pa med do/ /de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos bstan pa'ang gang du'ang chags pa med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ chags pa med pa'i le'u zhes bya
395a3(khri brgyad): ste| lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol te/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis de skad smras shing de skad bstan
395a4(khri brgyad): pa| bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rjes su smra zhing chos smra ba dang / chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos yang dag par brjod pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/
395a5(khri brgyad): gang khyod kyis de skad smras shing de skad bstan pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rjes su smra zhing chos smra ba dang / chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos brjod pa yin no/ /brgya byin gyis gsol
395a6(khri brgyad): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis spobs pa de thams cad ni/ stong pa nyid las brtsams shing spobs pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa las
395a7(khri brgyad): brtsams shing spobs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi bar las brtsams shing spobs pa ste/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
395b1(khri brgyad): lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka /rab 'byor 'di ni stong pa nyid kyis gnas pas na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
395b2(khri brgyad): la spyod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
395b3(khri brgyad): pa rnams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ lam nyid kyi bar yang mi dmigs na/ gang dag lam sgom par 'gyur ba lta
395b4(khri brgyad): smos kyang ci dgos/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dag bsam gtan dang /
395b5(khri brgyad): tshad med pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa sgom pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ stobs rnams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dag stobs rnams la sgom pa lta smos kyang
395b6(khri brgyad): ci dgos/ mi 'jigs pa rnams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dag mi 'jigs pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dag
395b7(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ byams pa chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dag byams pa chen po la gnas par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ snying rje
396a1(khri brgyad): chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dag snying rje chen po la gnas par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/
396a2(khri brgyad): gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ byang chub nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang
396a3(khri brgyad): ci dgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/
396a4(khri brgyad): gang dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dag skye ba med pa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ mtshan rnams nyid
396a5(khri brgyad): kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dag gi lus la mtshan rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dpe byad bzang po rnams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang gi lus la dpe byad bzang po rnams 'byung bar
396a6(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /dge slong rab 'byor ni/ chos thams cad dben pa la gnas pa yin la/ kau shi ka /dge slong rab 'byor ni/ dmigs pa med pa la
396a7(khri brgyad): gnas pa dang / stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka /dge slong rab 'byor gyi gnas pa ni/ de lta bu yin
396b1(khri brgyad): te| kau shi ka / dge slong rab 'byor gyi gnas pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i gnas pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong
