396b2(khri brgyad): gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /'bum gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba phrag 'bum gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de ci'i
396b3(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa de dang / nyan thos dang / rang
396b4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas pa gang yin pa'i gnas pa de dag gi nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa de ni/ mchog
396b5(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / thu bo dang / khyad par du 'phags pa dang / rab dang / rab mchog dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa zhes bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka /de lta bas na/ byang
396b6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar 'dod pas 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gnas pa 'di nyid kyis gnas par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
396b7(khri brgyad): na| kau shi ka / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la
397a1(khri brgyad): 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
397a2(khri brgyad): nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de
397a3(khri brgyad): nas 'khor de nyid las sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis me tog man+dA ra ba dag blangs nas bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /dge slong drug
397a4(khri brgyad): stong yang stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas mig mi 'dzum
397a5(khri brgyad): par phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag gi snyim pa me tog mnad ra bdag gis rab tu gang bar gyur nas me tog man+dA ra ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
397a6(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /de dag gis gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor ba'i tshe tshig 'di skad du/ bcom
397a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas ma lags pa'i gnas pa dam pa 'dis gnas par gyur cig /ces kyang smras so/ /de nas bcom
397b1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad
397b2(khri brgyad): pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma/ kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha
397b3(khri brgyad): dog lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/ de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas khyab par byas nas slar log ste bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom
397b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan
397b5(khri brgyad): 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
397b6(khri brgyad): rnams ni/ rgyu ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad lags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni/ gang lags/ rkyen ni/ gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
397b7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ dge slong drug stong po 'di dag ni/ bskal pa skar ma lta bu zhes bya ba la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
398a1(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ me tog gtor ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
398a2(khri brgyad): sha stag tu 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog gtor ba zhes bya ba de dag gi dge slong gi dge 'dun yang mtshungs par 'gyur
398a3(khri brgyad): ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtshungs par 'gyur ro/ /tshe'i tshad kyang lo stong du mtshungs par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gang dang gang nas mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing mngon par byung nas rab tu 'byung ba dang /
398a4(khri brgyad): gang dang gang du rab tu byung ste gnas par 'gyur ba de dang de dag tu me tog kha dog lnga pa'i char dag kyang rab tu 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ gnas pa dam pas gnas par
398a5(khri brgyad): 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pas gnas par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
398a6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/
398a7(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo shes 'di ltar/ bdag ni/ mi'i nang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa yin te/ mi rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu
398b1(khri brgyad): pa zab mo 'di rgya cher thos par gyur pa'am/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rgya cher thos par gyur pa yin no/ /zhes nges par rtogs par bya'o/ /kun dga'
398b2(khri brgyad): bo| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gzigs par gyur pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo/
398b3(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du
398b4(khri brgyad): yid la byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams la'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rjes su ston par byed na/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
398b5(khri brgyad): pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'di snyam du/ bdag cag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol
398b6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par byas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
398b7(khri brgyad): las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa yin no/ /zhes nges par rtogs par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'di snyam du/ bdag cag gis ni/ nyan thos rnams
399a1(khri brgyad): las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ma yin zhing / nyan thos rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pa ma yin no/ /zhes bya bar rig par bya'o/ /kun dga'
399a2(khri brgyad): bo| rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed cing / don dang / chos
399a3(khri brgyad): dang / tshul las rjes su rtogs par byed na/ kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'di ltar/ bdag cag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
399a4(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon sum du gyur pa yin no/ /zhes nges par rtogs par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
399a5(khri brgyad): 'di bshad pa thos na/ mi spong mi smod cing dad pa thob par 'gyur na/ kun dga' bo/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba lhag par byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / dge
399a6(khri brgyad): ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
399a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'ang nyan thos nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/ sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba mi slu mod kyi/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
399b1(khri brgyad): po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pas legs par rtogs par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
399b2(khri brgyad): chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pas/ legs par rtogs par byas pa ni/ nyan thos nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid
399b3(khri brgyad): la gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di khyod la yongs su gtad do/ /kun dga' bo/ gal te ngas chos gang dag bstan pa rnams las
399b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma gtogs pa'i chos bstan pa de dag thams cad khyod kyis bzung zhing kun chub par byas nas de'i 'og tu chud gzan cing / de'i 'og tu spangs par gyur kyang kun dga' bo/
399b5(khri brgyad): nga de tsam gyi tshod kyis ni/ khyod la skyon du mi rtsi'i/ kun dga' bo/ gal te khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzung nas tshig gcig tsam yang chud gzan par gyur na/ kun dga'
399b6(khri brgyad): bo| de tsam gyis ni/ ngas khyod la skyon du rtsi'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gal te khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzung nas de'i 'og tu chud ma gzan ma bor na/ kun dga' bo/ de ni/
399b7(khri brgyad): ngas khyod la skyon du mi rtsi ste/ kun dga' bo/ ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/ khyod la yongs su gtad kyi/ ci nas kyang zungs shig /chongs shig /klogs shig /kun chub par
400a1(khri brgyad): gyis shig / rtag tu yid la gyis shig /legs par bzung ba dang / legs par bcang bar gyis shig /yi ge dang / tshig dang / tshig 'bru legs par rdzogs pa
400a2(khri brgyad): dang / nges pa'i tshig legs par zin par gyis shig /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog
400a3(khri brgyad): pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa des ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub rjes su yongs
400a4(khri brgyad): su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la da ltar nga la mngon sum du me tog gam/ spos sam/ me tog phreng ngam/ bdug pa'am/ byug pa'am/
400a5(khri brgyad): phye ma'am/ gos sam/ gdugs sam/ rgyal mtshan nam/ ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mo byed pa dang / mchod pa byed par 'dod pa de dag gis kyang
400a6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o/ /bzung zhing bcangs la bklags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang me tog dang /
400a7(khri brgyad): spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bsti
400b1(khri brgyad): stang du bya/ bla mar bya/ ri mo bya/ mchod par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed pa des ni/ nga yang mchod pa yin la/ 'das pa dang / ma
400b2(khri brgyad): byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la'ang mchod pa byas pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
400b3(khri brgyad): bshad pa la gus pa dang / dga' ba dang / dad pa bskyed par 'gyur ba des ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la gus pa dang / dga' ba dang / dad
400b4(khri brgyad): pa dang / ri mo bskyed pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ gal te khyod nga la dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / yongs su mi gtong ba de ltar khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la dga' ba dang
400b5(khri brgyad): yid du 'ong pa dang / yongs su mi gtang bar gyis la/ ci nas kyang khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i tshig gcig tsam yang chud ma zos par gyis shig /kun dga' bo/ ngas khyod la
400b6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su gdams pa las brtsams te mang du smras pa yang kun dga' bo/ mdor na ji ltar nga khyod kyi ston pa yin pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
400b7(khri brgyad): 'di'ang khyod kyi ston pa yin gyi/ kun dga' bo/ de bas na/ ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su gtad pa tshad med pas khyod la yongs su gtad do/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ ngas
401a1(khri brgyad): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang sbran te gang gis sangs rgyas yongs su ma gtang ba dang / chos yongs su ma gtang ba dang / dge 'dun yongs
401a2(khri brgyad): su ma gtang ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub yongs su ma btang ba des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs
401a3(khri brgyad): su ma gtang bar bya ste/ 'di ni/ ngas rjes su bstan pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
401a4(khri brgyad): klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rnam grangs du mar rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed
401a5(khri brgyad): pa dang / brjod pa dang / 'chad pa dang / shes par byed pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / rnam par 'grel ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed na/ kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu
401a6(khri brgyad): dang / rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no/ /de
401a7(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba yin te/ kun
401b1(khri brgyad): dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par
401b2(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba yin la/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag ma 'ongs
401b3(khri brgyad): pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang kun dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par 'byung ba yin
401b4(khri brgyad): zhing / kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag da ltar shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs
401b5(khri brgyad): mtshams dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang kun dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par skyes pa'i phyir
401b6(khri brgyad): ro| |kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa
401b7(khri brgyad): drug po 'di dag la bslab par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams skyed par byed pa
402a1(khri brgyad): yin pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa de dag thams cad ni/ bla na med pa yang dag
402a2(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag rgya cher yongs su gtad pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/
402a3(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdzod 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod yin te/ de ni/ mi zad pa'i mdzod yin
402a4(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs mtshams
402a5(khri brgyad): k yi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdzod 'di nyid las chos ston par
402a6(khri brgyad): mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid
402a7(khri brgyad): la bslab nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /kun dga' bo/ gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs
402b1(khri brgyad): p a dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin ba drug po 'di dag nyid la bslab nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
402b2(khri brgyad): zhing chos kyang ston par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ 'das pa dang / ma byon dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyan thos gang dag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi
402b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gal te khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa
402b4(khri brgyad): pa'i gang zag rnams la nyan thos kyi sa las brtsams te chos bstan par gyur la/ chos bstan pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad kyis dgra bcom
402b5(khri brgyad): pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur kyang de tsam gyis ni/ khyod kyis nga'i nyan thos kyis nyan thos kyi bya ba byas par gyur pa ma yin gyi/ kun dga' bo/ gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
402b6(khri brgyad): chen bo rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig gcig tsam rab tu bstan na/ de ni/ nyan thos khyod kyis nga mnyes par byas shing / nyan thos kyis nyan thos kyi bya ba byas pa yin no/ /kun
402b7(khri brgyad): dga' bo/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ chos bstan pa snga ma des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob nas dgra bcom
403a1(khri brgyad): pa nyid mngon du byas par gyur na/ dgra bcom pa de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams
403a2(khri brgyad): bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag mang ba yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
403a3(khri brgyad): mang lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de lta bas kyang nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
403a4(khri brgyad): la tha na nyi ma gcig tsam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston par byed na/ de ni/ bsod nams ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' po/ nyi ma gcig lta zhog gi /kun
403a5(khri brgyad): dga' bo/ gal te nyi ma phyed dam/ kun dga' bo/ nyi ma phyed lta'ang zhog gi /gal te snga dro gcig tsam mam/ kun dga' bo/ snga dro gcig tsam lta'ang zhog gi /gal te chu tshod gcig tsam gyi
403a6(khri brgyad): bar ram/ kun dga' bo/ chu tshod gcig tsam gyi bar lta'ang zhog gi/ gal te nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la skad cig gam/ thang gcig
403a7(khri brgyad): gam/ yud tsam zhig gi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan par gyur na/ kun dga' bo/ de ni/ de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur te/ des ni/ nyan thos
403b1(khri brgyad): kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i theg
403b2(khri brgyad): pa pa'i gang zag rnams la tha na nyi ma gcig gam/ nyi ma phyed dam/ snga dro'am/ chu tshod gcig tsam gyi bar ram/ skad cig gam/ thang gcig gam/ yud tsam zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
403b3(khri brgyad): ldan pa'i chos bstan par gyur na/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
403b4(khri brgyad): zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod la/ gzhan dag kyang bla na med
403b5(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing / yang dag par ston pa dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / 'dzud pa dang / rab tu 'god bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /kun
403b6(khri brgyad): dga' bo/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi bar la spyod cing /
403b7(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel ba gang gi phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ni/ gnas ma yin/ skabs ma yin te/ de ni/ gnas
404a1(khri brgyad): med do| |shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po dang / lha dang / mi dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha
404a2(khri brgyad): ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi mdun du 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad de/ 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par
404a3(khri brgyad): 'du mdzad pa/ mngon par mdzad pas 'khor de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su
404a4(khri brgyad): bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas la/ 'khor rgya mtsho mi 'khrugs pa thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems
404a5(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ /bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu
404a6(khri brgyad): sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
404a7(khri brgyad): pa'i gang zag rnams la chos ston pa mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul de phyir bsdus te/ rdzu 'phrul de phyir bsdus pa dang / 'khor bzhi po de dang / nyan thos kyi theg
404b1(khri brgyad): pa pa'i gang zag dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag la sogs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'ang ma
404b2(khri brgyad): mthong / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'ang ma mthong / sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong
404b3(khri brgyad): gi dge 'dun de dag kyang mig gi dbang po'i spyod yul du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa slar bsdu ba mdzad pas de'i phyir ma mthong
404b4(khri brgyad): ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ /khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang / de bzhin
404b5(khri brgyad): gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa de dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun de dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun de dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang / de bzhin
404b6(khri brgyad): gshegs pa de dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun de dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun de dag ni/ mig lam du'ang mi gda' lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin du chos thams cad
404b7(khri brgyad): kyang mig lam du mi snang ba yin te/ chos la chos mi snang ngo / /chos kyis chos mi mthong ngo / /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de dang /
405a1(khri brgyad): nyan thos de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de mig lam du mi snang ba de bzhin du/ kun dga' bo/ chos thams cad
405a2(khri brgyad): kyang mig lam du mi snang ba yin te/ chos kyis chos mi mthong ngo / /chos kyis chos kun tu mi shes te/ kun dga' bo/ chos thams cad ni/ shes pa med pa/ mthong ba med pa/ bya ba la mthu med
405a3(khri brgyad): pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ chos thams cad ni/ snying po med pa'i phyir g.yo ba med pa dang / gzung ba med pa yin te/ kun dga' bo/ chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa dang / gzung
405a4(khri brgyad): ba med pas na/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin te/ kun dga' bo/ chos thams cad ni/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar rig pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
405a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/ chos gang la'ang mngon par zhen pa med pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
405a6(khri brgyad): ni| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
405a7(khri brgyad): phyin pa la bslab par bya ste/ de ltar slob pa ni/ mchog ces bya'o/ /thu bo zhes bya'o/ /rab ces bya'o/ /rab mchog ces bya'o/ /gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa zhes bya ste/
405b1(khri brgyad): 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la bde ba dang / mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis rjes su gnang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa yin
405b2(khri brgyad): t e| de la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di phyag g.yas pas gyen du bteg
405b3(khri brgyad): cing yang slar gzhog kyang sems can de dag gis 'di ltar/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gyen du bteg pa'am/ phyir gzhag par yang mi shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun
405b4(khri brgyad): dga' bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab nas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la chags pa mi mnga' ba'i ye
405b5(khri brgyad): shes gzigs pa skyes pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo/ bslab pa gang ji snyed yod pa'i bslab pa de dag thams cad kyi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di ni/ mchog ces bya'o/ /thu bo dang /
405b6(khri brgyad): rab dang / rab mchog dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa zhes bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad dam/ mtha' gzung bar sems pa de ni/ nam
405b7(khri brgyad): mkha'i tshad dam mtha' gzung bar sems par zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ tshad med pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo/ ngas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
406a1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa'i tshad ma bstan te/ kun dga' bo/ ming gi tshogs dang / tshig gi tshogs dang / yi ge'i tshogs dag la ni/ tshad gzung du yod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol
406a2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la ni/ tshad gzung du med do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du/ shes
406a3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad ma mchis shing / gzhal du ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ mi zad pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med
406a4(khri brgyad): pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
406a5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu bskyed pa yin yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ zad par ma gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin
406a6(khri brgyad): g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
406a7(khri brgyad): nyid kyis rab tu bskyed par 'gyur yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ zang par mi 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag
406b1(khri brgyad): d a ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 'di nyid kyis rab tu bskyed kyang shes rab kyi pha
406b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa ni/ ma zad/ mi zad/ zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya bar 'dod pa de ni/ nam mkha' zad par bya bar 'dod du zad
406b3(khri brgyad): de| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ ma zad/ mi zad/ zad par mi 'gyur la/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar yang ma zad/ mi zad/
406b4(khri brgyad): zad par mi 'gyur zhing / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang ma zad/ mi zad/ zad par mi 'gyur te/ chos de dag la ni/ skye ba med la/ chos gang dag la skye ba med pa
406b5(khri brgyad): de dag la zad par 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos kun du khebs par mdzad nas
406b6(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ljags kyi dbang po 'di lta bu dang ldan pa log par gsung zhing gzhan du gsung bar 'gyur snyam mam/ kun dga'
406b7(khri brgyad): bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
407a1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di 'khor bzhi po dag la rgya cher ston cig / shod cig /khod cig /rab tu khod cig /rnam par phye zhig /gsol bar gyis shig /yang dag par rab tu
407a2(khri brgyad): ston cig / kun dga' bo/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyis gang la bslab par bya ba'i chos thams cad
407a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid las rgya cher bstan te/ de la ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du slob na/ rang rang gis dag la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
407a4(khri brgyad): 'di ni| yi ge thams cad la 'jug go / yi ge med pa thams cad la 'jug go /kun dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/ gzungs kyi sgo gang dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
407a5(khri brgyad): pos bslab par bya ba'i gzungs thams cad kyi sgo yin te/ gzungs de dag 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ spobs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thams
407a6(khri brgyad): cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos kyi
407a7(khri brgyad): mdzod mi zad pa yin par ngas bstan to/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ mos par byas shing khong du chud par bya ste/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba
407b1(khri brgyad): dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol
407b2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di ni/ gzungs yin par ngas bstan te/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzungs 'di bzung na/ chos thams cad yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri
407b3(khri brgyad): brgyad stong pa las yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ drug cu pa'o// //'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa/ de nas tshe dang
407b4(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni/ zab ste/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
407b5(khri brgyad): la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' mi zad pa'i phyir shes
407b6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs mi zad pa'i phyir shes
407b7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi zad pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub
408a1(khri brgyad): par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rab 'byor/ rnam pa
408a2(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi zad pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
408a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /tshor ba dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon
408a4(khri brgyad): par bsgrub par bya'o/ /'du shes dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /'du byed rnams dang nam
408a5(khri brgyad): mkha' mi zad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par shes pa dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/ byang chub
408a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ phung po rnams dang / nam mkha' mi zad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
408a7(khri brgyad): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /de bzhin du khams dang nam mkha' mi zad pa dang / skye mched dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
408b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon bar bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / nam mkha' mi zad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
408b2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ ma rig pa dang / nam mkha' mi zad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub
408b3(khri brgyad): par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'du byed dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par shes pa
408b4(khri brgyad): dang / nam mkha' mi zad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ ming dang gzugs dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/ byang
408b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ skye mched drug dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
408b6(khri brgyad): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ reg pa dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par
408b7(khri brgyad): bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ tshor ba dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ sred pa dang nam
409a1(khri brgyad): mkha' mi zad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ len pa dang nam mkha' mi
409a2(khri brgyad): zad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ srid pa dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
409a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ skye ba dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
409a4(khri brgyad): pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/ byang chub sems
409a5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par
409a6(khri brgyad): bsgrub par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma rnam par
409a7(khri brgyad): spangs pa la rnam par lta ba yin no/ /de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos yin
409b1(khri brgyad): te| rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la de ltar lta bas ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
409b2(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pa gang la la nam mkha' ltar ma zad pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul 'dis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba de ni/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi 'gyur
409b3(khri brgyad): te| de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang la la phyir ldog bar gyur na/ des ni/ shes rab
409b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la byed pa la ma brten pas phyir ldog pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ ji ltar nam mkha'
409b5(khri brgyad): ltar mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par blta bar bya ba dang / mngon par bsgrub par bya ba mi shes so/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang
409b6(khri brgyad): la la phyir ldog pa de dag ni/ thabs la mkhas pa 'di lam brten pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
409b7(khri brgyad): chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten cing thabs la mkhas pa'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
410a1(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ nam mkha' ltar mi zad pa mngon
410a2(khri brgyad): par bsgrub pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par blta bar bya/ mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la
410a3(khri brgyad): de ltar rnam bar lta bas ni/ rgyu med par skye ba'i chos gang yang mi mthong ngo / /'gag pa rtag pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /chos gang yang bdag tu yang dag par rjes su mi
410a4(khri brgyad): mthong zhing / sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / slong pa po dang / kun
410a5(khri brgyad): nas slong pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po dang / rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bde ba dang / bdag dang / bdag med pa dang /
410a6(khri brgyad): zhi ba dang / zhi ba ma yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la de
410a7(khri brgyad): ltar rnam par blta bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de'i tshe gzugs rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug
410b1(khri brgyad): bsngal ba'am/ bdag yod pa'am/ bdag med pa'am/ zhi ba'am/ ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa'am/
410b2(khri brgyad): bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag yod pa'am/ bdag med pa'am/ zhi ba'am/ ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rab 'byor/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
410b3(khri brgyad): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
410b4(khri brgyad): la| gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin no/ /de
410b5(khri brgyad): bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub kyi bar du'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ chos gang gis byang chub mthong ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'
410b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos de ltar chos thams cad mi dmigs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad
410b7(khri brgyad): mi dmigs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de'i tshe bdud sdig can mya ngan gyi zug rdu dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ dper na/ mi pha ma shin/ mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur
411a1(khri brgyad): zhing mya ngan gyi zug rngu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
411a2(khri brgyad): chos thams cad mi dmigs pa na bdud sdig can mya ngan gyi zug rngu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
411a3(khri brgyad): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdud sdig can gcig pu zhig mya ngan gyi zug rngu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur lags sam/ 'on te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas
411a4(khri brgyad): pa gang lags pa'i bdud sdig can de dag thams cad kyang mya ngan gyi zug rngu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / rang rang gi stan la dga' bar mi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
411a5(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
411a6(khri brgyad): khams na bdud sdig can gang dag gnas pa de dag thams cad mya ngan gyi zug rngu mi bzad pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rang rang gi stan la mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
411a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po de ltar gnas pa la ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bzung nas gtse ba'i glags mi rnyed do/ /rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
411b1(khri brgyad): chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pas gnas par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
411b2(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pas gnas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i bar
411b3(khri brgyad): du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas
411b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol
411b5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa bsgom pa ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
411b6(khri brgyad): pa'i bar du ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub
411b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing / sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
412a1(khri brgyad): chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims srung
412a2(khri brgyad): pa na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing tshul khrims srung bar byed de/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa sgrub pa na/ rnam pa thams cad
412a3(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing bzod pa sgom par byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs
412a4(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di
412a5(khri brgyad): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom pa na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing / brtson 'grus rtsom par byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang
412a6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan
412a7(khri brgyad): sgrub pa na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing / bsam gtan de dag sgrub par byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi
412b1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor/
412b2(khri brgyad): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing / shes rab
412b3(khri brgyad): sgom par byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
412b4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin
412b5(khri brgyad): pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba ni/ sems can
412b6(khri brgyad): thams cad la byams pa'i lus kyi las nye bar gnas pa yin/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i ngag gi las dang / byams pa'i yid kyi las nye bar gnas pa yin te/ de'i tshe byang chub sems
412b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
413a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa la gnas pa ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems
413a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ len pa po de dag gshe ba'am/ spyo ba'am/ tshogs par mi dbyung ba'i tshig rtsub po kun tu 'byin kyang de dag la kun nas mnar sems mi byed de/
413a3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
413a4(khri brgyad): 'das| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
413a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ len pa po de dag gshe ba'am/ spyo ba'am/ tshogs par mi dbyung ba'i tshig rtsub po kun tu 'byin na/ de la gshe ba'am/ spyo ba'am/
413a6(khri brgyad): tshogs par mi dbyang ba'i tshig rtsub po kun tu 'byin kyang sbyin pa'i blo kho na 'byung zhing / yongs su gtong ba'i blo kho na 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin pa nyid du bya'i/ bdag gis
413a7(khri brgyad): mi sbyin par ni mi bya'o/ /snyam nas de lus dang / sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par skyed par byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
413b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa la gnas pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
413b2(khri brgyad): pa ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin zhing sbyin pa yongs su gtong
413b3(khri brgyad): la| rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar byed pa'i sems ni/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa kho
413b4(khri brgyad): nas sems gnas te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /
413b5(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal
413b6(khri brgyad): pa| rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin zhing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong la/ sbyin pa la sgyu ma lta bu'i blo kho nas rtag tu nye bar gnas shing / sbyin pa des kyang sems
413b7(khri brgyad): can gang la'ang phan pa'am/ gnod par 'gyur bar mi mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
414a1(khri brgyad): yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ mi zad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas
414a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji
414a3(khri brgyad): ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ 'di la
414a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi sdom pa gang yin pa'i sdom pa des nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas
414a5(khri brgyad): kyi sa mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed cing / de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas sems can rnams kyi srog gcod par mi byed do/ /ma byin par len par mi byed do/ /'dod pa la log
414a6(khri brgyad): par g.yem par mi byed do/ /rdzun gyi tshig mi smra'o/ /tshig rtsub po mi smra'o/ /phra ma'i tshig mi smra'o/ /tshig bkyal pa mi smra'o/ /brnab sems can du mi 'gyur ro/ /gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan
414a7(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyur ro/ /log par lta bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnas nas sbyin pa gang sbyin yang rung / zas 'dod pa rnams la ni/ zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni/
414b1(khri brgyad): skom/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni/ spos/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni/ bzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni/ gos/ me tog phreng 'dod pa rnams la ni/ me tog phreng / byug pa 'dod pa rnams
414b2(khri brgyad): la ni/ byug pa/ mal 'dod pa rnams la ni/ mal/ stan 'dod pa rnams la ni/ stan/ mar me 'dod pa rnams la ni/ mar me/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni/ yo byad dang / mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung
414b3(khri brgyad): ba'i bar dag sbyin par byed do/ /spyin pa de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ yongs su bsngo ba de lta bu de/
414b4(khri brgyad): nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngo bar mi byed do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa'i pha
414b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu
414b6(khri brgyad): phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i yan lag dang / nying lag thams
414b7(khri brgyad): cad sems can thams cad kyis bcad de dong na/ der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang rnam par 'khrug par mi 'gyur zhing / tshig pa za bar mi 'gyur
415a1(khri brgyad): la| gnod sems 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du na des 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar/ sems can thams cad kyis yan lag dang / nying lag bcad
415a2(khri brgyad): de dong ba ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /snyam ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ bzod pa'i
415a3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi
415a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad bdag gis 'khor ba las bsgral te bdud rtsi'i
415a5(khri brgyad): dbyings su dgod par bya'o/ /zhes lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus mi gtong ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
415a6(khri brgyad): pa| brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/
415a7(khri brgyad): ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs nas gnas shing
415b1(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa bsgrubs nas gnas par byed de/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la'ang lhag par mi dmigs la/ gzhan du na 'di snyam du sems te/
415b2(khri brgyad): bdag ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas sems can thams cad 'khor ba las bsgral bar bya'o/ /snyam ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul
415b3(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims
415b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims
415b5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ chos thams cad de bzhin nyid las mi 'da' ba ma gtogs par chos gang la'ang 'dus byas su mi mthong / 'dus ma byas su mi mthong / dngos po 'dus byas su
415b6(khri brgyad): mi mthong / dngos po med pa 'dus ma byas su mi mthong / mtshan ma 'dus byas su mi mthong / mtshan ma med pa 'dus ma byas su mi mthong ngo / /chos gang la'ang yod pa'am med par mi mthong ngo / /
415b7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang / thabs la mkhas pas kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
416a1(khri brgyad): po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang
416a2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang
416a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du sems can thams cad kyis gshes sam/ spyos sam/ yan lag
416a4(khri brgyad): dang / nying lag rnams bcad par 'gyur na/ der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis ni/ sems can
416a5(khri brgyad): 'di dag la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'i/ bdag gis mi sbyin par ni mi bya'o/ /snyam ste/ de sems can de dag la zas 'dod pa rnams la ni/ zas sbyin par byed/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni/ skom
416a6(khri brgyad): sbyin par byed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ mi'i yo byad ci'ang rung ba'i bar du sbyin par byed la/ des dge ba'i rtsa ba de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
416a7(khri brgyad): pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar byed la/ de ni/ ci nas su zhig yongs su bsngo bar byed pa'am/ ci zhig yongs su bsngo bar byed pa'am/ gang du yongs su bsngo bar byed par 'gyur ba'i blo rnam
416b1(khri brgyad): pa gsum du mi 'jug par yongs su bsngo ba de ltar yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ sbyin pa'i pha
416b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
416b3(khri brgyad): pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du sems can
416b4(khri brgyad): 'ga' tsam yang srog dang bral bar mi byed cing / ma byin par mi len to/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ log par lta ba'i bar du mi 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la'ang de'i sems mi 'jug
416b5(khri brgyad): go |dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed la/ de gang du yongs su bsngo bar byed pa'i bar du ci
416b6(khri brgyad): nas blo rnam pa gsum mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
416b7(khri brgyad): pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
417a1(khri brgyad): su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar bdag
417a2(khri brgyad): dpag tshad gcig tu song ngam/ dpag tshad brgya'am/ dpag tshad stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gam/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag 'bum du song la/ der tha na sems can gcig
417a3(khri brgyad): tsam yang bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bslab par bya'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub nyid kyi bar du dgod par bya zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par
417a4(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya'o/ /zhes brtson 'grus yang dag par skyed par byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par
417a5(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
417a6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha
417a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ 'dod pa dag las dben
417b1(khri brgyad): pa| sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du bsgrubs te gnas so/ /sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos dge ba dang ldan pa ci dang ci byung
417b2(khri brgyad): ba rnams kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ de'i tshe 'ang ci nas bsam gtan rnams dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar yongs su bsngo bar
417b3(khri brgyad): byed de| rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom
417b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di
417b5(khri brgyad): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe chos rnams la dben pa'i rnam pa'am/ zhi ba'i rnam pa'am/ zad pa'i rnam par chos kyi rjes su lta bar gnas
417b6(khri brgyad): la| chos nyid de'ang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du mngon sum du mi byed de/ der 'dug nas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas langs nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo
417b7(khri brgyad): bskor bar byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin te/ ci nas
418a1(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa'ang med/ 'dor ba'ang med pa de ltar yongs su 'dzin to/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus
418a2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus
418a3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ bdag gis nges pa kho nar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'i/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par
418a4(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar mi bya'o/ /snyam nas lus dang / sems kyi brtson pa mi gtong ste/ sems can rnams kyi ched du dpag tshad gcig gam/ dpag
418a5(khri brgyad): tshad brgya'am/ dpag tshad stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gam/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag 'bum du song nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
418a6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la gnas te/ tha na sems can gcig tsam yang byang chub la 'jog par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag ma rnyed na'ang nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag
418a7(khri brgyad): nyan thos nyid la 'jog par byed do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rang sangs rgyas nyid la 'jog par byed do/ /tha na sems can gcig tsam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang
418b1(khri brgyad): dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/ des chos kyi sbyin pa de byin nas zang zing gi sbyin pas sems can rnams tshim par byed do/ /des dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
418b2(khri brgyad): su bsngo bar mi byed kyi/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang
418b3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
418b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub
418b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bdag kyang srog gcod pa spong bar byed la/ gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag
418b6(khri brgyad): par 'dzin du 'jug cing / srog gcod pa spong ba'i bsngags pa'ang brjod la/ gzhan gang dag srog gcod pa spong ba de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar byed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar
418b7(khri brgyad): te| bdag kyang log par lta ba'i bar du spong bar byed la/ gzhan yang log par lta ba spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing / log par lta ba spong ba'i bsngags pa'ang brjod la/ gzhan gang dag log par
419a1(khri brgyad): lta ba spong ba de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar byed do/ /de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des 'dod pa'i khams don du mi gnyer/ gzugs kyi
419a2(khri brgyad): khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams don du mi gnyer/ nyan thos kyi sa don du mi gnyer/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa don du mi gnyer gyi/ gzhan du na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad
419a3(khri brgyad): dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ ci nas kyang su zhig yongs su bsngo ba dang / ci zhig yongs su bsngo ba dang / gang du yongs su
419a4(khri brgyad): bsngo ba'i blo rnam pa gsum mi 'byung ba de ltar yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ tshul
419a5(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar
419a6(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste snying po byang chub
419a7(khri brgyad): la 'dug gi bar du gal te mir gyur pa'am/ mi ma yin par gyur pa'i bar dag gis sems rnam par 'khrugs par byas sam/ yan lag dang / nying lag dag bcad cing khyer te dong yang /
419b1(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ni/ 'di snyam du/ 'di bdag las bcad pa'am/ gtubs pa'am/ 'phrog go /snyam du mi sems
419b2(khri brgyad): te| gzhan du na de 'di snyam du/ gang dag gi don du bdag gi lus yongs su grub pa de dag nyid 'dir 'ongs te/ bdag gi yan lag dang / nying lag dag gtubs shing khyer te dong ba ni/ bdag
419b3(khri brgyad): gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /snyam du sems shing / des ni/ chos nyid kyi rang bzhin yang legs par yid la byas pa yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas
419b4(khri brgyad): kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i/ gzhan du na/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/
419b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
419b6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub
419b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba
420a1(khri brgyad): dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dang / byams pa dang / btang snyoms kyi bar dang / 'du shes med 'du
420a2(khri brgyad): shes med min skye mched kyi bar dag bsgrubs shing gnas te/ de bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin gyi/
420a3(khri brgyad): gzhan du na/ gang du sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba'i phyir de dag tu skye zhing / des sems can de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
420a4(khri brgyad): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis yongs su smin par byed
420a5(khri brgyad): cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu'ang 'gro bar byed de/ rab 'byor/
420a6(khri brgyad): de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom
420a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/
420b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzas dang / dngos po dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes
420b2(khri brgyad): su mi mthong ngo / /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du rdzas dang / dngos po dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sbyar te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bar dang /
420b3(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rdzas dang / dngos po dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /des chos thams cad rdzas su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / dngos po dang /
420b4(khri brgyad): mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ni/ chos gang la'ang gnas par mi byed cing / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
420b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
420b6(khri brgyad): po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
420b7(khri brgyad): chen po 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched
421a1(khri brgyad): kyi bar du bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnas shing / rnam par g.yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis sems can de dag la zang
421a2(khri brgyad): zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /de dag kyang zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed la/ gzhan dag kyang zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa yang dag
421a3(khri brgyad): par 'dzin du 'dug cing / zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa'i bsngags pa'ang brjod la/ gzhan gang dag zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa dag sbyin par byed pa de dag gi bsngags
421a4(khri brgyad): pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i/ gzhan du na/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du
421a5(khri brgyad): byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
421a6(khri brgyad): la gnas pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
421a7(khri brgyad): pa| ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
421b1(khri brgyad): gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed/ zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed/ rnam par 'tshe ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed de/ gzhan du na/ rnam pa
421b2(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis gnas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i/ /gzhan du na sems can
421b3(khri brgyad): thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan
421b4(khri brgyad): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha
421b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi
421b6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ gzugs la dbu ba rdos pa lta bur so sor rtog go /tshor ba la chu'i chu bur lta bur so sor rtog go /'du shes la smig rgyu lta bur so sor rtog go /'du byed rnams la chu shing
421b7(khri brgyad): lta bur so sor rtog go / rnam par shes pa la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog ste/ de de ltar phung po lnga la so sor rtog pa na/ snying po med pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ de de ltar so sor rtog pa na yan lag
422a1(khri brgyad): dang / nying lag dag bcad kyang 'di snyam du/ 'di la gcod par byed pa ni/ su yin/ tshor ba ni/ su'i yin/ 'du shes ni/ su'i yin/ 'du byed rnams ni/
422a2(khri brgyad): su'i yin/ rnam par shes pa ni/ su'i yin snyam du sems shing / de de ltar so sor rtog pa na khro bar 'gyur bdag byas kyang 'di snyam du/ gang la khro ba dang / spyo ba byas pas gnod sems
422a3(khri brgyad): skye ba'i khro ba dang / gshe bar byed pa 'di la su zhig yod snyam du sems te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
422a4(khri brgyad): pa| bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji
422a5(khri brgyad): ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi
422a6(khri brgyad): dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dag bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bsam gtan dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams la'ang
422a7(khri brgyad): mtshan mar mi 'dzin te/ de de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed pa dag rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o/ /lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis lha dang mi
422b1(khri brgyad): rnams kyi sgra dag kyang thos so/ /sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa dag kyang sems kyis kun tu shes so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ bla na med pa'i sems
422b2(khri brgyad): kyi bar la'ang bla na med pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa dag kyang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o/ /lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las
422b3(khri brgyad): shin tu 'das pa'i bar gyis de bzhin du sbyar te/ sems can rnams las ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar dag kyang mthong ngo / /de mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag la gnas nas
422b4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i
422b5(khri brgyad): phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du'ang 'gro ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i/ gzhan du na/ sems can thams cad
422b6(khri brgyad): dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha
422b7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
423a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
423a2(khri brgyad): chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ gzugs mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha
423a3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan
423a4(khri brgyad): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du
423a5(khri brgyad): sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs so/ /'dus byas kyi khams mi dmigs so/ /'dus ma byas kyi khams mi dmigs so/ /mi dmigs pas na/ mngon par
423a6(khri brgyad): 'du mi byed do/ /mngon par 'du mi byed pas na/ skye bar mi byed/ 'gag par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de
423a7(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ni/ gnas pa nyid dang / chos gnas pa 'di ni/ gnas pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings kyang gnas pa nyid yin
423b1(khri brgyad): pas| de la ni/ skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i phyir de ni/ rnam par g.yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang ma bral bar
423b2(khri brgyad): gnas pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin
423b3(khri brgyad): pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin
423b4(khri brgyad): pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos thams cad stong par yang dag par rjes su
423b5(khri brgyad): mthong ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad stong par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba lags/ bka'
