423b6(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so/ /phyi
423b7(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos
424a1(khri brgyad): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
424a2(khri brgyad): po de stong pa nyid bcu bzhi po de dag la gnas nas gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am/ mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
424a3(khri brgyad): shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am/ mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub kyi bar
424a4(khri brgyad): du'ang stong zhes bya ba'am/ mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ /'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams stong zhes bya ba'am/ mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs
424a5(khri brgyad): so| |byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod cing / sbyin pa dag gtong bar byed de/ zas sam/ skom mam/ gos sam/ bzhon
424a6(khri brgyad): pa'am/ mal cha'am/ stan nam/ mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag sbyin par byed kyang / des sbyin pa de'ang stong par yang dag par rjes su mthong la/ gang sbyin par byed
424a7(khri brgyad): pa dang / gang la sbyin par bya ba de'ang stong par yang dag par mthong ste/ de la ser sna'i sems sam/ kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems dag gi go skabs med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang
424b1(khri brgyad): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du rnam par rtog pa de dag thams
424b2(khri brgyad): cad mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
424b3(khri brgyad): rgyas pa la ser sna'i thugs sam/ kun tu 'dzin pa'i thugs mi 'byung ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la'ang ser sna'i
424b4(khri brgyad): sems sam/ kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems med pas na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston pa yin te/ rab
424b5(khri brgyad): 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom
424b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal
424b7(khri brgyad): pa| rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag gi skabs mi 'byed
425a1(khri brgyad): do| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar/ des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'ang mi dmigs la/ gang gis nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
425a2(khri brgyad): su bsngo bar byed pa'i sems de'ang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du srog gcod pa spong ba'i phyir sems
425a3(khri brgyad): skyed par byed de/ bdag kyang srog gcod pa spong bar byed la/ srog gcod pa spong ba'i bsngags pa'ang brjod cing / gzhan dag kyang srog gcod pa spong ba yang dag par 'dzin
425a4(khri brgyad): du 'jug la/ gzhan gang dag srog gcod pa spong ba de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar byed do/ /bdag kyang log par lta ba'i bar du spang ba'i phyir sems skyed cing
425a5(khri brgyad): log par lta ba spong bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang log par lta ba spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing / log par lta ba spong ba'i bsngags pa'ang brjod la/ gzhan gang dag
425a6(khri brgyad): log par lta ba spong ba de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar byed de/ tshul khrims des nyan thos nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/ sangs rgyas nyid dam/ chos
425a7(khri brgyad): gang la'ang chags pa med na/ gzhan dag lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
425b1(khri brgyad): pa| tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/
425b2(khri brgyad): ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
425b3(khri brgyad): pa la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa skye zhing / de 'di snyam du/ 'di la chos gang yang 'byung ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ skye ba'am/ 'chi ba'am/ khro ba'am/ spyo ba'am/ gcad pa'am/
425b4(khri brgyad): gtub pa'am/ brdeg pa'am/ dgag par bya ba med do/ /snyam nas de sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du gal te sems can thams cad drung du
425b5(khri brgyad): lhags nas khro bar byed dam/ spyo bar byed dam/ bong ba'am/ dbyug pa'am/ mtshon cha'am/ lag cha dag gis brdeg gam/ gcod dam/ 'bigs par byed kyang de la 'di
425b6(khri brgyad): snyam du/ kye ma chos rnams kyi chos nyid la ni/ khro ba'am/ spyo ba'am/ gcad pa'am/ gtub pa'am/ brdeg pa'i chos gang yang dmigs su med do/ /snyam du sems te/ rab
425b7(khri brgyad): 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/
426a1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
426a2(khri brgyad): phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ thabs la mkhas
426a3(khri brgyad): pa dang ldan pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas te lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus bskyed nas 'jig rten gyi khams su'ang song / 'jig rten gyi khams brgyar yang song /
426a4(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag bye ba snyed du'ang song nas sems can rnams la chos ston cing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'god par byed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes
426a5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la'ang 'god par byed do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la'ang 'god par byed do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la'ang 'god par byed do/ /de
426a6(khri brgyad): bzhin du sbyar te/ rang byang chub kyi bar la'ang 'god par byed do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la'ang 'god par byed de/ ci nas kyang 'dus byas kyi khams
426a7(khri brgyad): la'ang mi 'god/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams la'ang mi 'god pa de ltar 'god par byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
426b1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
426b2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
426b3(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs pa nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin tam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tam/ ting
426b4(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin gzhan gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ngo / /ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas nas rnam par thar pa brgyad po dag la lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs
426b5(khri brgyad): dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni/
426b6(khri brgyad): rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon
426b7(khri brgyad): sum du byas te bsgrubs nas gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes
427a1(khri brgyad): rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so/ /snyam nas nam mkha' mtha'
427a2(khri brgyad): yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te rnam par shes
427a3(khri brgyad): pa mtha' yas so/ /snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
427a4(khri brgyad): las yang dag par 'das te ci'ang med do/ /snyam nas ci'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med
427a5(khri brgyad): pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du
427a6(khri brgyad): 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam
427a7(khri brgyad): par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag la lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ngo / /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
427b1(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po dag la'ang lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing ldang sde/ dgu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems
427b2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i
427b3(khri brgyad): dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
427b4(khri brgyad): mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa'i bar dag ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag la lugs dang
427b5(khri brgyad): mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ngo / /des de ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de
427b6(khri brgyad): dag rnam par dbye bar byas nas seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go / rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge
427b7(khri brgyad): 'dzin seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las
428a1(khri brgyad): dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / 'du shes dang
428a2(khri brgyad): tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar dag bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / 'du shes med
428a3(khri brgyad): 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas bsam gtan dang po'i bar dag bsgrubs te gnas pa yin no/ /des de ltar seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin de rnam par dbye bar byas nas
428a4(khri brgyad): thod rgal gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go / rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin thod rgal gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
428a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba
428a6(khri brgyad): can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / bsam gtan dang po las langs nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dag bsgrubs te gnas pa
428a7(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas bsam
428b1(khri brgyad): gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las
428b2(khri brgyad): langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms
428b3(khri brgyad): par 'jug pa las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'gog

428b7(khri brgyad): pa'i skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
429a1(khri brgyad): mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug

429a3(khri brgyad): nas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems su 'bab pa dang / mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems las 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par

429a6(khri brgyad): mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ci'ang med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas pa dang / mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i
429a7(khri brgyad): sems las rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems su 'bab pa dang /

429b2(khri brgyad): par ma bzhag pa'i sems su 'bab pa dang / mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems las bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas mnyam par ma

429b5(khri brgyad): bzhag pa'i sems la gnas pa dang / mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems las bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan dang po las langs nas mnyam par ma bzhag
429b6(khri brgyad): pa'i sems la gnas pa ste/ de thod rgal gyi ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'thob bo/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes

430a1(khri brgyad): 'jug pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ de nas
430a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de/
430a3(khri brgyad): yun ring po ji srid cig nas yang dag par zhugs pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ byang
430a4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de ni/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa nas yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom
430a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags/
430a6(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
430a7(khri brgyad): dag la bsnyen bkur byas par rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa des/ dge
430b1(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam zhig bsgrun pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste yongs su
430b2(khri brgyad): rdzogs par ma byas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yang med do/ /des yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yang med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yang
430b3(khri brgyad): med do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yang med do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yang med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu dang
430b4(khri brgyad): ldan pa des/ yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yang med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag thabs la mkhas pa de
430b5(khri brgyad): lta bu dang ldan pa de dag ni/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu
430b6(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa de dag ni/ ngo mtshar to/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ gling bzhir snang bar byed la/ gling bzhi dang mthun par 'gro zhing mthun
430b7(khri brgyad): par 'khor ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag la las byed la/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga dang mthun par 'gro zhing mthun par 'jug ste/ shes
431a1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral na/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral na/ pha rol tu
431a2(khri brgyad): phyin pa lnga po dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming mi 'thob bo/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ni/ rin po che sna bdun dang bral na/ 'khor los bsgyur
431a3(khri brgyad): ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming mi 'thob bo/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral na/ pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming mi
431a4(khri brgyad): 'thob bo/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ khyim thab med pa'i bud med dag ni/ g.yon can dag gis tshugs par sla'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag kyang shes
431a5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral na/ bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis thul bar sla'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral na/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag bdud dam bdud kyi ris
431a6(khri brgyad): kyi lha rnams kyis mi thul ba yin gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral na/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag kyang bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis don du gnyer bar bya ba yin no/ /
431a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ g.yul ngor 'gro ba'i skyes bu go cha thams cad bgos pa ni/ g.yul ngor zhugs pa'i tshe 'thab zla'i rgyal po'am/ phyir rgol pa rnams sam/ dgra bo dag
431b1(khri brgyad): gis mi thul to/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral na/ bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams sam/ gang zag lhag pa'i nga rgyal can
431b2(khri brgyad): rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa' gdol pa'i bar dag gis thul bar dka' zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag mi thul bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ khams kyi rgyal po rnams
431b3(khri brgyad): ni| 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rjes su mthun par byed de/ nang nub nang nub cing rim gro bya ba'i don du 'dong bar byed do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
431b4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pas yongs su zin na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la bder mthun par 'dong ngo / /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu bran gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni/ gang+gA'i klung ga la ba de
431b5(khri brgyad): logs su rjes su 'bab cing / gang+gA'i klung dang lhan cig tu rgya mtsho chen por 'bab bo/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin na /
431b6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba de logs su mthun bar 'dong ngo / /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu'i lag pa g.yas pa ni/ bya ba thams cad byed do/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab
431b7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin du blta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag ni/ lag pa g.yon pa ji lta ba bzhin du blta'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu bran rnams kyi chu gang yin pa dang /
432a1(khri brgyad): chu klung chen po rnams kyi chu gang yin pa de dag ni/ rgya mtsho chen por zhugs na/ ro gcig par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag kyang shes
432a2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba der mthun par zhugs na/ pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
432a3(khri brgyad): dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo rin po che ni/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i mdun du 'gro zhing gnas la/ gang du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po zas kyi don du
432a4(khri brgyad): gnas pa der 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs rnams tshim par byed kyang 'khor lo rin po che de ni/ gnas nas g.yo ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol
432a5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa'ang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag yongs su 'dren par byed la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba de logs su 'gro zhing der gnas par 'gyur la/ der gnas pa na
432a6(khri brgyad): gnas de las 'da' bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo rin po che de dang / blon po rin po che de dang / khyim bdag rin
432a7(khri brgyad): po che de dang / btsun mo rin po che de dang / nor bu rin po che de dang / glang po rin po che de dang / rta mchog rin po che de ni/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i mdun du 'gro'o/ /rab 'byor/
432b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gi mdun du 'gro'o/ /mdun du song nas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba der gnas te/ shes rab kyi pha
432b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di snyam du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ bdag gi rjes su 'brang ngo / /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
432b3(khri brgyad): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ bdag gi rjes su 'brang ngo / /snyam du mi sems so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'di snyam du/ bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes
432b4(khri brgyad): su 'brang ngo / /snyam du mi sems so/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
432b5(khri brgyad): pa'ang 'di snyam du/ bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo / /snyam du mi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ de dag ni/ rang bzhin gyis nus pa cung zad kyang med la
432b6(khri brgyad): rang bzhin gyis stong zhing / gsob dang / smig rgyu lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te
432b7(khri brgyad): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
433a1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ji ltar bla na med pa yang
433a2(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
433a3(khri brgyad): chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa 'di snyam du/ kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni/ sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa ste/ de ni/ thabs la mi mkhas pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar
433a4(khri brgyad): par mi nus kyi/ bdag gis sems can de dag gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
433a5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /snyam du sems shing / de sems can de dag gi don du phyi dang nang gi dngos po
433a6(khri brgyad): rnams yongs su gtong bar byed do/ /de yongs su gtong bar byed pa na 'di snyam du/ bdag gis ci'ang btang ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ dngos po 'di dag ni/ rang bzhin gyis
433a7(khri brgyad): stong pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /snyam du sems te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar nye bar rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa
433b1(khri brgyad): yin no| |de sems can de dag nyid kyi don du 'tshal ba'i tshul khrims kyi skabs mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par
433b2(khri brgyad): zhugs la srog gcod par byed pa dang / log par lta bar gyur pa'i bar dang / nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis don du gnyer bar byed pa ni/ bdag gi mi cha'o/ /snyam du sems pa'i
433b3(khri brgyad): phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar nye bar rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de sems can de dag nyid kyi don du 'khrug pa'i sems
433b4(khri brgyad): 'ga' tsam yang skyed par mi byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar nye bar rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /des sems can de
433b5(khri brgyad): dag nyid kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur gyi bar du le lo'i sems skyed par mi byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar nye bar rtog pa'i
433b6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de sems can de dag nyid kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
433b7(khri brgyad): rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems rnam par g.yeng bar mi byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar nye bar rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
434a1(khri brgyad): pa yin no/ /de sems can de dag nyid kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur gyi bar du nam yang
434a2(khri brgyad): shes rab dang 'bral bar mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma zhugs par gzhan gyis sems can yongs su smin par bya mi nus so/ /snyam du sems pa'i
434a3(khri brgyad): phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar nye bar rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
434a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la tha dad pa ma mchis na/ ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha
434a5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag gi mchog ces bgyi/ thu bo dang / gtso bo dang / rab dang / rab mchog dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na ma mchis pa dang / gong na ma mchis
434a6(khri brgyad): pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bgyi lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ de
434a7(khri brgyad): de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ni/ tha dad pa cung zad kyang med do/ /gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po de dag gi mchog ces bya ba dang / mi
434b1(khri brgyad): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci las dgongs nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mchog ces bya'o/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar zhes bya'o/
434b2(khri brgyad): zhes gsungs lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su bzung nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la
434b3(khri brgyad): ba der mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos gang yang yongs su 'dzin pa'am/ gtong bar bgyid
434b4(khri brgyad): lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin te/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang yang yongs su 'dzin pa'am/ gtong bar mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na
434b5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ chos thams cad ma bzung ma btang ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas chos gang dag yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags /
434b6(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzugs mi 'dzin mi gtong ngo / /de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub kyi bar du mi 'dzin mi gtong ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
434b7(khri brgyad): ji ltar na/ gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gang gzugs yid la mi byed cing / byang chub kyi bar du yid la mi byed pa de ni/ gzugs yongs su
435a1(khri brgyad): mi 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te gzugs yid la mi bgyi zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yid la mi bgyi na
435a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs yid lam bgyis shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yid la ma bgyis par ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa bdag rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur lags/
435a3(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa bdag rnam par ma 'phel na/ ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs na/ ji ltar rnam pa thams
435a4(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs yid la mi byed pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang
435a5(khri brgyad): chub kyi bar du yid la mi byed pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i
435a6(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ gzugs yid la ma byas shing byang chub kyi bar du yid la ma byas na/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du
435a7(khri brgyad): 'di ltar gzugs yid la ma bgyis shing / byang chub kyi bar du yid la ma bgyis na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ yid la
435b1(khri brgyad): byed pas ni/ 'dod pa'i khams sam/ gzugs kyi khams sam/ gzugs med pa'i khams su'ang sbyor bar 'gyur la/ yid la ma byas na/ gang la'ang sbyor bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar
435b2(khri brgyad): na| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos gang la'ang mi sbyor bar bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
435b3(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa gang la gnas par mi 'gyur ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/
435b4(khri brgyad): gzugs la mi gnas so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi gnas so/ /gsol pa/ bcol ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du gzugs la mi gnas shing / byang chub kyi bar la mi gnas
435b5(khri brgyad): pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ de gang la mngon par zhen pa zhes bya ba'am/ gnas pa zhes bya ba'i
435b6(khri brgyad): chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ mngon par zhen pa med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
435b7(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du/ gang de ltar bsgom pa dang / gang de ltar spyod pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
436a1(khri brgyad): pa la bsgom pa yin no/ /de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa yin pas bdag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang
436a2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa yin no/ /snyam du sems shing / gal te de ltar kun tu shes par byed na/ de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thag ring du byed pa yin no/ /gang
436a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du gyur pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du gyur pa yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las ring du gyur pa
436a4(khri brgyad): yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang la'ang mngon par zhen pa med la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mngon par zhen pa gang yang med pa'i phyir
436a5(khri brgyad): ro| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang la mngon par zhen pa zhes bya ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
436a6(khri brgyad): la kun tu shes par byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams par 'gyur ro/ /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
436a7(khri brgyad): nyams pa de ni/ chos thams cad las nyams pa yin no/ /gal te yang de 'di snyam du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /
436b1(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /snyam na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin te /
436b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bas ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ /gal te yang de 'di snyam du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
436b3(khri brgyad): pa 'di la gnas pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ /snyam na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
436b4(khri brgyad): nyams pa yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa la ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba med do/ /gal te yang 'di snyam du/ shes rab kyi
436b5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /snying rje chen po'i bar du mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /snyam na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
436b6(khri brgyad): chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las nyams pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pas ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub
436b7(khri brgyad): par mi nus la/ snying rje chen po'i bar dag kyang mngon par sgrub par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ /gal te'ang de 'di snyam du/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung bar
437a1(khri brgyad): bdag nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang bstan to/ /bshad do/ /rab tu bshad do/ /snyam na/ byang chub sems
437a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa med
437a3(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des mthong ba'i chos kyang mi dmigs na/ chos gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ni/ gnas med pa'i
437a4(khri brgyad): phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
437a5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i skyon 'di dag ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
437a6(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa na/ 'di ltar/ chos thams cad ni/ chags pa med pa dang / yongs su bzung ba med pa ste/ chags pa med pa dang / yongs su bzung ba med pa'i chos la ni/ mngon par
437a7(khri brgyad): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang med do/ /zhes kun tu shes shing / gal te de ltar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te de ltar yongs su
437b1(khri brgyad): ma bzung ba'i chos la mngon par zhen na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mngon
437b2(khri brgyad): par zhen pas brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba lags sam/ sbyin pa'i
437b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang ma bral ba
437b4(khri brgyad): lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rnam pa
437b5(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral ba lags na/ 'o na ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
437b6(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar dag mngon par bsgrub par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
437b7(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pa ni/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa med de/ 'di ni/ gzugs so/ /'di'i gzugs so/ /zhes bya bar mngon par zhen pa med do/ /chos thams cad kyi bar la'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /
438a1(khri brgyad): gzugs rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa'am/ zhi ba'am/ ma zhi ba'am/ stong pa'am/ ma stong
438a2(khri brgyad): pa'am/ dben pa'am/ mi dben pa zhes bya bar mngon par zhen pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin med
438a3(khri brgyad): pa'i chos la ni rtag pa zhes bya ba'am/ me rtag pa zhes bya ba'am/ bde ba zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba'am/ zhi zhes bya ba'am/
438a4(khri brgyad): ma zhi zhes bya ba'am/ stong zhes bya ba'am/ mi stong zhes bya ba'am/ dben zhes bya ba'am/ mi dben zhes bya bar mngon par sgrub par mi nus te/ rang bzhin ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong zhes/
438a5(khri brgyad): bya bar mngon par sgrub par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sbyin pa'i
438a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la spyod pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs
438a7(khri brgyad): yan lag bzhi pa ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'ang 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag
438b1(khri brgyad): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang dang gang du 'go ba de dang der pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag kyang 'gro zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la bder gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/
438b2(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ kha lo sgyur ba ni/ rta bzhi pa'i shing rta la zhon nas lam mnyam pa nas 'gro'o/ /de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gi kha lo sgyur
438b3(khri brgyad): zhing lam mnyam pa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba der 'gro'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam ni/ gang lags/
438b4(khri brgyad): lam ma lags pa ni/ gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nyan thos kyi lam ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam ma yin pa'o/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi lam
438b5(khri brgyad): ni| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam ma yin pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ni/ lam yin te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
438b6(khri brgyad): chen po rnams kyi lam ni/ de yin no/ lam ma yin pa ni/ de yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ lam lags so/ /'di ni/ lam
438b7(khri brgyad): ma lags so/ /zhes ston pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
439a1(khri brgyad): de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lam dang / lam ma yin pa ston pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
439a2(khri brgyad): kyi don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhing / sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don du nye bar gnas pa yin te/ sems can grangs med pa rnams kyi don du nye bar gnas kyang rab
439a3(khri brgyad): 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ ci'ang ston par mi byed de/ gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin cing / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs
439a4(khri brgyad): su mi 'dzin te/ nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su bzung ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
439a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su 'dren pa yin gyi/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dag tu yongs su 'dren pa ni/ ma yin te/ rnam pa thams
439a6(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa yin no/ /de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gnas pa nyid tshad mar byas nas chos gang yang skyed pa ma yin/ 'gog pa ma yin no/ /
439a7(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos gang yang skyed pa ma lags/ 'gog pa ma lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
439b1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ji ltar sbyin pa stsal bar bgyi/ ji ltar tshul khrims bsrung bar bgyi/ ji ltar bzod pa bsgom par bgyi/ ji ltar brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi/ ji ltar bsam
439b2(khri brgyad): gtan la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi/ ji ltar shes rab bsgom par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te sbyin pa
439b3(khri brgyad): sbyin par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te tshul khrims bsrung bar bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te bzod pa bsgom par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
439b4(khri brgyad): nyid du dmigs te brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te shes
439b5(khri brgyad): rab bsgom par bya zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya/ de ltar byang chub sems
439b6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub
439b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa bsgom pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /byang
440a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ma bral ba de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral ba yin no/ /rab 'byor
440a2(khri brgyad): de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab
440a3(khri brgyad): par bya'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas
440a4(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom
440a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
440a6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos 'di ltar gzugs ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/
440a7(khri brgyad): mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /zhes so sor rtog par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ byang
440b1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs la gnas
440b2(khri brgyad): par bya'o/ /zhes brtson par mi bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i bar la gnas par bya'o/ /zhes brtson par mi bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la gnas par bya'o/ /zhes brtson par
440b3(khri brgyad): mi bya'o| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni/ gang la'ang mi gnas la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gang la'ang mi gnas pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
440b4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig shing a mra'i 'bras
440b5(khri brgyad): bu dag gam/ shing pa na sa'i 'bras bu dag za 'dod par gyur na/ de a mra'i 'bras bu'am/ ba na sa'i 'bras bu dag bskyed par bya'o/ /bskyed nas kyang dus dus su chu bcu bar bya/ yur ma yur bar
440b6(khri brgyad): bya'o| |de'i rim gyis yal ga gel zhing 'phel bar gyur pa na/ tshogs pa rnyed pas a mra'i 'bras bu dag gam/ pa na sa'i 'bras bu dag 'byor cing tshogs par 'gyur bas/ de a mra'i 'bras bu
440b7(khri brgyad): dag gam/ pa na sa'i 'bras bu dag za bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
441a1(khri brgyad): 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab nas sems can rnams sbyin pas rjes su gzung bar bya'o/ /tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus
441a2(khri brgyad): dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyis rjes su gzung bar bya zhing / sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
441a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gro bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par 'dod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor
441a4(khri brgyad): lo bskor bar 'dod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
441a5(khri brgyad): zhes gsung lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /zhes nga smra'o/ /chos thams cad la dbang
441a6(khri brgyad): ba bsgom pa thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /zhes nga smra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad la dbang
441a7(khri brgyad): du gyur pa 'thob par byed cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ chu klung
441b1(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi sgo yin la/ chu klung dang / chu thams cad kyang rgya mtsho chen por zhugs na ro gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos thams cad kyi sgo yin
441b2(khri brgyad): te| chos thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par phye na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor /de lta bas na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
441b3(khri brgyad): kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa'
441b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
441b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la bslab par bya zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la'ang bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'phong gi slob
441b6(khri brgyad): dpon lag tshod la bab pa'i gzhu thogs pa ni/ phyir rgol pa rnams sam/ dgra bo rnams kyis thul bar dka'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
441b7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis thul bar dka'o/ /rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag
442a1(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
442a2(khri brgyad): spyod pa de la ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang dgongs pa mdzad do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
442a3(khri brgyad): la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha
442a4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
442a5(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
442a6(khri brgyad): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
442a7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de/ ci nas kyang sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab mi dmigs
442b1(khri brgyad): shing / de ltar mi dmigs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la dgongs pa mdzad do/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la'ang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o/ /
442b2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gzugs su dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
442b3(khri brgyad): bar du dgongs pa mi mdzad do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gnas mang po la slob par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ gang la'ang bslab par mi bgyi lags
442b4(khri brgyad): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ gnas mang po la slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ gang
442b5(khri brgyad): la'ang bslab par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la bslab par bya ba'i chos de dag dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan
442b6(khri brgyad): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di dag mdo dang rgyas par bka' stsal lags na/ de la byang chub sems
442b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag mdo dang rgyas par kun chub par bgyi'o//
443a1(khri brgyad): g.yar ton shin tu byang ba'i bar du bgyi'o/ /g.yar ton shin tu byang bar bgyis nas kyang yid kyi rjes su brtag par bgyi ste/ ci nas kyang sems dang sems las
443a2(khri brgyad): byung ba'i chos rnams mi 'jug pa de ltar rjes su brtag par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po mdo dang rgyas
443a3(khri brgyad): par bstan pa 'di dag la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/
443a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa 'tshal bar 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/
443a5(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur
443a6(khri brgyad): ro| |gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas pa med
443a7(khri brgyad): pa dang / gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa de ni/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslab par bya'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' shes na/ chos
443b1(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag pa'i mtha' de gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ mtha' med pa ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/
443b2(khri brgyad): mtha' de la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi dbyings
443b3(khri brgyad): shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi dbyings gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ dbyings med pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings
443b4(khri brgyad): te| chos kyi dbyings de la ni/ chad pa med cing yongs su chad pa med de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar chos kyi dbyings shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes
443b5(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa 'tshal bar bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ ji ltar chos thams cad kyi ldan pa'ang ma yin/
443b6(khri brgyad): mi ldan pa'ang ma yin pa de ltar shes par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos gang dag ldan pa'ang ma lags/ mi ldan pa'ang ma lags pa de dag kyang gang lags/ bka'
443b7(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ ldan pa'ang ma
444a1(khri brgyad): yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi bar du'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan
444a2(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ldan pa'am/ mi ldan par 'gyur ba de'i rang bzhin med la/ gang rang bzhin med pa de ni/ dngos po med pa yin pas/ dngos po med pa ni/ dngos bo
444a3(khri brgyad): med pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin pa'i phyir te/ chos thams cad kyang de ltar shes par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
444a4(khri brgyad): kyi mngon par bsdus pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsdus pa 'di la ni/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang bslab par bya'o/ /sa
444a5(khri brgyad): bcu po dag la gnas pa'i bar gyis kyang mngon par bsdus pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ mngon par bsdus pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
444a6(khri brgyad): po ni/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnon po'i 'jug pa lags so/ /bka'
444a7(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rtul po'i 'jug pa'ang yin no/ /'di ni/ dbang po 'bring dang / dbang po mnyam par ma bzhag
444b1(khri brgyad): pa'i 'jug pa'ang yin te/ 'di ni/ slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi'ang 'jug pa ma yin pa ma yin no/ /'di ni/ le lo can gyi 'jug pa ma yin zhing /
444b2(khri brgyad): 'di ni/ brtson 'grus zhan pa dang / brjed ngas pa dang / sems rnam par g.yeng ba'i 'jug pa ma yin gyi/ 'di ni/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / le lo med pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag
444b3(khri brgyad): pa'i 'jug pa yin no/ /'di ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la slob par 'dod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'dod pa'i 'jug pa yin no/ /gal te ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi
444b4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
444b5(khri brgyad): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la bdud kyi las gang
444b6(khri brgyad): dag ci'ang rung ste/ byung ma thag nyid du rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na/ thabs la mkhas pa yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
444b7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom
445a1(khri brgyad): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs
445a2(khri brgyad): te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la dgongs pa mdzad do/ /de ci'i
445a3(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di las nges par byung ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/
445a4(khri brgyad): de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar/ bdag gis kyang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs
445a5(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang dag brnyes pa'i chos de dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /snyam du re bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
445a6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pas de ltar brtson par bya'o/ /de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
445a7(khri brgyad): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral bar bya'o/ /rab
445b1(khri brgyad): 'byor/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tha na se gol gtogs pa tsam zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms par
445b2(khri brgyad): gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur gyi/ gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems
445b3(khri brgyad): can de dag sbyin pas tshim par byed pa dang / tshul khrims la bkod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la bkod pa dang /
445b4(khri brgyad): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar la bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la bkod pa ni/ de lta ma yin te/ gang se gol gtogs pa tsam zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu
445b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa zab mo 'di bsgoms na/ de nyid bsod nams ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par
445b6(khri brgyad): grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / rang byang chub kyi bar dag ni/ 'di las nges par skyes pa yin la/ gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig
445b7(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las nges par byung zhing / gang dag 'das pa dang / ma byon
446a1(khri brgyad): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu phye ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan
446a2(khri brgyad): yang gang la la zhig gis yud tsam mam/ nyin gcig gam/ nyi ma brgya'am/ lo'am/ lo brgya'am/ bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag pa'am/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du
446a3(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di sgom par byed na/ de nyid ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur gyi/
446a4(khri brgyad): gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams sbyin pa la bkod pa dang / rang byang chub kyi bar la bkod pa ni/ de lta ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zha
446a5(khri brgyad): na| gang gis 'di ni/ sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos por btags pa dang / rang byang chub kyi bar du btags pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang 'di las
446a6(khri brgyad): nges par byung ba'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
446a7(khri brgyad): chen po de ni/ phyir mi ldog pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems
446b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thabs la mkhas pa 'di dang ldan pa de ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byed pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
446b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yin par rig par
446b3(khri brgyad): bya'o| |byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa spyad pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ stong pa nyid bcu bzhi
446b4(khri brgyad): po dag bsgoms shing bsam pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i bar dag bsgoms pa yin
446b5(khri brgyad): par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ gzhon nur gyur pa yin

446b7(khri brgyad): dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang mi 'bral ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang mi 'bral ba dang / spobs pa mi chod pa dang / gzungs thob pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems
447a1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ lung bstan pa dang ldan
447a2(khri brgyad): pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ bsam bzhin du srid par skyes pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ rnam pa la 'jug mkhas pa dang /
